description.hltext_display: Әлемге әйгілі опера әншісі Ермек Серкебаев жайындағы кітап жарық көрді
description.content:
АЛМАТЫ. 21 желтоқсан. ҚазАқпарат /Ербол Тұрымбетов/ - Бүгін Алматыдағы «Меломан Гранд» дүкенінде Ирина Серкебаева өзінің «Ермек Серкебаев. Өмір, жастық шақ және бақыт» атты жаңа кітабын таныстырды.
Кітап опера әншісі, КСРО халық әртісі Ермек Серкебаевтың өмірі мен шығармашылығына арналған. Кітаптың бірінші бөлімінде Ирина өзінің балалық шағы мен әйгілі әртіс отбасындағы өмірі туралы жазған. Екінші бөлімінде Ермек Серкебаев өзінің балалық шағы, ата-анасы, сахнадағы достары мен әріптестері, сапарлары және бүгінгі операның түйткілді мәселелерін әңгіме етеді. Ал үшінші бөлімді жазуға Иринаға Бибігүл Төлегенова, Базарғали Жаманбаев, Есмұхан Обаев және басқа танымал өнер мен мәдениет қайраткерлері көмектескен. Олардың әрқайсысы өз көзқарасын айта отырып, барлығы Е. Серкебаевтың тұлғасын жасаған.
«Бұл менің үшінші туындым. Кітапты жазуға жылға жуық уақыт кетті. Еңбекті Қазақстанмен бірге, АҚШ-та жүріп те жазуға тура келді», - деді автор.
Шығаманы көркемдеу жұмыстарын белгілі қазақстандық суретші Балнұр Асанова жасаған. Туынды «Жібек Жолы» баспасынан жарық көрген.

description.hltext_display: DAX mit neuem Jahreshoch
description.content:
Empfehlungen heute, 09:18 HSBC TRINKAUS & BURKHARDT
Düsseldorf (aktiencheck.de AG) - Das Thema "Weihnachtsrally" seit 1988 fiel in der Zeitspanne der letzten vier Handelstage vor Weihnachten bis zum Jahresende nur in drei Jahren ein Verlust an, während die durchschnittliche Performance dieser Phase knapp +2% betrug, scheint sich beim DAX (ISIN DE0008469008 WKN 846900) mehr und mehr durchzusetzen, so die Analysten von HSBC Trinkaus & Burkhardt.
Mit 7.088 Punkten habe das Aktienbarometer erneut ein neues Jahreshoch verbuchen können. Damit gelte das mittelfristige Kursziel der Analysten aus der im Oktober nach oben aufgelösten Dreiecksformation von 7.100 Punkten endgültig als "abgearbeitet". Die deutschen Standardwerte seien gleichzeitig tiefer in die Widerstandszone vorgestoßen, die beim Hoch vom Februar 2007 bei 7.040 Punkten ihren Ausgangspunkt habe und sich über diverse horizontale Marken bis zum Hoch vom Mai 2008 bei 7.232 Punkten erstrecke. In dieses Kursband falle auch die Nackenlinie des Doppeltopps von 2007 und 2008 (7.190 Punkte). Ein Spurt über die angeführten Hürden erwarte man allerdings erst im kommenden Jahr. Auf der Unterseite würden die Hochpunkte bei 7.045/42 Punkten die erste nennenswerte Haltezone markieren. (22.12.2010/ac/a/m)

description.hltext_display: 校正の能力を上げる方法は？ - 今できることを
description.content:
書籍の編集部に就職した20代前半の新卒です。
学校で学んだのはデザインやDTP関係ばかりで、編集については全く知識のない未経験者です。
未経験で学ばさせていただく身ですが、正社員として採用していただきました。そのため、自分よりも編集作業や出版に詳しい30代のアルバイト既婚女性から不平不満が出てきているようです。朝や帰宅時に挨拶をしていますが、返してもらえません。その理由は、仕事もできないのに、正社員で契約内容が良いからのようです。自分も申し訳ない気持ちや早く認めていただきたい気持ちがあるので、この1ヶ月で大きく成長したいと思っています。
そこで、『校正』のテクニックについて教えていただけないでしょうか？
（現在は、電話対応や雑務が多いですが、これは本やビジネスマナー教室に通ってレベルアップできると思います。しかし、校正だけは本を読むだけでは難しいです。）
『校正』の赤ペンの入れ方などは本を読めば分かるのですが、画像の正しさ、柱や本文の言葉の正しさなどは本からは学べない「センス」で判断するような所があります。チェック項目もたくさんあり、誤りを見逃してしまったりして、正確な校正ができていません。データの修正だけで精一杯という感じです。教育係の先輩は、「目」がまだできていないから、と言いますが、その目ができるコツを知り、早く身につけたいです。周りは編集経験者ばかりなので、自分だけ新卒だから、という訳にもいきません。
校正もできていない、という点がアルバイトの方々の気に障っているようなので、『校正』の能力を短期間で上げる方法（コツ）、本、スクールなどありましたら、教えていただけないでしょうか？
よろしくお願いします。

description.hltext_display: Rovers can reach EPL top 5, says new coach
description.content:
Blackburn: Blackburn's temporary coach is confident he can fulfill the seemingly impossible demands of the club's new owners by guiding the team into the top five of the English Premier League while spending only 5 million pounds ($7.8 million) in the January transfer window.
"If we have a full squad and 5 million pounds, I am confident we could finish above 10th," Steve Kean said. "But we need to sit down and see how the 5 million breaks down. I do not know if it is just 5 million on salaries and fees or just fees. First and foremost, we need to know what the budget is for January.
"Can we finish in the top five only spending 5 million? It is fair comment if everyone is fit."
Manchester United manager Alex Ferguson was among those to praise Sam Allardyce's work as Blackburn manager, but Asian poultry giant Venky's fired him last week — less than a month after buying the northwest England club for 46 million pounds ($73 million).
Ferguson highlighted the work Allardyce did on a limited budget at Blackburn — which has been mostly mediocre since winning the 1995 Premier League — but Venky's instead promoted Kean from his role as Allardyce's assistant.
Blackburn was 13th in the 20-team Premier League, six points above the relegation zone.
Kean said his experience of working with the first-team squad will help him improve that position.
"Hopefully I can give input because I've been working with them very closely and we know the academy group under that," Kean said. "I know everybody at the club."
More on: EPL

event_or_fact.property: Hopefully I can give input because I've been working with them very closely and we know the academy group under that; I know everybody at the club.
If we have a full squad and 5 million pounds, I am confident we could finish above 10th
his experience of working with the first-team squad will help him improve that position

description.hltext_display: Anelka agent eyes US switch
description.content:
Nicolas Anelka's brother and agent has claimed the striker could move to the United States when his Chelsea contract expires.
The 31-year-old's deal at Stamford Bridge runs until 2012, by which time he will have spent 11 seasons in English football. And he could be tempted to follow former France team-mate Thierry Henry to the States in search of a fresh challenge.
Claude Anelka said, in comments reported by the Daily Star: "Nicolas told me he is interested in playing in the United States. We could see him crossing the Atlantic, and I'm serious when I say this."
He added: "He asked himself what he will do once his current contract runs out.
"The US is quite something, and a dream destination. He says he will give it a try, even though he would earn less money than in somewhere like Qatar."

event_or_fact.property: he will give it a try, even though he would earn less money than in somewhere like Qatar.
in comments reported by the Daily Star: "Nicolas told me he is interested in playing in the United States
He asked himself what he will do once his current contract runs out.

description.hltext_display: 勝手に選ぶ芸能界10大ニュース その2 裁判員に裁かれた押尾学裁判
description.content: (提供：リアルライブ) [ 拡大 ] -PR- 昨年8月、薬物事件で逮捕された元女優の酒井法子の事件と並んで日本中を震撼させたのが、東京・六本木ヒルズで一緒に合成麻薬を服用して容体が急変した女性を放置して死亡させた元俳優の押尾学被告の事件だった。 逮捕・起訴された押尾被告は保護責任者遺棄致死など4罪に問われ、事件から約1年の今年9月に初公判が行われた。 この公判は、昨年から施行された裁判員制度が適用され、押尾被告は芸能人として初の裁判員裁判となっただけに、世間の関心は高かった。 裁判官とともに押尾被告を裁いた裁判員は男性4人、女性2人で、女性が亡くなっている事件だけに、男女比のバランスが熟考されたと思われる。 公判には証人として19人が出廷し、なんとそのうち18人が検察側の証人。 そのうち数人の医師や事件当日現場に駆けつけた救急隊員らは「押尾被告が女性の状態が急変してすぐに救急車を呼んでいれば助かっていた」という旨を専門的見地から証言。 また、押尾被告の元マネージャーやタニマチは「自己保身」、「身勝手」などと叱責し、写真誌で押尾被告との関係を暴露した女性らは押尾被告の薬物の常習性を説明した。 被害者女性の両親も出廷し、押尾被告に対する厳罰を求め、母親が手紙を読むと女性裁判員は涙を流すひと幕も。 3週間にわたり集中的に審議された押尾被告の公判で押尾被告は裁判員に「見殺しにしていない」と訴え続けてきたが、終始押尾被告にとって不利な流れ。しかし、最後の証人は弁護側の医師で、「救命可能性はきわめて低い」と初めて押尾被告に有利な証言をした。 検察側は「自己保身のために被害者を見殺しにした」として懲役6年を求刑。 注目された判決は懲役2年6月(求刑懲役6年)の実刑判決。 判決言い渡し後に会見した裁判員たちは「客観的事実を見ることに徹した」、「被告が一般人でも同じような判決になったと思う」と口々に先入観や偏見なしで裁いたことを説明したが、各方面からは「判決が短すぎるのでは」との声が?がった。 押尾被告は判決を不服として即日控訴し、今後、二審で争う。 押尾被告の近況だが、11月に発売された写真誌の直撃取材に対し、なんでみんなさぁ、俺のこと悪く言うの？ ぶっちゃけやっぱ面白いから？」と記者に逆質問し?まり反省の色は感じられず。 被害者女性の墓参りについては、「(遺族の両親に)会って謝罪したい」とした上で「向こうが会ってくれないのよ。なぜだかは分からない」と説明。今後の芸能活動には「無理でしょ」と捨て鉢だったが、二審の行方は？ 「押尾被告の公判当時、大阪地検の証拠改ざんなど検察側に“逆風”が吹いていたため、検察側は控訴しなかった。おそらく、押尾被告は最高裁まで争うだろうが、判決は変わらないだろう。刑が確定していない時に拘留された未決拘留日数をひいて、押尾被告は1年半ほど服役すれば出てこられる」(司法担当記者) 裁判員裁判の?り方を非常に考えさせられた押尾被告の公判だった。

description.hltext_display: Greens cynical about radioactive report
description.content:
Conservationists and the Australian Greens are cynical about the timing of a report giving the thumbs up for draft laws to establish a radioactive waste dump.Energy Minister Martin Ferguson introduced the draft laws to parliament earlier this year, saying they would ensure the safe management of medical, industrial and research radioactive material.
A lower house committee was formed to examine the National Radioactive Waste Management Bill 2010 and tabled its report on Wednesday, recommending they be passed.
The laws would allow a site to be established anywhere in Australia rather than just the Northern Territory, overriding state and territory laws.
Muckaty Station, near Tennant Creek, is one of the sites the federal government has considered after it was volunteered by a branch of the Ngapa tribe in 2007.
But traditional owners of the site have taken their fight against the waste dump to the Federal Court.
The Australian Greens have described the process as a whitewash.
Greens MP Adam Bandt said the lower house committee had refused to hear from the public or the area's traditional owners.
The committee's report says the issue has been the subject of earlier inquiries, including a Senate committee, and there have been opportunities for comment in those hearings.
"This is Martin Ferguson's appalling Christmas present for the people of Muckaty," Mr Bandt said.
The radioactive waste is now stored in suburban and regional areas across the nation under less than ideal management regimes, according to Mr Ferguson.
About 4000 cubic metres of low-level and shortlived intermediate-level radioactive waste has accumulated in Australia in the past 50 years.
Mr Bandt said the report asked Mr Ferguson to meet the traditional owners - but so far he hadn't.
"The traditional owners of the proposed waste dump site, Muckaty Station, have also written to him requesting that he meet with them," Mr Bandt said.
"Martin Ferguson has ignored them.
"Instead of asking why or inviting the traditional owners to appear before the committee, the house committee chose not to receive any public submissions or any new information."
The draft laws would override the wishes of traditional owners, said Mr Bandt who, as a member of the committee, gave a dissenting report.
He said it was interesting the report was tabled while parliament was not sitting and just three days before Christmas.
Australian Conservation Foundation spokesman Dave Sweeney said the committee process was a quick and dirty attempt to solve a long and dirty problem.
"The timing appears a cynical attempt to further avoid public scrutiny as the inquiry was not required to report until late March 2011," Mr Sweeney said.
"There is no reasonable rationale for putting out this report three days before Christmas, especially given that the Federal Court is set to consider this issue in January."
The proposed law would remove appeal rights from the Muckaty people, suspend key indigenous and environmental protection, and override all commonwealth, state and territory laws that could delay or frustrate the opening of a waste dump, Mr Sweeney said.
"It is not based on good science and does not follow a robust, open, transparent process.
"The federal government should stop pushing the contested Muckaty dump plan and establish an independent and public review of nuclear waste management options based on best science, transparent process and community inclusion and consent."

event_or_fact.property: it was interesting the report was tabled while parliament was not sitting and just three days before Christmas
the report asked Mr Ferguson to meet the traditional owners - but so far he hadn't.
The timing appears a cynical attempt to further avoid public scrutiny as the inquiry was not required to report until late March 2011
the lower house committee had refused to hear from the public or the area's traditional owners
This is Martin Ferguson's appalling Christmas present for the people of Muckaty
The traditional owners of the proposed waste dump site, Muckaty Station, have also written to him requesting that he meet with them

description.hltext_display: Алматыда лимузиндер шеруі болды
description.content: Астанада «Қазақша білесің бе? Досыңа үйрет!» тілдік байқаудың жеңімпаздары марапатталды •Мәжіліс «Назарбаев Университеті», «Назарбаев Зияткерлік мектептері» және «Назарбаев Қоры» мәртебесі туралы заң жобасын мақұлдады •Орынбор қаласындағы Алаш қайраткерлері мен қазақтың тарихи кезеңіне қатысты ғимараттарды мемлекет меншігіне сатып алу қажет - К. Сағадиев •Астанада бірінші ауысымда оқитын 1-9 сынып оқушылары үшін сабақ болмайды •«Қазгидрометтің» болжауынша, бүгін елдің оңтүстігінде тұман, көктайғақ болады, шығысы мен солтүстігінде - бұрқасын •Үскірік аяздарға байланысты Астана мен Қазақстанның бес өңірі аумағынан шығаберіс жолдар жабылды •Жапонияның оңтүстік-шығысында ондаған жер сілкінісі болды •Ақтөбе облысында фосфорит ұнтағын өндіретін зауыт іске қосылды •

description.hltext_display: ZINGsocial.com to Launch January 15, 2011; Managed Social Media Takes Online Privacy to a New Level
description.author: ZINGSocial.com (Extreme Enterprises International, Inc
description.content:
The next wave in Social Media, ZINGSocial.com, launches on January 15, 2011 and will be the first-to-market with a unique 5-in-1 Privacy Profile that allows users to organize their virtual life the same way they do in their real lives.
St. Petersburg, FL, December 22, 2010 --(PR.com)-- Local social media company Extreme Enterprises International, Inc. (EEI) is pleased to announce the launch of ZINGSocial.com on January 15, 2011 - the next wave in social media websites.
This website was developed as a complement to existing social media powerhouse sites like Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, etc. Not intended to replace or compete with these sites, the programming principles behind it allow for a one-stop portal where a user can maintain one set of contacts, resources, and information and share it with their personalized networks easily and efficiently.
As social media continues to be a dominant force online, consumers and companies alike are faced with the question of online privacy. With millions using these websites and their mobile applications, social media has forever changed how we communicate and share information. And, with this shift comes both the ethical and legal responsibility to protect users’ information. Can the medium of social media continue to be an effective communication and efficient tool if it does not give its members the ability to protect private information and content ownership?
This is the inspiration behind ZINGSocial.com’s inception. Extreme Enterprises International, Inc., (EEI) is the first-to-market with a unique 5 in 1 Privacy Profile that allows users to organize their virtual life the same way they do in their real lives. Messaging and posts to multiple social media sites and the information that is posted can be managed from one portal simply by selecting the appropriate category - Friends, Family, Professional, Blogging or Dating.
With a simple click, users can choose who gets to see what information within each profile. This functionality extends across all the typical information members share online, including Wall Posts, Photos, Videos and even Blogs. Membership is free and a full complement of online functionalities supports its claim to “control your virtual life.”
Since its Beta inception in late 2009, the membership base has quickly grown to more than 100,000 users. CEO Verne Packer believes that the site’s viral membership growth in such a short time is due to its unique Social Media Privacy policy. “Nearly every day, you hear or read more concerns about how companies sell your information to advertisers and online marketing companies. Our members love the fact they can keep family, friends and professional contacts separated. It only takes one wrong “wall post” to ruin a marriage, job, child custody case or admission to college,” continues Packer.
Besides the unique 5 in 1 Privacy Settings not found anywhere else, EEI has found a way to monetize social media that has never been done before. Regardless of membership level (Free, Gold or Platinum), members can invite their network of contacts to join through unique invitation tools, at the click of a button.
On January 15, 2011, ZINGSocial.com takes social networking to a new level. The online community is invited to ‘put a little ZING in their online step” and begin connecting in ways they never thought possible at www.ZINGSocial.com.

description.hltext_display: Letzte Weihnacht im Erfurter Augustinerkloster
description.content:
Ein Ort der Ruhe: Schwester Katharina im Kreuzgang des Erfurter Augustinerklosters. Fotos: Martin Gerlach
Im Mai kommenden Jahres werden die Nonnen das Augustinerkloster in der Erfurter Innenstadt verlassen, folglich feiern sie in diesen Tagen hier ihr letztes Weihnachtsfest. Die Begründung mag Außenstehenende befremden.
Die Klosterstube: Hier kommen die Nonnen mit Besuchern ins Gespräch
Erfurt. "So, jetzt muss ich aber", sagt Katharina Schridde. Es ist 18 Uhr, die Glocken schlagen. Sie pustet die Kerzen in ihrem Büro aus, läuft schnell, nicht hastig, die Treppen hinunter. Draußen springt sie über einen kleinen Haufen Schnee. Ein paar Minuten später sitzt sie im Gebetsraum des Erfurter Augustinerklosters. Schnell hat sie ihr graues Gewand angezogen. Es verbirgt ihre Jeans und die hohen Schuhe. Jetzt sieht Schwester Katharina aus wie eine Nonne das Klischee ist erfüllt. Aber Klischees mag die Nonne nicht.
Im Augustinerkloster mitten in der Erfurter Innenstadt fühlt sich Schwester Katharina wohl. Das Leben hier hat einen festen Rhythmus. Vier Mal täglich finden öffentliche Stundengebete statt. Die Nonnen verantworten das geistige Leben an dem traditionsreichen Ort. In der Klosterstube bieten die fünf Schwestern des Klosters Kaffee und Kuchen an. Der Ort ist mehr Begegnungsstätte statt Café. Hier können die Besucher mit den Nonnen ins Gespräch kommen. Es sei ein Ort ohne Bedingungen, wo jeder so sein kann, wie er ist, denn auch seelsorgerisch sollen die Frauen für die Menschen der Landeshauptstadt da sein. Ob die das nutzen? Ja, sagt Schwester Katharina. Zukunftsängste und Krankheiten bewegen die Menschen. In vier Gästezimmern können die Schwestern jene unterbringen, die im Kloster zu sich finden möchten, die Zeit für sich haben möchten oder auf der Sinnsuche sind. Manchmal seien das Frauen zwischen vierzig und fünfzig, deren Leben sich durch Trennung oder Krankheit veränderte. Oder Rentnerinnen, die herausfinden wollen, wo sie sich einbringen können. Auch Männer können im Kloster unterkommen, doch das passiere selten in dem Frauenorden.
Die Nonnen hier leben nach den Benediktsregeln. In 72 Kapiteln umfassen sie unter anderem Keuschheit und Gehorsam. Beides versieht Schwester Katharina mit Erläuterungen: Keusch nicht im Sinne von Leibfeindigkeit, sondern als Konzentration auf das Leben in der Gegenwart Gottes. Gehorsam, aber nicht blinde Gefolgschaft. Und selbst die Gütergemeinschaft heiße nicht, dass sich alle dieselbe Hose teilen. Vielmehr sei diese mit dem Teilen in einer Familie vergleichbar. Die Frauen leben gemeinsam im Kloster. Jede hat ihr eigenes Zimmer nicht groß aber ordentlich. Die Küche teilen sich die Nonnen und hier beraten sie auch, was an diesem letzten Weihnachtsfest im Erfurter Nonnenkloster passiert: Traditionell wird es groß begangen, mit vielen Gästen und Freunden.
Schwester Katharina ist 46 Jahre alt. Seit 18 Jahren lebt sie in der Communität Casteller Ring, einer Ordensgemeinschaft der Evangelischen Kirche. Der Orden hat seinen Sitz auf dem Schwanberg in der Nähe von Würzburg. Er ist eine Gemeinschaft auf Lebenszeit nach den Regeln des Heiligen Benedikt. Die Außenstelle des Ordens im Augustinerkloster gibt es seit 1996. Im Mai 2011 werden die Nonnen die Luther-Gedenkstätte verlassen. Warum? Weil es Zeit ist.
Schwester Katharina ist traurig, Erfurt zu verlassen. Vor allem wegen der Freundschaften, die wohl nicht alle über die Entfernung bestehen bleiben werden. Aber sie ist nicht nur traurig. Sie weiß, dass es Zeit ist zu gehen. Denn das Kloster hat sich verändert über die Jahre. Inzwischen ist die Einrichtung, in der Martin Luther einst Mönch war, ein gut besuchter Tagungs- und Touristenort.
So schön, so gut restauriert alles inzwischen ist, so eher sehnen sich die Nonnen nach einem Ort, an dem sie gebraucht werden. Schwester Katharina wird zurück in ihre Geburtsstadt Berlin gehen. Mit der Erlaubnis des Castaller Rings beginnt sie hier ein Experiment, wie sie es nennt. Sie wolle zurück an den Anfang der Kirche ganz klein. In Berlin wird sie mit Freunden zusammen sein. Sie werden nahe beieinander wohnen, sich regelmäßig treffen, um Schriftenkunde zu betreiben und sich den Menschen öffnen. Ob sie ein eigenes Kloster gründen wolle? Nein, sagt Schwester Katharina. Aber das würden die meisten denken, wenn sie von ihrem Plan hören. Wichtig sei ihr die Besinnung auf den Ursprung der Gemeinde Christi und damit auf die Ursprünge ihrer Communität. Und das klingt so, wie der Weg, der sie einst ins Kloster führte.
Schwester Katharina Schridde wächst in Berlin auf. Religion spielte im Leben der Eltern keine Rolle. Die Kindheit des strebsamen Mädchens bleibt nicht von Problemen verschont. Sie leidet unter der Trennung ihrer Eltern und hat Essstörungen. Sie beginnt sich für das Judentum zu interessieren, reist nach Israel, schmeißt das Studium, wird Kinderkrankenschwester und lässt sich als junge Frau taufen.
Auf dem Kirchentag in Dortmund 1991 lernt sie erstmals Schwestern aus dem Casteller Ring kennen. Eineinhalb Tage später beschließt sie, eine von ihnen zu werden. Es ist der Beginn einer Sinnsuche und der Vollzug eines krassen Bruches: Die Frau aus Kreuzberg besucht das Zentrum des Ordens, abgeschieden, in aller Stille. "... und plötzlich Nonne" heißt das Buch in dem Katharina Schridde ihre Geschichte aufgeschrieben hat. Sehr ehrlich sehr deutlich.

description.hltext_display: “本屋”が第1位！ 20代女子に聞く「『人生を変えた一冊』に出会えたきっかけ」ランキング
description.content:
-PR-考え方や生き方に影響を与えたり、大きな決断をするときに後押ししてくれた本、?なたにも?りませんか？ 小説、エッセイ、ビジネス本に自己啓発本……どの本に人生を変えるような言葉が隠されているかは、実際に触れてみなければわかりませんよね。みんな、どんなきっかけで「人生を変えた一冊」と出会ったのでしょうか？
●第1位／店頭で大きく紹介されていたから！ 「本屋でオススメされていた」……19.8％ ○第2位／おもしろいよと友達に渡されたのがきっかけ。「友人に薦められて」……13.7％ ●第3位／大きな賞を取っていて気になった！ 「話題の本として紹介されていた」……12.8％ ○第4位／表紙のデザインが素敵で読んでみた！ 「カバーが気になって」……11.5％ ●第5位／家の本棚に?ったので何気なく読んだ。「家に?った」……7.7％ ○第6位／授業で先生がオススメしていて知りました。「学校の先生に薦められて」……7.3％ ●第7位／父親や母親に教えてもらった！ 「親に薦められて」……5.4％ ○第7位／仕事の役に立つと紹介してくれた！ 「会社の上司や先輩に薦められて」……5.4％ ●第9位／兄弟が買った本を貸してもらったんです。「兄弟に薦められて」……2.9％ ○第9位／読書感想文を書くために読んでみた！ 「学校推薦図書だった」……2.9％
第1位は19.8％で「本屋でオススメされていた」でした！ 本との出会いは、まず手にとってみることから始まります。本屋でなら、目についた本の内容をその場で確認することができるので、数多くの本と出会えるチャンスが?りますね。お店としてもしっかり考えてコーナーを作っているので、関連書籍も同時にチェックできて便利！第2位は13.7％で「友人に薦められて」。「○○から薦められて」という回答のなかでもっとも多かったのが「友人」。自分のことをちゃんとわかってくれている友人だからこそ、自分の性格や今の状況にぴったりな本を紹介できたのかもしれませんね！第3位は12.8％で「話題の本として紹介されていた」。話題になるということは、それだけのパワーを持った一冊ということ。世間で流行になっているものをなんとなく読んでみたら、自分だけの特別な一冊になった……というパターンも?りそうです。すでに出版されている本、これから世に出る本……どこに?なたの人生を動かす一冊が隠れているかは誰にもわかりません。もし次の休日に時間が?るのなら、本屋へ出かけてみては？ ?なたの「人生を変える一冊」に出会うことができるかもしれませんよ！
※『escala cafe』にて2010年10月にWebアンケート。有効回答数313件（escala cafe会員：22歳−29歳の働く女性）。

description.hltext_display: Farfan schießt Schalke 04 ins Pokal-Viertelfinale
description.content:
Schalkes Benedikt Höwedes (l.) im Zweikampf mit Nando Rafael. Foto: sid
Bundesligist Schalke 04 geht mit einem versöhnlichen Abschluss in die Winterpause. Nach dem Einzug ins Achtelfinale der Champions League und zuletzt drei Siegen nacheinander in der Liga ziehen die Königsblauen durch ein 1:0 beim FC Augsburg ins DFB-Pokal-Viertelfinale ein.
Augsburg. Dem Peruaner Jefferson Farfan gelang der Siegtreffer, mit dem die Gelsenkirchener im Pokal weiter mitmischen können. Durch den glanzlosen und hart erkämpften Erfolg, den Farfan erst in der 84. Minute sicherstellte, erreichte der Vizemeister erneut das Viertelfinale. Schalke war in der vergangenen Saison im Halbfinale an Titelverteidiger Bayern München gescheitert.
Trainer Magath verlängert Urlaub
"Es war eine schwere Aufgabe, das habe ich auch nie anders erwartet. Augsburg war hochmotiviert, auch wegen der schlechten Bodenverhältnisse war es für uns schwierig. Ich bin mit der Leistung meiner Mannschaft insgesamt zufrieden", sagte Schalkes Trainer Felix Magath, der den Weihnachtsurlaub wie zuvor schon angedeutet "wegen des guten Auftretens in den letzten Spielen" bis zum 2. Januar verlängerte.
Ein Highlight war das Spiel der beiden Halbfinalisten der vergangenen Saison nicht, Strafraumszenen waren bis weit in die zweite Halbzeit hinein an einer Hand abzuzählen. Schalke besaß gegen die geschickt verteidigenden Gastgeber sogar erst in der 78. Minute seine erste Chance überhaupt, wenn auch gleich eine große: Augsburgs Verteidiger Axel Bellinghausen aber schlug den Schuss von Raul, der erstmals im DFB-Pokal zum Einsatz kam, von der Torlinie.
Das Spiel war vielmehr von Beginn an geprägt von hohem Einsatz. Vor allem der FC Augsburg, im Frühjahr auf dem Weg ins Endspiel des DFB-Pokals von Werder Bremen gestoppt, ging mit großer Leidenschaft in das Spiel. Die Schwaben besaßen lange sogar ein optisches Übergewicht, kamen aber kaum zu Chancen, weil die Abwehr der Gäste meist sicher stand - oder sich zur Not mit Fouls vor dem Strafraum behalf.
Der FC Schalke ging vor 30.660 Zuschauern in der ausverkauften Augsburger Arena nicht minder engagiert zu Werke, scheiterte aber mit seinem Bemühen, mit schnellen oder wahlweise kontrollierten Angriffen vor das Tor von Augsburgs Schlussmann Simon Jentzsch zu kommen. Dessen Vorderleute waren taktisch gut eingestellt, machten geschickt die Räume eng und unterbanden Pässe aus dem Mittelfeld auf die Angreifer.
Strafraumszenen Mangelware
Beide Mannschaften neutralisierten sich weitgehend, Strafraumszenen waren Mangelware. Erst in der 23. Minute besaß der Augsburger Stephan Hain die erste Chance des gesamten Spiels und bis zur Halbzeit auch die einzige. Aus guter Position im Strafraum verzog er den Ball aber neben das Tor von Manuel Neuer. Danach wurde das Spiel zunehmend ausgeglichener, Schalke tauchte nun häufiger in der Augsburger Hälfte auf, fand aber keine Lücken der Augsburger Abwehr.
Mit Beginn der zweiten Halbzeit erhöhte der Erstligist den Druck, vor allem Farfan machte über die rechte Angriffsseite Betrieb. Mehr als der erste Eckball des gesamten Spiel in der 52. Minute sprang aber zunächst nicht heraus. Stattdessen eröffnete sich FC Augsburg die zweite und bis dahin beste Chance des Spiels zum Führungstreffer: Tobias Werner scheiterte allerdings am gut postierten Torhüter Neuer (65.). Nach der Großchance von Raul erzielte dann aber auf der Gegenseite Farfan die Entscheidung.

description.hltext_display: JEROME "JERRY" HENLEY
description.content:
Jerome "Jerry" Henley, 68, of Blackhoof Township, died Friday, Dec.
Jerome "Jerry" Henley, 68, of Blackhoof Township, died Friday, Dec. 17, 2010, in his home.
At Jerry's request, there will be services.
Arrangements by Hamlin-Hansen-Kosloski Funeral Home, Moose Lake.

description.hltext_display: Grippewelle macht bislang Bogen ums Eichsfeld
description.content:
Weithin nur blau. Die grünen und grüngelben Kleckse, die für ein geringfügig bis deutlich erhöhtes Influenza-Risiko stehen, finden sich im Süden und im Nordwesten Deutschlands. Für das Eichsfeld aber sagt die Influenza-Karte des Koch-Instituts: Es besteht ein normales Risiko einer Grippeerkrankung.
Eichsfeld. Nach einer Umfrage unter Hausärzten im Kreis ist die Grippewelle im Landkreis noch nicht angekommen.
Eine Grippe ist häufig mehr als eine laufende Nase und ein Kratzen im Hals. Sie kann den Betroffenen mehrere Wochen ans Bett fesseln und in besonders schweren Fällen sogar tödlich sein. Wie in jedem Jahr boten die Arztpraxen rechtzeitig ab September die Grippeschutzimpfung an. Die Gelegenheit wurde gut genutzt.
Bereits Anfang August ließen sich in der Arztpraxis Fabig in Niederorschel die ersten Patienten den "Piekser" gegen die Influenza verabreichen. Im September waren es dann 120. Bis Ende Oktober sei dann das Gros geimpft worden, war von der medizinischen Fachangestellten Karina Kaltenhäuser zu hören. Zusammen seien es im Oktober, November und Dezember 350 Impfwillige gewesen.
Neu ist in diesem Jahr, dass der Schutz gegen die Influenza der jährlich an die aktuell zu erwartenden Influenzaviren angepasst wird gleichzeitig die Wirkkomponente der Impfung gegen die Schweinegrippe enthält. So muss sich niemand extra gegen den H1n1-Virus schützen. Denn auch in diesem Winter wird mit einem verstärkten Auftreten der Schweinegrippe gerechnet. Im vergangenen Jahr hatte die Erkrankung weltweit für Aufregung gesorgt und war dann durch die Weltgesundheitsorganisation zur Pandemie erklärt worden.
Patienten werden
aufgeklärt
"Wir klären unsere Patienten darüber auf, dass in diesem Jahr der Impfstoff gegen die Schweinegrippe im Influenza-Schutz enthalten ist", sagt Kaltenhäuser. Es habe niemanden gegeben, der die Impfung deshalb nicht hatte haben wollen. Dominik Kobold, Allgemeinmediziner in Heiligenstadt, hat die Erfahrung gemacht, dass seine Patienten über den Doppelschutz Bescheid wissen. "Das ist bekannt, aber es wird in meiner Praxis auch noch mal explizit gesagt."
Die Grippeschutzimpfung sei bislang gut genutzt worden, so der Mediziner. Kobold empfiehlt auch jetzt noch die Impfung. Denn Anfang des Jahres, so weiß es der Arzt, rolle in der Regel die erste Influenzawelle an. So sei noch genügend Zeit, dass sich der Schutz aufbauen könne. Besonders impfeifrig zeigen sich nach Kobolds Auskunft die Rentner und die Patienten mit chronischen Erkrankungen. Jugendlichen wird der Schutz auch nur empfohlen, wenn sie chronisch krank seien oder beruflich mit vielen Menschen zu tun hätten.
Die "Beimischung" des H1n1-Schutzes wird aber auch skeptisch gesehen. In einer Leinefelder Praxis hat es die Allgemeinmedizinerin erlebt, dass Patienten nach dieser Information den Grippeschutz ablehnten.
Ebenfalls keine Anzeichen für eine Grippewelle kann Chefarzt Dr. Uwe Schotte im Eichsfeld-Klinikum ausmachen. In beiden Inneren Abteilungen gebe es keinen Influenza-Fall. Die Mitarbeiter des Klinikums hatten bis vor zwei Jahren in der Praxis der Betriebsärztin den Grippeschutz nutzen können. Der Nachfolger setzte das Angebot bisher nicht fort. Die Mitarbeiter werden an die jeweiligen Hausärzte verwiesen.

description.hltext_display: Бүгін Алматыда мұсылман қолжазбалары мен артефактілерді сақтау мен қалпына келтіру мәселелері талқыланды
description.content:
АЛМАТЫ. 21 Желтоқсан. ҚазАқпарат /Нәзира Елеухан/ - Бүгін Алматыда Ұлттық кітапханада мұсылман қолжазбалары мен артефактілерін жинақтау, сақтау мен қалпына келтіру жөніндегі мамандардың аймақтық кездесуі болып өтті.
«Кездесудің мақсаты - мұсылман қолжазбаларын зерттеу жөнінде тәжірибе алмасу, қазақстандық және маманданған мекемелер арасындағы әріптестік шеңберін кеңейту және сондай-ақ осы мәселемен айналысатын шетелдік орталықтармен қарым-қатынасты жандандыру болып табылады», - деді Р.Б.Сүлейменов атындағы Шығыстану институтының директоры, тарих ғылымдарының докторы, профессор Меруерт Әбусейітова.
Оның айтуынша, Қазақстан тәуелсіздік алуымен мұсылман ескерткіштерін анықтау, зерттеу, санаққа алу және насихаттау секілді жұмыстар жандана түскен. «Сондықтан қазіргі уақытта ғылыми және практикалық мәні бар ең өзекті мәселе туындап отыр, ол - тікелей ұлттық кадрлерді дайындайтын мұсылман қолжазбаларының жалпыұлттық ортақ қорын құру мәселесі. Елімізде аса құнды мағлұматтарды, қолжазбаларды сақтайтын бірыңғай база болатын Қазақстандық орталық құру қажет», - деді Меруерт Әбусейітова.
Кездесуге қатысқан мамандардың пікірінше, Қазақстан мен Орталық Азия ғасырлар бойы ислам өркениетінің қалыптасуы мен дамуына қомақты үлес қосып келеді. «Оған мемлекеттік қорлар мен жеке қорларда сақталған араб жазуымен жазылған қомақты мөлшердегі аса құнды жазбалар басты дәлел бола алады», - деді мамандар. Олардың айтуынша, қазақ, шағатай, түрік, араб және парсы тілдерінде жазылған бұл қолжазба ескерткіштерде Орталық Азия аймағының тарихы мен мәдениетіне қатысты аса құнды мағлұматтар сақталған.

description.hltext_display: どうしたらいいものか…。 - よかったじゃないですか
description.content:
長くなりますが、お願いします。
同僚の先輩は、朝の遅刻は、当たり前。仕事中に漫画や携帯電話、雑誌を見たり、寝たりしている。
ある日、二人でこなす仕事があるのに、私に何も言わず急に休みました。
一言でも、私に、急用ができたので、休むから、申し訳ないけど仕事ヨロシクなどの言葉があれば良かったのですが、それさえもありませんでした。
とうとう堪忍袋の緒が切れた私は、10年も上の先輩に、『一緒にする仕事を急に休むなら、一言申し出るのが常識じゃないですか？そんなんじゃ、一緒に働きたくなくなりますよ。』
とハッキリ言ってしまいました。
相手は、『すいません』とだけ言っておわりました。
私もすぐに、やってしまった感から、『偉そうに、こちらこそすみませんでした。』と謝りました。
続く
ユーザーID：2599009586
お気に入り登録数：4
古いレス順
レス数：6本
タイトル
投稿者
まりも(トピ主)
2010年12月17日 13:24
翌日から、お互いそのことに触れず、普段通りに働いてます。
先輩は、朝の遅刻は、変わらずですが、以前より、仕事してます。
このまま、何事もなかったように終わるのかと思いきや、最近、その先輩が辞めるらしいということを別の同僚から聞きました。
先輩は、上司から頼りにされてます。手先も器用だし、機械類の扱いも上手だし。
上司は、先輩の怠けた行動も見てみぬふりでした。
実際、私も、普段腹わたの煮え繰り返る思いですが、小さい会社だから、雰囲気を悪くしてはいけないと思い、怠けているところを、見てみぬふりし、冗談を言いあったり、はたからみれば、良好な関係に見えていたと思います。
ユーザーID：2599009586
まりも(トピ主)
2010年12月17日 13:26
先輩が、辞める意向を伝えるとなると、上司に絶対反対されるでしょう。
私が先輩に言ってしまったところを上司は見ていたので、どんな理由であれ先輩が辞め原因は、私だと勘繰ると思います。
ハッキリいって、今の職場は、家庭との両立がうまくいってるので、辞めたくありません。
それに、私は、自分なりに一生懸命仕事してきた。
と思ってます。
しかし、上司にとって大事なのは、先輩だろうなと思うと、胸が締め付けられる思いになります。
こんなことなら、先輩に言ってしまわなければ良かったと、後悔してしまいます。が我慢していれば良かったと…………。

description.hltext_display: Alle reden vom Wetter - auch die Deutsche Bahn
description.content: Seit dem Wintereinbruch hat die Bahn eine halbe Million mehr Fahrgäste verzeichnet. Es sind Reisende, die vom Flieger auf den Zug umsteigen. Pünktlich kommen sie dennoch nicht an.

description.hltext_display: Aktien Europa Eröffnung: Moderate Gewinne
description.content:
PARIS/LONDON (dpa-AFX) - Die wichtigsten europäischen Börsen haben am Mittwoch an ihre Vortagesgewinne anknüpfen können. Der EuroStoxx 50 ESTX 50 PR.EUR rückte um 0,20 Prozent auf 2.882,78 Punkte vor. In London gewann der FTSE 100 FTSE 100 INDEX minimale 0,01 Prozent auf 5.952,25 Punkte hinzu und für den Cac 40 CA INC. DL -,10 ging es in Paris um 0,10 Prozent auf 3.931,37 Punkte nach oben.
Versorger, Technologiewerte und Banken gehörten zu den bevorzugten Branchen. Entsprechend standen Werte wie Unicredit UNICREDIT EO 0,50 und Nokia NOKIA CORP. EO-,06 mit Kursgewinnen von jeweils knapp einem Prozent an der Spitze des pan-europäischen Leitindex. Der Luxusgüterkonzern rückte mit Hermes International HERMES INTL und LVMH LVMH MOET HENNESY einmal mehr in den Fokus. LVMH hat seinen Anteil an dem Konkurrenten mittlerweile auf mehr als 20 Prozent erhöht. Hermes zogen um 2,78 Prozent auf 161,00 Euro an. LVMH notierten zuletzt unverändert./rum/la

description.hltext_display: Millionenschaden bei Großbrand in Pennewitz
description.content: Ein verheerender Brand hat am frühen Mittwochmorgen in einer Tischlerei in Pennewitz im Ilmkreis einen millionenschweren Schaden verursacht. Hochwertige Maschinen, ein Bürogebäude und mehrere Autos sowie Kleintransporter fielen den Flammen zum Opfer. Die Brandursache ist noch unklar.

description.hltext_display: Olazabal ready to take on Ryder Cup captaincy
description.content:
London: Twice US Masters champion Jose Maria Olazabal would accept the 2012 European Ryder Cup captaincy if he was offered the role, according to his manager Sergio Gomez.
Olazabal has previously said health worries could force him to turn down the chance to succeed Colin Montgomerie as skipper but his long-time manager said the 44-year-old was now ready to take on the United States in Medinah, near Chicago, in two years' time.
"I'm quite sure he would take the captaincy if the job was offered to him," Gomez told Reuters in a telephone interview on Tuesday. "I think he's fit and ready and would be delighted."
The European Tour is due to hold a Ryder Cup news conference at next month's Abu Dhabi Championship when Olazabal could be formally appointed.
Last month, tour chief executive George O'Grady gave a broad hint that the Spaniard was the front-runner to take over as skipper. "Just about every player on the tour, when I last talked to them, would love to see him as the captain," O'Grady told reporters at the season-ending Dubai World Championship.
"He has not been invited yet but I think if every player you are talking to sees him as an inspirational figure, then the people in a room on a given day have got to vote it."
Olazabal has been dogged by injuries and ill-health, including losing two years to rheumatoid arthritis in his feet in the mid-1990s. He has suffered with rheumatic pain in his back and shoulders for the past two years and played just three competitive European Tour events in 2010.
Gomez said Olazabal was still in some discomfort but that his fitness had improved and he planned to play all four tournaments in next month's 'Desert Swing' covering Abu Dhabi, Bahrain, Qatar and Dubai.
The popular Spaniard, one of Montgomerie's deputies when Europe regained the Ryder Cup in Wales in October, has always said he would consider taking over as captain only if he was competing regularly and in constant touch with the players.
Gomez said Olazabal wanted to play much more in 2011. "We don't have a schedule beyond the Desert Swing but at some stage, maybe the end of February, he wants to go and see (coach) Butch Harmon in Las Vegas for a week or two to try and improve," explained Gomez.
"He is always in search of perfection. If I had to define his character and spirit on the golf course I would say he's a mixture of Seve Ballesteros and Nick Faldo - perfection on one side and fighting spirit on the other." If he did take over as captain in the biennial team event, Gomez said the last thing Olazabal would want is a tied match.
"One of his biggest disappointments was at The Belfry in 1989 when we retained the Ryder Cup as holders with a 14-14 tie," added his manager. "He didn't like that. "He had victories alongside Seve and won his singles against Payne Stewart but a couple of years later he just said: 'We never won that one'.
"At the end of the week for sure he will not want a tied match - his goal is to win. "He feels like it should be like basketball and there should be overtime or something but of course that is not how the Ryder Cup is structured," said Gomez.
More on: Ryder Cup 2012

description.content:
足彩指数中心 相同赔率数据 足彩媒体预测汇总 2010年12月足彩日历 足彩投注风向标 彩票投注 搜狐彩票中心：彩票开奖 彩票图表走势 凯利指数 澳门盘口 足彩数据 足彩预测 彩票数据研究 彩种导航：足彩 双色球 3D 七乐彩 大乐透 排列 七星彩 单场 22选5 31选7 11选5 快乐8 更多 第1页:足彩10127期振立视线英超分析 第2页:足彩10127期振立视线英冠分析 布莱克本VS斯托克城 推介：1、3
搜狐体育讯 数据布莱克本：上周主场1-1平西汉姆联队，联赛排名第12，战绩：6胜4平8负，进球23个，失球28个。数据斯托克城：上周客场对阿森纳的比赛因天气原因被推迟，联赛排名第13，战绩：6胜3平8负，进球21个，失球22个。核心提示：往绩不支持布莱克本，双方实力相当，平局为先的前提下，谨慎看好主队获胜。

数据布莱克浦：上周主场对热刺的比赛因天气原因被推迟，联赛排名第10，战绩：6胜4平6负，进球24个，失球29个。数据利物浦：上周主场对富勒姆的比赛因天气原因被推迟，联赛排名第9，战绩：6胜4平7负，进球21个，失球22个。核心提示：红军实力原本在对手之上，客让半一，利物浦即便不在状态，小胜对手也不难。
博尔顿VS西布朗维奇 推介：3
数据博尔顿：上周客场0-1负于桑德兰，联赛排名第7，战绩：6胜8平4负，进球30个，失球25个。数据西布朗维奇：上周主场对狼队的比赛因天气原因被推迟，联赛排名第11，战绩：6胜4平7负，进球24个，失球29个。核心提示：博尔顿攻击力不错，尽管双方交锋时平局居多，但这轮西布朗不可能全身而退。
埃弗顿VS伯明翰 推介：3
数据埃弗顿：上周客场2-1胜曼城，联赛排名第14，战绩：4胜9平5负，进球20个，失球21个。数据伯明翰：上周主场对纽卡斯尔的比赛因天气原因被推迟，联赛排名第16，战绩：3胜9平5负，进球17个，失球20个。核心提示：埃弗顿有回暖迹象，主场让到半一，输球的可能性基本上可以排除。大户彩民补到平局即可。
曼联VS桑德兰 推介：3
数据曼联：上周客场对切尔西的比赛因天气原因被推迟，联赛排名第1，战绩：9胜7平0负，进球36个，失球16个。数据桑德兰：上周主场1-0胜博尔顿，联赛排名第6，战绩：6胜9平3负，进球21个，失球18个。核心提示：曼联过往与桑德兰的12次交锋没有败绩，这一次当然也不会掉链子。
纽卡斯尔VS曼城 推介：3、0
数据纽卡斯尔：上周客场对伯明翰的比赛因天气原因被推迟，联赛排名第8，战绩：6胜4平7负，进球27个，失球26个。数据曼城：上周主场1-2负于埃弗顿，联赛排名第3，战绩：9胜5平4负，进球25个，失球15个。核心提示：纽卡斯尔遇强则强，曼城在搞定阿根廷野兽之后，应该不会满足于一场平局。
狼队VS维冈竞技 推介：3、0
数据狼队：上周客场对西布朗维奇的比赛因天气原因被推迟，联赛排名第19，战绩：4胜3平10负，进球18个，失球30个。数据维冈竞技：上周主场对阿斯顿维拉的比赛因天气原因被推迟，联赛排名第18，战绩：3胜7平7负，进球13个，失球28个。核心提示：双方都是保级球队，平局没意义！
阿斯顿维拉VS热刺 推介：1、0
数据阿斯顿维拉：上周客场对维冈竞技的比赛因天气原因被推迟，联赛排名第14，战绩：5胜5平7负，进球19个，失球28个。数据热刺：上周客场对布莱克浦的比赛因天气原因被推迟，联赛排名第5，战绩：7胜6平4负，进球25个，失球22个。核心提示：维拉已经不是从前那个维拉。热刺还有上升空间，即便是一场平局，他们也会全力去争取！

description.hltext_display: ANTHONY J. VENEZIANO
description.content:
Anthony J. Veneziano, 84, of Hibbing, died Thursday, Nov. 25, 2010, in Hibbing.
Per Anthony's request, there will be a private funeral service in the Immaculate Conception Catholic Church in Hibbing.
Interment at Maple Hill Cemetery, Hibbing. Arrangements are with the Dougherty Funeral Home of Hibbing.

description.hltext_display: Angry Samba seeks Rovers exit
description.content:
Captain Christopher Samba is intent on leaving Blackburn after being angered by the decision of new owners Venky's to sack manager Sam Allardyce.
The Indian food group axed Allardyce within a month of completing their takeover of the club, with Steve Kean currently in temporary charge as a long-term replacement is sought.
"If this is the way the club's going to be run from now on, I don't want to be part of it and I want to leave," said the 26-year-old in remarks reported by the Sun.
"As captain it's very difficult to say this but I've thought long and hard about it. Nobody in football understands the decision to sack Sam.
"We could have been relegated last year and Sam saved the club, so how can he be treated like this now?"
Samba exempted chairman John Williams from blame, though, before pleading for a swift decision over Allardyce's replacement.
"I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision. He's a football man and respects what a great job Sam has done," he said.
He added: "The players and fans need answers about the club's future. Unless we commit to who the manager is, how can we attract big players in January?"

event_or_fact.property: The players and fans need answers about the club's future.
I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision.

description.hltext_display: Pixelpark erzielte mit wesentlichen Gläubigern der Gesellschaft eine Vereinbarung
description.content:
Alle News heute, 09:29 AD HOC
Berlin (aktiencheck.de AG) - Die Pixelpark AG (ISIN DE0001262251/ WKN 126225) hat heute mit wesentlichen Gläubigern der Gesellschaft eine Vereinbarung erzielt. Zum einen wird auf Darlehensforderungen inklusive Zinsen gegenüber der Pixelpark AG zu einem wesentlichen Teil verzichtet und der restliche Teil in Aktien gewandelt. Zum anderen werden die Forderungen aus den von der Pixelpark AG begebenen Wandelschuldverschreibungen in Pixelpark-Aktien gewandelt. Die Pixelpark wird hierdurch in Höhe von 83% (EUR 19,3 Mio.) entschuldet. Der dann verbleibende Teil der Darlehensverbindlichkeiten in Höhe von EUR 3,2 Mio. wird zukünftig mit 8,125% p.a. verzinst und hat eine Laufzeit bis zum Februar 2014.
Die Durchführung der geplanten Transaktion steht unter dem Vorbehalt der Zustimmung der Hauptversammlung der Pixelpark AG, insbesondere unter dem Vorbehalt der Zustimmung zu den entsprechenden Sachkapitalerhöhungen, zu einer vorherigen Kapitalherabsetzung im Verhältnis von mindestens fünf alten zu einer neuen Aktie und der parallelen Durchführung einer Barkapitalerhöhung. Darüber hinaus ist bei einem der Gläubiger noch eine interne Zustimmung erforderlich.
Den übrigen Inhabern von Pixelpark-Wandelanleihen soll angeboten werden, ihre Anleihen im Rahmen einer Kapitalerhöhung ebenfalls in die Pixelpark AG einzubringen und hierfür zu gleichen Konditionen Pixelpark-Aktien zu erhalten. Der Vorstand und Aufsichtsrat der Pixelpark AG werden zeitnah eine Hauptversammlung einberufen und dieser die Durchführung dieser Kapitalherabsetzung, einer entsprechenden Sachkapitalerhöhung und einer parallelen Barkapitalerhöhung vorschlagen.
Nach Durchführung dieser Maßnahmen wird die Pixelpark AG ihre finanzielle Restrukturierung erfolgreich abgeschlossen haben, so dass sie sich anschließend ausschließlich auf die Weiterentwicklung ihrer innovativen und Wert steigernden Kommunikations- und E-Business- Lösungen für nationale und internationale Marken konzentrieren kann.

description.hltext_display: Manjit Bawa's canvas - a contrast of serenity and violence
description.author: Log in
description.content:
New Delhi, Dec 22 - He dabbled in rounded figures of men, animals and fairies floating in psychedelic orange and mauve, but late artist Manjit Bawa's canvases often reflected the colours of global violence, says "Readings" - a biographical series of books published by Lalit Kala Akademi.
"Readings" introduces a series of writings on artists and sculptors beginning with Bawa, who died Dec 29, 2008. It is a collation of reviews, articles and excerpts from Bawa's memoirs, chronicling his life from the early 1960s.
The compilation looks at the artist's work and the philosophy and politics driving his art at a time when the art scene in the capital was beginning to flex its muscle with artists like M. F. Husain, Swaminathan and Ram Kumar.
"When you make a statement, you don't wait for the paint to dry. The last two decades have been particularly violent, leaving a trail of blood," ruminates Bawa, one of the foremost among contemporary Indian artists, in "Readings: Manjit Bawa" compiled by Ina Puri.
"Museums have been ransacked, hospitals attacked and ordinary people targeted. I have articulated my disillusionment with what I see around me in my 'Mapping the Conscience, 1984-2004 set of Paintings'," he adds.
"Mapping the Conscience 1984: 2004" was an exhibition curated by Ina Puri to mark the 20th anniversary of the 1984 anti-Sikh riots.
"The works (in the Mapping the Conscience) seek to reflect the moments of anguish drawn from real life, but seldom seen. The allegories have their own tales to tell and mythological figures like the Narasimha and Prahlad are used - like an elderly father-figure calmly stabbing an innocent child in its lap," Bawa said.
Bawa, who described himself as a Sufi poet, musician and an artist, was born in 1941 at Dhuri, Punjab. He was encouraged to pursue art by his older brothers and studied fine arts at the College of Art in Delhi.
In 1964, Bawa went to work as a silkscreen painter in Britain, where he studied art and made studio sets to earn a living. He died prematurely in 2008.
The artist "did not want to be strictly Indian". And neither did he want to be global. "I think about it differently. Think of Carnatic sangeet or Bharatanatyam. Do you call them global or local? Anything in art, if you can accept it, becomes global at a particular point.
"Think of all the Sufi poets, or even Guru Nanak. None of them travelled much, yet their songs went all over the world... You have to master your own thing and then perform," Bawa said. "One was my elder brother who worked as a designer in the American embassy. Artist Abani Sen, who was my 'master babu'. He didn't just teach me to draw, he showed me that art was an attitude. 'Do 50 drawings every day. Show me,' he would say.
"When I joined the art school in Delhi, there was Jagdish Mehra on the faculty. For over 15 years, I had close contact with J. Swaminathan - I worshipped him like my guru," Bawa said.
For Bawa, his work "was a continuous process that took up almost all the waking hours".
"Even when I sleep, I have experienced visions that were related to my painting activity," he said.
He wanted to create his own style, he had the urge to "find a new idiom and a new language".
"Manjit Bawa was deeply interested in legends," Lalit Kala Akademi chairperson Ashok Vajpeyi told IANS. The artist had been brought up on Ramayana, Mahabharata, the Puranas, the poetry of Waris S. Shah and readings from the Granth Sahib.
"Entrenched as he was in the Punjabi folk epics, he played around with legendary realities rather than engaging with historical facts," Vajpeyi said about Bawa's art.
"A crow sitting on the shoulder of a woman... an orange goat standing in the unique combination of her limbs, a near violet tiger about to pounce on a half moon - the works do not have an essence that can be verbally extracted or described as such. They resist confinement within a single meaning," Vajpeyi said.
Bawa's icons, which usually laughed and swam in happy abandon, became sightless, cruel and bitter when he reflected upon the state of the violent world beset by parochial walls, hatred and jealousies - and above all terror. (IANS)
Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has proposed new rules under which the outside experts will have to disclose any...

description.hltext_display: Fisher Capital Management South Korea, Brazils Economy: 1st Quarter
description.content:
Fisher Capital Management Seoul Korea, Brazils Economy - The brief recession of 2009 has given way to a robust increase in consumer demand and recovery in investment in Brazil in 2010. Fisher Capital Management Seoul Korea, Brazils Economy - The brief recession of 2009 has given way to a robust increase in consumer demand and recovery in investment in Brazil in 2010. The economy is likely to grow 5.5% this year. GDP grew 2% year-on-year in the fourth quarter of 2009 and fell 0.2% for the whole of 2009 compared with 2008. Fisher Capital Management South Korea Investing: - The central bank did not raise its target overnight interest rate, the so-called Selic rate, unchanged leaving it at 8.75% a year. This was expected as the presidential election is nearing. The rate fell from 13.75% to 8.75% between December 2008 and July 2009. By the year-end, the rate is expected to rise by 250 basis points to curb inflation.
Even though the US and Brazil are not as open an economy as one would believe. Trade accounts for approximately 14% for both the countries. US cotton subsidies had been a bone of contention for the two countries. The US was accused of excessive cotton subsidies by Brazil. After eight years of litigation at the World Trade Organization Brazil has won the case and Brazils move to raise tariffs on a wide range of American goods has a potential of starting a new front in the trade war with the US over cotton subsidies. Overall, the issue is still not blown out of proportion as the two countries are engaged on other fronts.
Fisher Capital Management Korea, Brazils Economy: 1st Quarter Investment - Brazils government announced a R$958.9bn programme of investments in infrastructure for 2011 to 2014. The program is known as the PAC 2 the Portuguese acronym for accelerated growth programme, part two to increase Brazils investment rate and its potential for economic growth during the period of the next government, which begins on January 1 2011. Fisher Capital Management South Korea, Investment News: Henrique Meirelles who provided monetary stability to Brazil is all set to stand for election either as a Vice President or a senator. President Lula may choose him to run for the Vice President office to send a message that macroeconomic stability will be maintained under Ms Rousseff, presidential nominee of Mr. Lulas party in the October election.
Fisher Capital is a leading global financial institution holding extensive relationships with financial institutions, institutional investors and corporations across the world.
As a full service company Fisher Capital provides a full range of investment banking services including advanced risk management, corporate strategy and structure, plus raising capital through debt and equity markets. With this as our backbone we continue to provide a client service second to none.

description.hltext_display: 会社のトイレに大が… - 貼紙は効果的
description.content:
10人弱の営業所でこの春から働いている32歳女です。
御食事中の方は見ないほうが…と思います。すみません。
営業所は小さく、トイレは男女共用で和式が一つです。
いままで数回、朝トイレに入ると流れ切ってないといいますか、
水がたまっているところの底に大がいる、または水が濁っている…ということがありました。
大抵、いつもは朝から外周りの上司が、その日に限っては早く出社している日で、犯人は絶対この上司と思います。
年齢は50代と思われる男性です。
仕事ぶりも机の乱雑さからも、おおざっぱな人なのだろうと思っています。
びっくりしてみなかったことにして流したのですが、皆さまならどうしますか。
1「なんか流れてないですよ〜どなたですか〜」と明るく室内に呼び掛ける
2本人にこっそり言ってみる
3だまって流す
やっぱり3が大人の対応かとおもうのですが、これだとここにいるかぎり出くわすことになってしまいます。きっと本人は気づいていません。
仕事内容や給料に不満はないのですが、このことがひっかかっていて、憂鬱です。今の就職難にこんなことでやめてたら情けないとおもうのですが…。
どうのようにとらえたらストレスがたまらないでしょうか。
お知恵をお貸しください。
他人の大を見ることなんて（しかも異性）生まれて初めてで動揺しています…。
ちなみに私はトイレが近いほうなので、午前中に行くのは私くらいで、おそらく毎回第一発見者になると思われます…。
ユーザーID：8367217178
お気に入り登録数：5
古いレス順
レス数：11本
タイトル
投稿者
乙女座A型
2010年12月21日 10:59
「水流が弱いので、きちんと流れたか確認しましょう」とか。
トピ主さんのキャラにもよりますが、雑談の折りにでも
「大が残ってることありますよね〜。朝から見ちゃうと気分ダウナーですぅ〜」と
冗談めかして言ってみるとか。
余談ですが、最近、商業施設など公共のトイレで
残留ブツに遭遇することが多くなりました。
洋式でフタが閉まっていたら要注意ですね。
単にうっかり流し忘れたのか、
操作ボタン等の使い方がわからないのか、
世間に何かアピールしているのか。
猫だって排泄物には砂をかけて隠します。
立つ鳥跡を濁さず。
個室を出る前に、振り返ってチェックしましょう。
ユーザーID：9811657156
サエコ
2010年12月21日 11:32
「流れが悪くなっているので、修理したい」とかなんとか、営業所内で、話題にしてみるのはどうですか？
そうしたら「もっとよく流さなくちゃ。」と注意してくれるかも。
それか、貼紙をするとか。
ユーザーID：6601725742
のぶちゃん
2010年12月21日 12:02
大変な思いされてますね。
私は男女兼用ってだけでもイヤなのに、そんな置き土産があったりしたら・・臭いもあるんじゃなんですか？考えただけで最悪、ありえないですね。
だまって流し続けるのもイヤだし、本人にも言いにくいでしょうね。
だから『誰ですか〜？』って皆に言うのも有りな気もしますが、それだと本人を責めてるってとられてもやっかいだから、『トイレの水圧が低いのか今流れてなかったです。困りますね〜』って一度言って、次からは『今も流れてなかったです。修理した方がいいですかね〜』って言い続けるかですね。
でも、私の職場にもザッパな人居ますが、そんな人は『自分じゃない』って気にも止めないか、聞きもしてないかもしれないですよね。。
小学校みたいに『きちんと流しましょう』って貼り紙するとか？
最後は、上司の人に言って皆にきちんと言ってもらうですかね。
あまり参考にならなくて申し訳ないです。。

description.hltext_display: US-Regulierer legen Regeln für Netzneutralität fest
description.content:
Alle News heute, 09:30 dpa-AFX
WASHINGTON (dpa-AFX) - Mit neuen Regeln für den Datenverkehr im Internet haben amerikanische Regulierer eine wichtige Weichenstellung für die sogenannte Netzneutralität in den USA unternommen. In einem umstrittenen Schritt setzte die US-Telekom-Aufsicht FCC am Dienstag (Ortszeit) verstärkt durch, dass Internet-Anbieter alle legalen Inhalte in ihren Netzen gleich behandeln müssen und nicht bestimmte Endgeräte ausschließen dürfen.
Die Behörde setzte damit weitgehend einen Vorstoß um, den der FCC- Chefs Julius Genachowski Anfang Dezember gemacht hatte. Die Initiative soll einen Kompromiss darstellen zwischen den verschiedenen Interessen von Netzbetreibern, Inhalteanbietern und Konsumenten.
Generell unterscheidet die FCC bei den Regeln zwischen Festnetz- Breitband und Mobilfunk. Während die Neutralitätsregeln fürs Festnetz strenger ausfielen, ließ die Behörde beim mobilen Internet die Zügel lockerer. Den Mobilfunk-Betreibern wird zwar untersagt, Dienste wie den Online-Videoservice Netflix oder Internettelefonie-Anbieter wie Skype ganz zu sperren. Unterschiedliche Geschwindigkeiten bei der Zustellung von Datenpaketen bleiben aber weiterhin erlaubt. Genachowski begründet das damit, dass der mobile Internet-Markt sich noch im Aufbau befindet.
Über Netzneutralität wird weltweit - auch in Deutschland - kontrovers diskutiert, die Entwicklung in den USA mit ihrer hoch entwickelten Internet-Wirtschaft wird aber international besonders aufmerksam beobachtet.
In Amerika war die Debatte 2008 eskaliert, als der Netzbetreiber Comcast COMCAST CORP.NEW Daten blockierte oder langsamer zustellte, die über den Dienst BitTorrent flossen. Die Federal Communications Commission (FCC) rügte dies damals als Verstoß gegen US-Richtlinien. Später urteilte ein Gericht aber, die Behörde sei dazu nicht befugt gewesen. Damit sehen Kritiker die Autorität der FCC bei der Regulierung des Breitband-Internets in Frage gestellt./mcm/DP/tw

description.hltext_display: Couple not deterred by handicap
description.content:
GEMAS: More than 2,000 friends and relatives attended the wedding of a blind man who proved that true love conquers all when he married a woman who accepted him despite his impairment.
A shy and beaming Mohamad Sahmad, 31, from Kuching, tied the knot with Nor Azliza Mohd Rashidend, also 31, on Monday after courting her for more than 10 years.
State Family and Community Development Committee chairman Datuk Zainab Nasir was also present at the ceremony at the bride's family house in Taman Sentosa here.
Zainab, who is also the Gemas assemblywoman, arrived with 88 visually impaired guests from the Malaysian Association for the Blind in Kuala Lumpur.
Nor Azliza said she got to know Mohamad through a friend, who had given her his cellphone number in early 2000.
"At that time, I was studying at Universiti Institut Teknologi Mara and I didn't know he was blind. We kept in touch through SMSes and calls until we met a year later.
"My friend helped me organise our first meeting in Sarawak and we became even closer from that day on. After 10 years of courtship we decided to tie the knot and informed our parents of our intention.
"I'm thankful that my family is not against our union and I'm glad that my relatives and friends also accept him," said Nor Azliza.

description.hltext_display: Carbon Verification Leader Adds France to List of EU ETS Accreditations
description.author: Complete Integrated Certification Services Ltd
description.content: --(PR.com)-- CICS today announced that it has been accredited to verify carbon reports for operators flying into France. The company is already accredited to verify operators who report into the UK, Ireland, The Netherlands and Portugal.With only 3 months left before aviation operators must report their verified 2010 emissions and tonne-kilometre data, many operators are now searching for an independent accredited verifier.CICS has experienced verifiers on the ground in Europe and in North America, said Kurt Teuscher, President of CICS, Inc. Our parent company has been handling EUETS verifications for many years, and has verified the equivalent of over $8 billion of CO2 to date.Teuscher reported a rapid rise in activity among U.S. operators in recent weeks, in response to the pending EUETS deadline. He expects to see this activity continue to pick up in the weeks ahead. He noted that CICS has forged an alliance with Universal Weather & Aviation, Inc., which offers aviation operators a portal for emissions reporting and verification services at www.EU-ETS.aero.About CICSCICS is a leading global expert in carbon verification and consultancy, helping organizations in North America and Europe identify, document, and verify their carbon emissions to the appropriate mandated or voluntary carbon reduction programs. CICS Inc. also provides training and certification for numerous quality management systems. CICS Inc.s US operation is headquartered in Houston, TX, with regional offices in Schenectady, NY, and Greenville, SC. Our Head Office is located in Stoke-on-Trent, UK. CICS is a subsidiary of the CERAM Group, a global materials testing, analysis and consultancy organization.###CICS Adds France to List of EU ETS Accreditations

description.hltext_display: Virgin Racing signs D'Ambrosio for 2011 season
description.content:
London: Jerome D'Ambrosio will next year become the first Belgian driver to compete in Formula One since 1994 after signing for Virgin Racing on Tuesday.
The British team said D'Ambrosio will take the second seat and partner lead driver Timo Glock for the 2011 season, Virgin's second in F1.
The last driver from Belgian to appear in F1 was Philippe Adams, who started two grand prix races with Lotus.
D'Ambrosio, who impressed Virgin bosses in practice ahead of four grand prix at the end of the past season, will replace Brazil's Lucas Di Grassi.
"There was a lot of competition for this seat but at the same time I got on well with the team and felt that I had found my home," the 24-year-old D'Ambrosio said.
"I feel very comfortable with them — they are extremely professional and ambitious people and it is exciting to think that I can be a part of shaping the team's future."
D'Ambrosio spent the last four seasons competing in the GP2 Series after spells in GP2 Asia, International Formula Master, the F3000 Euroseries and Formula Renault.
"Jerome had been on our radar for quite some time," said Virgin team principal John Booth. "Apart from his obvious skill at the wheel of a Formula One car, he is an immensely personable young guy who is a pleasure to have around.
"He has secured this seat absolutely on merit and I think coupled with Timo and (test and reserve driver) Luiz (Razia) we have the perfect blend of youth, experience, speed and potential and we can't wait to see what they can achieve together next season."
Neither Glock nor Di Grassi, who was without a team for next season, won a point in Virgin's debut year in F1.
More on: Formula One

医者、歯医者、薬剤師
とか
あとは腕の良い料理人かな
ユーザーID：6783789518
おっとっと
2010年12月20日 15:53
正直考えてしまいました。今は、医者も廃業する時代です。私の友人に医者がいますが、勤務医などは、精神疾患や、訴訟問題で、廃業する医者がいると聞いてびっくりしました。友人の息子は、司法修習を終わって、イソベンですが、見習いですから薄給です。独立して食えるようになるのはいつの日か？と言っています。
そうやって考えると、贅沢しなければ食っていけるのは、地方公務員の、市役所、県庁の職員などでしょうか。消防士や警官は大変ですが。
知人の息子夫婦は、2人とも役場勤めで、奥さんはもう３回も育休を繰り返しています。夫も休暇は取り放題。
絶対に悪いことをしない。懲戒解雇などにならなければ、私は絶対地方公務員だと思います。それなりには大変なのでしょうが、時間に余裕がある優雅な暮らしをしていますよ。
地方公務員でも頑張って仕事はしていると思うので、気に触ったらごめんなさい。そんな私は中小企業経営者です。絶対になるものではありません。

description.hltext_display: Prison staff ‘biggest killers’
description.content:
Prison officials are the biggest killers of prisoners, according to a Judicial Inspectorate of Correctional Services report by Inspecting Judge Deon van Zyl.
Judge Van Zyl said the incidence of inmate murder by prison officials was even more frequent than murders committed by other inmates and raised ?serious concerns?. ?Officials appear to have been involved in acts of violence against inmates who are alleged to have assaulted an official or other inmates . These actions often constitute a form of revenge in response to an attack on an official,? he said, citing ineffective disciplinary measures at the disposal of correctional officials. ?Swift criminal prosecution should, in appropriate cases, ensue, particularly where the level of violence constitutes cruel and inhumane treatment of inmates, if not acts of torture. Our reading of the reports, however, indicates recalcitrance on the part of authorities to take decisive action against correctional officials involved in such cases,? he said. South African Prisoners? Organisation for Human Rights president Golden Miles Bhudu said they had been lobbying the Correctional Services department for years about unnatural prison deaths.
Lukas Muntingh, project co-ordinator at the Civil Society Prison Reform Initiative, said the problem was that South Africa had not classified torture as a crime. ?We need legislation to criminalise torture so that every death in a prison will be treated as a suspicious death.? Correctional Services did not respond by deadline. - Cape Times

description.hltext_display: Jud "Fabio" Birza Winner Of 'Survivor: Nicaragua'
description.content:
Jud Birza, a 21-year-old student and model, has won the top prize of $1 million on the television competition series "Survivor: Nicaragua."
The 21st season of the show wrapped up Sunday.
Dubbed "Fabio" on the series in reference to the iconic male model with the same name, Birza was the youngest competitor to ever win "Survivor."
"Once you're famous, people want to talk to you," he told People.com. "I want to get in the mix, dude. I don't want be like, 'Oh, (expletive,) I'm famous now.' I want to be like: 'Oh, dude, I'm famous now! Let's party!'"
The competition's runner-up was 24-year-old NASCAR worker and aspiring musician Chase Rice, while 30-year-old real-estate broker Matthew "Sash" Lenahan came in third. (c) UPI

description.hltext_display: ETHEL WANNER
description.content:
in St. Luke's Hospital.
Ethel was born March 24, 1917, in Steelton Marie, Ontario, Canada, to Charles and Vallberg Pringle. Ethel grew up in Morgan Park and graduated from Morgan Park High School.
She worked at Bridgeman’s, Newberry’s 5 and Dime Store, and worked 30 years as a bookkeeper and administrative assistant at National Iron Company. She often joked that if the company hadn't closed, she would still be happily working today.
She married John Wanner August 5, 1941. Ethel had an uncanny ability to remember details and enjoyed an active and healthy lifestyle to the end of her life here. While never having children of her own, she was like a mother and grandmother to Debbie Sullivan and her family. "Grandma EE” loved to watch her family play sports, enjoyed working crossword puzzles, watching Jeopardy and any type of mind challenging games, but her biggest joy, was spending time with family and friends. EE was generous in all ways and could be counted on to be there to offer her time, love, and support; she was a huge part of our lives and will be greatly missed.
She was preceded in death by her husband, John; her parents; sister Dolores; two brothers, Chuck and Ralph; and nephew Chucky.
Ethel is survived by her brother, Bob (Marilyn) Pringle of Duluth; Debbie (Tim) Sullivan of Hermantown and their children, Jon Sullivan and Brittany (Nate) Ellison, all of Duluth; Linda (Snorri) Gudmundsson of Florida; Bob (Linda) Pringle of Pennsylvania; Jeff (Aime) Pringle of Maryland; and many other nieces, nephews, other family members and friends.
MEMORIAL SERVICE: 11 a.m. Monday, Dec. 27, in Bethlehem Lutheran Church, 701 N. Third Ave., Proctor. Please leave a memory of Ethel or words of support for the family at www.bellbrothersfuneralhome.com. Arrangements by Bell Brothers Funeral Home, (218) 624-5745.

description.hltext_display: 私の年収を主婦のお小遣いという友人 - 個人的な意見です。
description.content:
４５歳、小さい会社に正社員で勤める独身女性です。
大都市に一人暮らし（兄が両親と同居しており、お嫁さんに悪いので、実家にはほとんどあまり帰りません。）
年収は手取りで２５０万円です。生活はギリギリですが、節約し、たまには大変ささやかですが、贅沢をすることもあり、なんとかやっています。
先日、大学時代の友人（お子さん三人を持つ専業主婦）と久しぶり会いましたが、次のように言われました。
「相手がどうとか言ってないで、結婚しなよ。見てて辛いよ。年収２５０万円なんて、主婦のお小遣い程度の手取りじゃん。」
私は別に独身主義ではありませんでしたが、ボンヤリしていたら、今まで来てしまったと言う感じです。
結婚するのも、もちろん素晴らしいですが、今の生き方も気ままで気にいっていますので、傷つきました。
節約も楽しんでいたつもりですが、そんなに見苦しかったのでしょうか。おごってもらったり、おねだりなどもちろんなく、友人としては対等にしてきたのですが。
一般的に主婦のおこづかいは年間２５０万円が普通なのでしょうか？
ユーザーID：4922693655
お気に入り登録数：20
古いレス順
レス数：31本
1 2 すべて トピ主のみ(2)
タイトル
投稿者
トピ主です(トピ主)
2010年12月21日 10:45
読み返してみて誤解されてはいけないと思いましたので。
専業主婦の方々に対しての非難のトピではありません。
自分と異なる生き方に口を挟み、見下す友人に傷ついたという意味でした。
ユーザーID：4922693655
ミミミ
2010年12月21日 12:31
そんなに貰えるとは知りませんでした。それが当たり前なら完全に私は今まで貰い損ねてます。
実際色んな方がいますから、それくらい当たり前よ、という人もいれば
働いて自分の収入があっても、ある程度の付き合いや
服や化粧品等身だしなみに必要なもの買うくらいだよ、という人もいるでしょう。
でしょうというか私はそのくらいでした、小遣いと言えるのは。
多少の余裕があっても何かの備えに貯えようと思っていたし。
＞「見てて辛いよ。」
う〜ん、ずっと仲が良くて、傍でずっとトピ主さんを見てきた、という人の言葉なら
何かトピ主さんを思う気持ちから、ということも考えられないでもありませんが
久しぶりに会った大学時代の友人でしょ？
自分の価値観でしか人を計れないんでしょうね。
どう思おうと、本気で気に掛けているわけでもないのなら
当人に言うのはその友人の方が
只の無神経か自己満足と取られても仕方がないのでは？と思いますよ。
ご自分で自活してらっしゃるんだし、ご自分が懸命に働いて得ているお金です。
そんな相手の言に左右されないでいいんじゃないでしょうか？
ユーザーID：2946833519
兼業主婦
2010年12月21日 15:51
私はパート主婦です。
春から働き始めて、年間収入は65万でした。
それも、自分の小遣いにしたわけではなくて
何か時の為に、そのまま貯金をしています。
250万稼ぐ。と言うのは
大変な事なのです。
自信を持っていいですよ。
お友達も貴女の幸せを思って
その様な言い方で
貴女のやる気に火をつけたかったのかもしれませんが
結婚するのは
お金の為ではないし
貴女が幸せだと思える事が何より大切なのです。
ユーザーID：8761717105
オバチャン駐在員
2010年12月21日 15:52
アラフィフ独女なので細かいことは良く分かりませんが、巷に飛び交う情報からすると、旦那の年収600万とかで家族4人生活してる家庭がわんさかいるみたいで、その中から子供の教育費とかまで工面するのに四苦八苦されてる家庭も少なくないみたいじゃないですか。それで奥さんの小遣いが年間250万＝月20万以上が"普通"である訳ないですよ。そりゃあ旦那さんが相当な高額所得者で、月20万の小遣い使ってる奥さんも中にはいるでしょうが、それが"普通"レベルだとは到底思えません。
小遣いって、奥さんが自分の洋服や化粧品、アクセサリー買ったり、友人と食事・遊びに行ったり、家族全体の生活費以外に自由に使えるお金ってことでしょ。毎月々々洋服・化粧品等々に20万円使ってる（使える）奥さんのほうが少数派だと思いますけどね。
お子さんが3人もいて（＝教育費3人分）専業主婦のご友人が、毎月20万も小遣いあるんなら、旦那さんが相当な高給取りじゃないと到底無理だと思いますので、そんな"普通"の所得レベルじゃない人の言った事で傷つく必要ないですよ。

description.hltext_display: Einzelhandelsverband wirbt für Mindestlohn
description.content:
Alle News heute, 09:30 dpa-AFX
DÜSSELDORF (dpa-AFX) - Die Arbeitgeber des deutschen Einzelhandels drängen auf die rasche Einführung eines Mindestlohns für die 2,7 Millionen Beschäftigten ihrer Branche. 'Wir bauen darauf, dass uns die tarifvertragliche Umsetzung des Mindestlohns im ersten Halbjahr 2011 gelingt', sagte der Präsident des Handelsverbands Deutschland (HDE), Josef Sanktjohanser, dem 'Handelsblatt' (Mittwoch).
'Die vielen Diskussionen über umstrittene Arbeitsbedingungen, die es in jüngster Zeit gab, liegen nicht im Interesse unserer Branche', begründete Sanktjohanser das Vorhaben. 'Hier geht es für den Einzelhandel eindeutig auch ums Image.' Bereits im Januar werde der HDE gemeinsam mit der Gewerkschaft Verdi die nötigen Vorklärungen abschließen. Im Zuge der Tarifrunde 2011, die im April beginnt, wollen beide dann einen Tarifvertrag dazu vereinbaren. Anschließend solle der Mindestlohn nach dem Tarifvertragsgesetz für allgemein verbindlich erklärt werden, sagte Sanktjohanser. Damit würde die Lohnuntergrenze auch für die nicht tarifgebundenen Betriebe der Branche gelten.
Bezugspunkt für die Höhe des Mindestlohns könnten laut Sanktjohanser die Einstiegsgehälter der Einzelhandelstarifverträge sein, die derzeit je nach Region zwischen 7,00 und 8,80 Euro pro Stunde liegen. 'Ein Mindestlohn, der sich an dieser Bandbreite orientiert, ist aus Sicht unseres Verbandes gut zu vertreten', sagte der HDE-Chef./she/wiz

description.hltext_display: 福田三款迷迪广州车展首发 着力向乘用车转型(2)
description.content:
迷迪节能惠民车型
作为福田迷迪首发的三款全新车型，迷迪节能惠民车型搭载了日本三菱最新的4A91发动机，该发动机采用纯铝压铸缸体，具备了体积小、重量轻的特点，使该车的最大功率达到77KW，扭矩达到了141 N?m,使燃油经济型得到了大幅提升，1.6排量发动机每百公里油耗仅为7.2L。与此同时，4A91发动机还采用了DOHC缸盖设计、连续可变式气门正时、等长度长气道进气歧管和不锈钢材料等配置，充分改善了发动机的燃烧过程，降低了噪音，使迷迪排放轻松实现了欧Ⅳ水平，既绿色又环保。

description.hltext_display: BMW ad 'burns' logo on to cinegoers' eyes
description.content:
London: BMW has come up with an innovative, albeit spooky, way of making sure viewers remember its latest ad - it is imprinting the firm's logo on people's retina.
The campaign uses the phenomena that occurs when you look at the sun and then close your eyes, leaving an 'after-image' that can still be seen for several moments afterwards.
The ad for the German car manufacturer, which has been previewed at cinemas in Germany, uses a heavy duty flash designed for lighting film sets that shines through a cardboard stencil right at the end.
When the flash goes off, it seems just like standard flash and could be taken as being the headlights from the superbike featured in the ad, reports the Daily Mail.
But when the people close their eyes, they see the clear afterimage of the BMW logo.
The ad begins with champion motorcycle racer Ruben Xaus speaking about what motivates him to race.
Shot in moody black and white, it progresses with scenes of Xaus preparing to race before hitting high speeds in a racetrack.
"Just close your eyes and look deep inside yourself," he says at the end of the ad. "Maybe it's your dream too. Close your eyes and you will see it. Close them now."
At that moment, the screen goes black and the audience close their eyes. Imprinted on their eyelids is a sharp afterimage spelling out BMW, which lasts for a few moments before fading away.
A video explaining how the ad works has become a hit on the internet and has been viewed almost half a million times.
More on: BMW ad campaign, spooky ads

event_or_fact.property: Just close your eyes and look deep inside yourself; Maybe it's your dream too. Close your eyes and you will see it. Close them now.

description.hltext_display: Air travellers are paragons of politeness: Study
description.author: Log in
description.content:
Melbourne, Dec 22: It looks like air rage stories are nothing but a myth, for travellers portrayed themselves as paragons of politeness in a new study.
In an anonymous survey of over 1500 people conducted by Travelocity in the US, all air travellers insisted that they are caring and considerate, reports News. com. au.
The survey covered a range of etiquette dilemmas including reclining seats, elbow wars and the use of mobile phones.
As many as 59 per cent of travellers said that they only partially recline their seats out of consideration for the person behind, with only 18 per cent saying they fully recline without asking.
A whopping 93 per cent said they go out of their way to help fellow passengers store heavy bags.
Meanwhile 64 per cent said they climb over their seatmates to go to the bathroom rather than waking them. While, sixty per cent say they always wipe the bathroom sink after use.
Eighty-one per cent turn off their mobile phone when told to instead of berating the flight attendant.
When it comes to seat swapping 34 per cent said they will always switch places to allow companions to sit together, while 46 per cent said they would move only if the seat they''re changing to is as good or better.
Travelocity''s Genevieve Shaw Brown said, "You hear these nightmare stories. I was surprised at how polite people claim to be." (ANI)
Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has proposed new rules under which the outside experts will have to disclose any...

event_or_fact.property: You hear these nightmare stories.; I was surprised at how polite people claim to be.

description.hltext_display: 福田三款迷迪广州车展首发 着力向乘用车转型
description.content:
中新网12月22日电(马丽)12月20日，第八届中国国际汽车展览会在广州开幕，福田汽车携3款迷迪“全能商?家车”亮相，其设计理念兼具家用和商用功能。福田汽车品牌总监张彬在接受中新网汽车频道采访时，对三款车型进行了点评，并表示它们的首次推出将成为福田汽车由商用车向乘用车转型的着力点。 据了解，这三款新车型分别是迷迪节能惠民车型、迷迪自动档、迷迪柴油版，其动力系统采用日本三菱技术，设计上集舒适性、安全性、空间性、时尚性为一体，不同于人们对传统多功能车的印象。福田汽车品牌总监张彬表示，此次福田推出这三款车型，着力点在于从商业车向乘用车转型，这也是市场需求变化的必然选择。
张彬说，福田汽车一直秉承绿色环保的造车理念，致力于新能源车型的开发，他透露，不久以后，福田纯电动迷迪将投入市场，该款车型将采用高效能锂离子电池组，实现零污染、低噪音的目标。

description.hltext_display: 巨屏智能手机新品 HTC HD2现价3060元
description.content:
全球WM智能手机HTC HD2成为时尚界手机新宠，在商家“吉林腾达科技”的最新报价是3060元，配件包括：单电单充、耳机、数据线、皮套等。HTC HD2是一款搭载Windows Mobile智能操作系统的巨屏智能手机。
HTC HD2采用的是微软全新的Windows Mobile 6.5平台，大屏直板设计，机身正面几乎全部被一块4.3英寸的屏幕所占据，而功能按键被挤到最下面的部分。电容屏的屏幕尺寸达到了4.3英寸，分辨率为WVGA水平，显示效果清晰，而且支持多点触控。内置1GHz的处理器，整机运行速度不错，WM系统也拥有海量的软件，可玩性很高。后置500万像素的摄像头，成像质量清晰，而且能够录制720P的视频，表现十分全面。网络方面支持WCDMA网络和WIFI网络，GPS导航也一并支持。
HTC HD2虽然上市已经很长时间了，但是该机凭借出众的外形和现在看起来仍然不过时的硬件配置，在网友中依旧很有人气，目前这款手机的价格还比较稳定，今日的价格为3060元，感兴趣的朋友可以和下面的商家取得联系。

description.hltext_display: 已然坐上寒冰王座 HTC G6延续冰点价
description.content:
【12月22日 PChome行情中心-上海站】 HTC Legend（G6）搭载着一块3.2英寸AMOLED屏幕，外观时尚大气，作为HERO的升级版本，CPU和内存方面也都有相当提升。现在商家阿权通讯处报价仅为2330元，价格犹如坐上寒冰王座被冰封了一般，没有什么变化，有兴趣的朋友不妨马上联系下商家，也可点击HTC手机了解更多相关内容。
在外观方面，Legend手机在外形上跟Hero差别不是很大，就是在一些细节上还是有自己的特色的。跟Hero不同的是，HTC Legend采用了铝合金造一体成型的外壳，其厚度更显轻薄，仅为11.4mm。同时，Legend采用的是圆形的光学触控板，跟Hero的轨迹球还是有区别的。
屏幕方面HTC Legend搭载了一块3.2英寸AMOLED屏幕分辨率为HVGA级别，在显示效果上更加细腻逼真。屏幕方面HTC Legend搭载了一块3.2英寸AMOLED屏幕分辨率为HVGA级别，在显示效果上更加细腻逼真。如此高解析和大尺寸屏幕无论在欣赏相片和影片、浏览网络信息、察看朋友动态、读取新闻或是与朋友联系等，都能带来绝佳的视觉享受。
HTC Legend采用的是Android 2.1的操作系统和升级版的Sense UI，不仅将过去内置的528MHz处理器更换为最新的600MHz主频高通MSM7227处理器，而且384MB RAM+512MB ROM内存组合也使得该机在执行效能和速度方面的表现更加出众。除了内置500万像素摄像头，支持自动聚焦等功能之外，内置GPS导航功能，拥有WCDMA/HSDPA网络和WLAN无线局域网和存储卡扩展等功能和全面的谷歌服务及Android应用程序商店下载等功能，使其较之过去更具吸引力。

description.hltext_display: الرئيس مبارك يهنيء الجالية المصرية المسيحية في فرنسا بعيد الميلاد والعام الجديد
i3内核蓝色新款 14寸联想Z460到货
description.content:
联想推出的Z系列笔记本在价格和性能上介于Y系列与G系列之间，填补了上述两系列间千元左右的市场空白，而且联想也是再接再厉推出了蓝色外观的Z460，更为靓丽。现在江苏苏阳之家无锡梦之岛专卖已经全面到货，此外还有红色款可供选择。
外观方面，联想Z460A笔记本采用14寸IMR高亮外表面,简约的色彩中隐现珠光质感。键盘面采用全铝镁合金，抗磨抗腐蚀。
配置方面，整机采用英特尔酷睿i3-370处理器，NVIDIA Geforce G310M 独立显卡；标配2GB DDR3内存，500GB硬盘，DVD刻录光驱；杜比认证音效。
接口方面，本本配备3个USB2.0接口(其中一个和Esata共用)，Esata Combo，Express Card接口，VGA接口，RJ45，全阵列式抗噪麦克风，支持立体音的耳机插孔/音频输出，多合一读卡器(SD/MMC, xD, MS, MS pro, SD Pro)，HDMI接口。

description.hltext_display: 圣诞更精彩 歌美多玩A330掌机带回家
description.content:
【12月22日PCHOME山东济南讯】
数码产品当圣诞礼物其实也不是什么新鲜事了，80后作为新一代的社会经济支柱群体，送礼物除了送心意，更多人会选择送温馨或者感动，回想当年那份童真的感动，最让人怀念的莫过于当年玩过的游戏了。如果你要送朋友掌上游戏机，或者如果你要送游戏机给你们家的小孩，除PSP和任天堂之外，歌美多玩A330将会是最合适的第三选择。
歌美多玩A330作为国产掌机品牌的新一代代表产品，在应用上，创新了传统掌上游戏机的玩法，将2.4G无线互联技术二次开发并成功植入，在应用操作上，歌美多玩A330玩游戏不再是简单的人对机器，通过无线互联技术，可关联多台机器，可实现双人玩格斗游戏、多人玩配合游戏。
在操作上，歌美多玩A330内置的无线互联技术，成功地创新了掌上游戏机的玩法，可以玩双人对抗游戏，多人配合游戏。从另一层意义上来讲，如果多人想玩联合对抗或者配合游戏，不再受限于数据输出线、不再依靠电视机作为显示平台、无需再另外购买游戏手柄，即可实现多人一起玩游戏了。对于国内掌机品牌来讲，歌美多玩A330的上市，代表着整个掌机行业进入一个新的时代。
歌美多玩A330除了在应用创新，另一个最值得关注的就是经典，歌美多玩A330支持FC、MD、GBA、NEO、CPS1、CPS2等模拟器游戏，游戏种类多达数万款。其中最为温馨和感动的《超级马里奥》、《拳皇97》、《街霸》、《恐龙快打》、《合金弹头》等经典游戏，都一一支持。这个圣诞节，送歌美多玩A330作为圣诞节礼物，送的不仅仅是心意，更是那一份童真的温馨和感动。
歌美多玩A330在原创游戏资源上，已经成功与国内最大最成功的游戏开发厂商——成都丁果科技达成合作协议，歌美A330作为成都丁果科技的展示平台，成都丁果科技最新的研发成果，歌美多玩A330将第一时间获得使用权。成都丁果科技已经成功为A330制定专门版的《7 days》和《天地道》这两款最新的华丽3D游戏大作。两款游戏均为恐怖冒险游戏，震撼的音响设置和重重升级关卡设计，让游戏有种身临其境的感觉。
该机器目前已经在全国铺货上市，圣诞节商家免不了打折促销，有打算送掌机作为圣诞节礼物的朋友，不妨考虑一下。
产品型号：歌美多玩A330
参考价格4GB/599元
