description.hltext_display: Denuncia pública contra los detractores del MC Héctor Melesio Cuén Ojeda
description.author: Luis Guillermo Delgado Morales
description.content:
Reciban todos un saludo amable y cordial de un amigo y de sus amigos de la Asociación Cuenta Conmigo por un Sinaloa mejor.
Quiero hacer una denuncia pública contra los detractores del MC Héctor Melesio Cuén Ojeda.
La calumnia el escándalo, la intriga, la infamia, la diatriba se convierten en abusos graves contras el prójimo aun más cuando se hacen como anatema, de manera sistemática e impune porque se escudan en medios de comunicación periodística respetable amparándose en la libertad de expresión (artículo 6 constitucional que es un derecho legítimo) lo transforman en "libertad de agresión". Actúan como francotiradores con enorme tozudez. Testaferros al servicio de algún poderoso o grupo de poderosos. Dudo mucho que sea a favor los universitarios y del pueblo sinaloense.
La calumnia no es virtud alguna, corroe y pudre lo profundo del alma es negación de toda calidad humana. La condición humana fincada en intereses propios crea el instrumento de tortura espiritural, la calumnia que degrada por desgracia las relaciones en una sociedad. (Retomado de Francisco J. Espinoza). Periódico sindical Suma, SUNTUAS, marzo de 2004, Culiacán, Sinaloa, México página 9.
Hombres y mujeres denigran su ser, se nubla el pensamiento y, sin más, la lengua por encima de la razón genera enfrentamientos. Como la punta del látigo la calumnia después de golpear al incauto apunta por ventura al portador de su vestidura, es decir, si se calumnia a un hombre virtuoso, tarde o temprano todo el mal que se le haya imputado recaerá sobre el acusador. Sea cual fuere el caso, un hombre honrado nada tiene qué temer. Si la calumnia es expresión de testimonio falso contra el prójimo, la investigación de un daño inexistente con toda seguridad podrá conducir al descubrimiento de un daño auténtico y, en ese caso, el calumniador que hasta entonces hubiera logrado esquivar el juicio de sus iguales se verá al fin expuesto. Es aquí donde interviene la mano de la justicia. (Francisco J. Espinoza I. Periódico Sindical Suma, Culiacán, Sinaloa, marzo de 2004.
Me quiero referir al caso de los que calumnian a Héctor Melesio Cuén Ojeda los que lo atacan como un anatema, como son Ana Luz Ruelas Mojardín, Guillermo Ibarra Escobar, Arturo Santamaría Gómez, Teresa Guerra Ochoa, Carlos Karam Quiñonez y otros más que por ahí pululan y vociferan calumnias y especulaciones atroces, así como también algunos malovistas de izquierda (oportunista) de izquierda derecha o de rosca izquierda. Así mismo algunos caricaturistas como el periódico Río Doce, del Debate y el Noroeste que se han prestado a esta campaña como viles chayoteros, orquestada con aviesas intenciones.
Repite los que han organizado esta campaña se escudan en la libertad de expresión del cuarto poder del periodismo pero la convierten impunemente en libertad de agresión, no se detienen, no se miden parecen ser perros de presa, pero al final de cuentas asemejan a los pequeños perros chihuahueños que ladran y ladran y siguen ladrando pero no asustan.
Estas "ilustres" y ex respetables personas, intelectuales de la Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa que en algunas ocasiones han sido reconocidos por su producción intelectual, mediante la investigación científica hoy para mi y para muchos universitarios por la serie de actitudes que han asumido como francotiradores, presuntamente críticos han obrado como verdaderos calumniadores y se han autodragadado o auto denigrado al hacer derroche de ataques por medio de pasquines o libelos, en artículos de prensa que no tienen fundamentos o pruebas. convencentes, lanzados contra la persona de Héctor Melesio Cuén Ojeda, ex Rector de la UAS y hoy como Presidente Municipal electo para ocupar la Alcaldía de la capital sinaloense, Culiacán. Quiero manifestar que no solo atacan al maestro Cuén sino que agreden a muchos universitarios que lo reconocemos, lo respetamos y lo hemos acompañado en su gestión administrativa y rectoral universitaria. Cuén Ojeda no fue el único que elaboró o hizo las reformas a la ley orgánica, no fue el solo equipo de trabajo logrando establecer grandes consensos con los trabajadores académicos de todas y cada una de las distintas delegaciones realizaron cambios sustanciales en el funcionamiento académico administrativo sindical, mejorando las relaciones laborales durante su cuatrienio 2005-2009, así también se obtuvieron mejores resultados de los avances académicos de los estudiantes así como en su comportamiento al aceptar las reformas en los procesos electorales para elegir autoridades universitarias fue una amplia aceptación, es de vital importancia señalar que también vieron y recibieron con gran beneplácito las mejoras materiales en la infraestructura y equipos de las unidades académicas mejores aulas, laboratorios, centros de computo, jardines y pasillos, estacionamientos, auditorios, bibliotecas etcétera.
El notable acercamiento a la Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa de miles de padres de familia que observaron en Héctor Melesio Cuén Ojeda y sus seguidores grandes cambios, verdaderas transformaciones sustantivas y que a la fecha de hoy mantienen esa favorable percepción de las persona del Maestro Cuén.
Ahora los enemigos al acecho pretenden aniquilar desvirtuando, calumniando,mintiendo a la sociedad vituperando a las autoridades universitarias, al C.Rector actual Dr. Víctor Antonio Corrales Burgueño, al H. Consejo Universitario, lo quieren ver derrotado, derruido mediante artimañas políticas impulsadas, azuzadas o provocadas de manera intencionada por los grupos facciosos, por sus escribanos y caricaturistas.
Cuén no está solo, somos miles de universitarios que lo hemos acompañado en esta ruta de conducción institucional estamos en todos los municipios, en todo el estado y somos y seremos más.
Propulsamos y apoyamos el Plan Buelna de Desarrollo Institucional 2005-2009, impulsamos y promovemos el plan visión 2013 y no es solamente el Dr. Víctor Antonio Corrales Burgueño, entiéndalo, somos todos o la gran mayoría. de consejeros universitarios, la mayoría del personal docente, administrativo y estudiantes y contamos con el apoyo de miles de padres de familia y de ciudadanos sinaloenses que nos brindan su apoyo y confianza.
Estamos por el avance la mejora, permanente de la calidad de la educación que impartimos tanto en el bachillerato nivel superior y el postgrado estamos por la permanente acreditación de nuestras unidades académicos del bachillerato y las facultades por la consolidación de los cuerpos académicos, luchamos por obtener más grandes logros y ustedes los detractores quieren retroceder en una lucha o afán por la presunta democracia que pregonan de los dientes para afuera, quieren llevarnos a la decrepitud a una lucha intestina que bloquee los programas de trabajo que se están desarrollando quieren conducir a la universidad a la destrucción de lo que con tanto esfuerzo hemos construido.
Ya basta perros de presa, ya basta perros chihuahueños.

description.content:
インターネットに流出した警視庁の内部資料とみられる情報を掲載した本を出版した「第三書館」（東京都新宿区）は２２日、個人情報が載った部分をすべて黒塗りで伏せた改訂版を出版する方針を明らかにした。
本のタイトルは「流出『公安テロ情報』全データ」。東京地裁から３日、２度目の出版差し止めの仮処分命令を受けたことなどに対する措置。改訂版の出版も２度目で、最初の改訂では、仮処分を申し立てたイスラム教徒数人の情報だけを削除していた。

Kreditinstituten fehlt noch viel Eigenkapital
description.content:
Handelsblatt Top News heute, 06:43 HANDELSBLATT
Die geplante Eigenkapitalreform für Banken (Basel III) wird nach einer Studie der Boston Consulting Group (BCG) vor allem deutsche Banken hart treffen. Die Institute müssen bis 2019 hartes Eigenkapital in Höhe von 66 Milliarden Euro einsammeln, um die künftigen Minimalanforderungen zu erfüllen.
FRANKFURT. Das geht aus der Untersuchung der Beratungsgesellschaft hervor. Denn ab 2019 müssen Banken zu sieben Prozent durch Aktien oder Rücklagen kapitalisiert sein.

description.hltext_display: 什么是证券市场禁入制度？ 12-22
description.content:
新闻中心-中国网 news.china.com.cn 时间： 2010-12-22 责任编辑: 法律人
视频播放位置
证券市场禁入制度，是指在一定期限内直至终身不得从事证券业务或者不得担任上市公司董事、监事、高级管理人员的制度。
依据证券法第233条的规定，违反法律、行政法规或者国务院证券监督管理机构的有关规定，情节严重的，国务院证券监督管理机构可以对有关责任人员采取证券市场禁入的措施。
我国的证券市场兴属于新兴市场，市场行为和市场管理都不是很规范，存在着许多问题。如包装上市、内幕交易、非法操纵股票价格等，严重扰乱了证券市场秩序，损害了广大投资者的利益，使许多公众投资者丧失了对证券市场的信心。因此，对于各种证券违法行为，必须严厉打击。特别是对情节严重的，国务院证券监督管理机构可以限制或者剥夺有关责任人在证券市场中活动的资格。
新闻眼 | 2010.12.22
文章来源: 中国网

description.hltext_display: オルティアーヌ、公開練習は５分間＝ＷＢＡフライ級
description.content:
世界ボクシング協会（ＷＢＡ）フライ級タイトルマッチ（２６日、さいたまスーパーアリーナ）で、王者の亀田大毅（亀田）に挑戦するシルビオ・オルティアーヌ（ルーマニア）が２２日、東京都江戸川区の勝又ジムで練習を公開した。「トレーニングは積んできた。これ以上必要ない」として、縄跳びとシャドーボクシングだけの約５分で切り上げた。
世界初挑戦の３２歳。これまでダウンを喫したことはないという。亀田大を「若くていいパンチがある」と評価する一方、「テクニックとスピードは自分が勝っている。勝つために来たし、そうなると思っている」と自信を示した。
［時事通信社］

description.hltext_display: Sharp Invests in Wales PV Plant
description.content:
WREXHAM, Wales, Dec. 3, 2010 — Photovoltaic (PV) panel producer Sharp Manufacturing UK announced it will invest $56 million to double the production capacity of the PV panels it makes at its Wrexham solar plant, the Welsh Assembly Government said.
The investment is in response to growing European demand for PV panels. Three new assembly lines will be created, which will double the company’s production capacity of PV panels to 500 MW.
Currently employing 750 people at the site, the company plans to hire several hundred additional workers.
“As a global company, Sharp could have chosen anywhere to invest, but selected Wales because of its tech-savvy work force and government support for business,” said Geraint Jones, head of the Americas for the Welsh Assembly Government. “Sharp’s location in Wales helps reach Europe’s fast-growing solar panel technology market.”
In addition, this month the company will launch a new renewable energy academy at the facility to train workers to install solar panels that will power homes and businesses.
The plant opened in 2004 with an annual capacity of 20 MW and has continued expanding ever since.
For more information, visit: www.sharpmanufacturing.co.uk

event_or_fact.property: ?As a global company, Sharp could have chosen anywhere to invest, but selected Wales because of its tech-savvy work force and government support for business,?
head of the Americas, Welsh Assembly Government

description.hltext_display: BUONE FESTE DA GIORGIO...
Őrizetben a helyi ˝vagány csávó˝
description.content:
Delmagyar.hu
Értékelem a cikket!
Makó - Rettegésben tartotta a makói fiatalokat egy helybeli fiú. Ha nem tetszett neki valami, ellátta a bajukat. A Makói Rendőrkapitányság tegnap őrizetbe vette.
Hírlevél feliratkozás
Értesülni szeretnék a napi friss helyi hírekről! E-mailemre levél érkezik, amelyben megerősítem a feliratkozást.
Egy betöréses lopás miatt intézkedtek a Makói Rendőrkapitányság nyomozói tegnap, amikor lehetséges elkövetőként szóba jött a 14 éves helybeli fiatalember. Az adatgyűjtés során a rendőrök megállapították, hogy valóban ő volt az, aki keddre virradó éjszaka betört az egyik makói ABC-be, ahonnan több mint négyszázezer forint értékben vitt el dohányárut. A kihallgatása során az is kiderült, hogy a 14 éves fiatalembernek nem ez az első összeütközése a törvénnyel, ugyanis korábban már több alkalommal is bántalmazta a helyi fiatalokat egy szórakozóhely környékén.
Először egy társával egy 20 éves fiatalembert vertek el, majd egy 16 éves fiút vettek körbe, akit egy-két pofon után arra is kényszerítettek, hogy csókolja meg az elkövető cipőjét. Amikor a sértett ennek eleget, a 14 éves gyanúsított fejbe rúgta a fiút.
Ellene több rendbeli garázdaság, zsarolás és lopás miatt kezdeményezett büntetőeljárást a Makói Rendőrkapitányság. Kihallgatását követően őrizetbe vették és kezdeményezik előzetes letartóztatását - tájékoztatta a delmagyar.hu-t Szenti Szabolcs, a Csongrád Megyei Rendőr-főkapitányság sajtószóvivője.

description.hltext_display: Edmonton cross-country ski trails open for business
description.content:
Edmonton cross-country enthusiasts should get their snowsuits out as the city's trails are open for business.
Thanks to the recent snowfall, River Valley ski trail crews have been able to speed up the readying process.
"All this snow has been great," says Darrell Reid with River Valley Trails.
But Reid says the heavy snow in a short period can often be a double-edged sword
"While it's great that the trails have fresh snow, it can be difficult to get enough hands to pack it all down and set the trails," he says.
"Also, because there was quite a lack of snow up until this last snow fall, we were having trouble getting a base started at all. Now we went the other way – we have way to much to try and pack the area to make ski trails."
He's positive they'll get it completed though.
"There are two crew members to each trail, plus lots of volunteers," he explains. "Kinsmen trail is ready to ski, and we expect to have them all finished by Friday."
He urges Edmontonians to try out the winter sport this year.
"It really is great exercise; it's an awesome winter outing and the scenery in the river Valley is spectacular," he says.
There are approximately 40 kilometres of cross-country ski trails available in and around the city.
Most areas have two different tracks, including a classic ski track, and trail length and level of difficulty vary.
For a list of city cross-country trails, visit edmonton.ca/sport_recreation.

description.hltext_display: Buscan detectar cáncer a tiempo en los niños
description.author: Sheila Arias
description.content:
Hospital General anuncia programa para canalizar a los pequeños con un especialista
El Hospital General contará con un especialista en detectar cáncer en los niños.
Fotografía: Noroeste / Daniel Santana.
MAZATLÁN._Por primera vez, el Hospital General "Martiniano Carvajal" pondrá en marcha un programa especial para detectar y atender a tiempo a niños con cáncer en la zona sur del Estado; será un canal que llevará a los menores directo con oncólogos.
La directora de la unidad en este puerto, Felipa Muñoz Valdez, anunció que este proyecto es parte de un programa nacional especializado, el objetivo es ganarle tiempo a la enfermedad y darle al paciente más esperanza de vida.
"El especialista está en capacitación, es algo muy favorecedor para el Hospital, es un programa especial de detección oportuna. Como una extensión del Hospital Pediátrico de la capital", comentó.
La funcionaria aseguró que el médico que estará a cargo de esta nueva área está por integrarse y se encargará de detectar a los niños con problemas de cáncer, hará estudios, los guiará en su tratamiento y canalizará al Hospital de Culiacán.
Muñoz Valdez dijo que este programa ayudará a reducir tiempos de atención, pues el especialista se encargará de cada paciente, lo que aumenta la esperanza de vida en la detección oportuna.
Actualmente la mayoría de los niños atendidos en el Hospital desarrollan este mal en la sangre.
Y en un balance de atenciones, la directora de la unidad aseguró que este 2010, las consultas se concentraron en las especialidades de ginecobstetricia, traumatología, terapia y quirófano.
Uno de los proyectos que el Hospital puso en marcha fue reforzar la detección oportuna en cáncer de mama y cervicouterino; en esta especialidad mantienen coordinación con Sonora para la detección de este mal a través de imágenes digitales.
"Tuvimos alta productividad en servicios de obstetricia, en nacimientos, cirugía de urgencia; lo que queda pendiente es el crecimiento que vamos a tener con el nuevo hospital, más grande, con otros servicios", comentó al referirse a la unidad de Urías que sigue en construcción.
Este año y el inicio de 2011, el Hospital reforzará programas preventivos en embarazos de adolescentes, así evitarán que muchas jovencitas arriesguen su vida, pues los embarazos a temprana edad se consideran de alto riesgo.
"El especialista está en capacitación, es algo muy favorecedor para el Hospital, es un programa especial de detección oportuna. Como una extensión del Hospital Pediátrico de la capital".
Felipa Muñoz Valdez
Directora del Hospital General

description.hltext_display: 両さんグッズ好調ですが…麗子のそっくりさん応募は不調
description.content:
人気漫画「こちら葛飾区亀有公園前派出所」にあやかって町おこしをしようと、漫画の舞台となっているＪＲ亀有駅（東京都葛飾区）周辺の商店街が企画・販売している主人公「両さん」像の貯金箱と携帯ストラップの販売が好調だ。販売開始後２週間で早くも増産体制に入った。一方、来年２月に最終審査がある「両さんそっくりコンテスト」ではサブキャストの応募がほとんどなく、２５日の締め切りを前に、商店街は気をもんでいる。
亀有地区商店街協議会に加盟する書店や鍵屋など１７店舗などが今月６日から貯金箱とストラップの販売を開始。当初、貯金箱３００個、ストラップ７００個を作った。

description.hltext_display: Papierhersteller fordern mehr Geld
description.content:
Handelsblatt Top News heute, 06:00 HANDELSBLATT
Zeitungsverlage und Papierhersteller haben harte Verhandlungen vor sich. Obwohl die Gespräche über die Preise für Zeitungspapier erst vor wenigen Tagen begonnenen haben, sind sie bereits festgefahren. Die Verlage sträuben sich gegen die Preisforderungen ihrer Zulieferer - denn sie kämpfen selbst mit sinkender Nachfrage.
DÜSSELDORF/STOCKHOLM. Die überwiegend skandinavischen Papierkonzerne fordern eine Preiserhöhung von rund 20 Prozent - die deutschen Medienunternehmen wollen da nicht mitmachen. "Mir ist nicht plausibel, warum bei weiter sinkender Nachfrage durch die Zeitungsverlage in Europa die Preise für Zeitungspapier um einen erheblichen Prozentsatz steigen sollen, auch unter Würdigung höherer Rohstoff- und Energiekosten bei der Papierherstellung", sagte Rudolf Knepper, stellvertretender Vorstandschef bei Axel Springer, dem Handelsblatt.
Verlage ohne Verständnis
Erst im Frühjahr, so erwarten Insider, könnten sich Verlage und Papierhersteller einigen. "Wir hoffen, dass die Papierindustrie den Bogen nicht überspannt", sagt Jörg Laskowski, Geschäftsführer des Zeitungsverlegerverbands BDZV. "Wir setzen darauf, dass die über Jahrzehnte gewachsenen Geschäftsbeziehungen durch den Konflikt nicht beschädigt werden."
Der Medienbranche fehlt für höhere Papierpreise das Verständnis. Schließlich leiden die Verlage unter sinkenden Auflagen. Höhere Kosten für Rohstoffe sind daher Gift für eine Branche, deren Umsatzrendite stark unter Druck ist. Papier ist traditionell nach Personal der größte Kostenblock bei Zeitungsverlagen. Ein höherer Papierpreis würde direkt die Gewinne der Zeitungsunternehmen schmälern.

description.hltext_display: Topoptreden van de Catsband
description.content: In de Jozef vond zondag een optreden plaats van de Tribute to the Cats Band. De zaal zat bomvol. Ook op Tweede Kerstdag zal de TTTCB in de Jozef optreden en dan is de zaal eveneens uitverkocht. Het podium was prachtig verlicht en op het repertoire had de Tribute to the Cats Band ook enkele kerstnummers van de Cats. Het werd voor de vele bezoekers een on-vergetelijke avond. De band was uitstekend op dreef en speelde het "dak eraf".

description.hltext_display: ¿Falta de previsión en los aeropuertos europeos ante la nieve?
description.content:
La situación en muchos de los aeropuertos europeos que más problemas están teniendo estos días por culpa de la nieve no mejora y ya hay muchas voces que cuestionan la falta de previsión ante las nevadas. El epicentro del desastre, Heathrow, sólo ha dedicado un 10% de su presupuesto a tecnología para combatir el hielo y la nieve. El de Bruselas, en pleno invierno, no tenían reservas de líquido anticongelante. El aeropuerto de Dublín acaba de abrir bajo mínimos. El de París amanece con varias pistas cerradas y el de Frankfurt con 300 vuelos cancelados. Y mientras, los aviones se acumulan en las pistas y los pasajeros en las terminales. Autor: videosatlas
Tags: terminales, invierno, acumulan, varias, mínimos, culpa, previsión, muchos, epicentro, nevadas
Añadido: 2010-12-22 09:45:49

description.hltext_display: Un Belén viviente gigante muy especial
description.content:
En Vigo (Pontevedra) se han prestado voluntarios para hacer un belén viviente gigante unos cien figurantes con discapacidad intelectual, sensorial y plurideficientes que han elaborado todos los utensilios en los talleres San Francisco en los que trabajan a diario. Se han habilitado 600 metros cuadrados para albergar escenarios tan diversos como Nazaret, el mercado de Jerusalén, el palacio de Herodes, el lago Tiberíades o el campo de los pastores. description.hltext_display: Calafell (Tarragona) reparte 50.000 euros en ventanilla
description.content:
TARRAGONA, 22 Dic. (EUROPA PRESS) -
La administración número 3 de Calafell (Tarragona) ha repartido 50.000 euros en ventanilla, como parte de un quinto premio del Sorteo Extraordinario de que ha recaído en la localidad.
Una representante de esta administración ha señalado que en total han vendido una de las 195 series correspondientes al 75.869, lo que supone una pequeña parte de los 9,75 millones de euros con los que está dotado cada uno de los ocho quintos premios.
"Todo por aquí cerca", ha señalado la representante sobre el hecho de que los diez décimos se han vendido íntegramente en ventanilla. El premio ha salido a las 9.34 horas y ha sido el primero cantado en el sorteo navideño.

description.hltext_display: Infinitely Virtual Announces New Diamond and Diamond+ Linux Plans
description.author: Infinitely Virtual
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Infinitely Virtual, a rapidly expanding provider of virtual server and cloud computing technology, is pleased to announce the availability of two new plans the Diamond and Diamond+ for Linux Virtual Dedicated Server Hosting.With a Linux Virtual Dedicated Server plan, Debian and CentOS are installed on virtual hardware, giving access to the root login which allows users to modify the installation of Linux, install any software, and manage the server on their own. The exclusive InfinitePanel is the most powerful hosting control panel available, and allows for the management of multiple servers from one control panel and the instant addition of applications like WordPress and Drupal.Every server has between 1 and 8 2.53 GHz virtual Cpus, shared on hosts operating, on average, below 30% CPU utilization. Infinitely Virtual ensures that every server is backed by 100% of the RAM included in each respective plan, up to 16 GB. Other server features include: Virtual KVM, Virtual CD/DVD & Floppy, Virtual Power Buttons, and Performance Charts.With Infinitely Virtuals Virtual Dedicated server, the client is always protected. Infinitely Virtuals revolutionary Enterprise Virtualization Environment (E.V.E.), includes features such as clustered NetApp SAN with RAID-DP, VMware HA clustering, and clustered enterprise firewalls, and a 100% uptime guarantee.Diamond Plan Features 6 CPU Cores (Max: 8 Cores) 6 GB RAM (Max: 16 GB) 60 GB of Storage (Max: 2 TB) Unlimited Bandwidth Monthly price of $179.99Diamond+ Plan Features 8 CPU Cores (Max: 8 Cores) 8 GB RAM (Max: 16 GB) 70 GB of Storage (Max: 2TB) Unlimited Bandwidth Monthly price of $209.99Our new Diamond and Diamond+ Linux plans are the most powerful virtual server plans from any vendor. When combined with E.V.E., these plans leave very little room for dedicated server hosting, says Adam Stern, President and CEO of Infinitely Virtual.Infinitely Virtuals new Diamond and Diamond+ Plans for Linux Virtual Dedicated Server Hosting takes the company further in its commitment to deliver the highest quality virtual products and services to clients at the industrys lowest prices. Visit the new website, and learn more about Infinitely Virtual at http://www.infinitelyvirtual.com.About Infinitely VirtualInfinitely Virtual is a leading provider of high quality and affordable virtual terminal server technology, capable of delivering services to any type of business, including cloud computing and hosting, virtual private hosting, virtual dedicated server, Exchange Email and Exchange Hosting. As a virtual company, Infinitely Virtual is managed using Software as a Service or SaaS toolsan affordable way for businesses to use software as its needed, rather than licensing all devices with all applications. The company was established as a subsidiary of Altay Corporation, and through this partnership Infinitely Virtual provides customers with expert 247 Technical Support. With an innovative approach to virtualization, Infinitely Virtual provides aggressively priced options that competitors simply cannot meet. More information about Infinitely Virtual can be found at: http://www.infinitelyvirtual.com or call 866-257-8455.About Altay CorporationAltay is an IT professional services company that designs, implements, and supports single- and multi-vendor data solutions. Altays pledge is to provide products and services that meet the highest standards of quality, designed for a clients specific needs, and delivered economicallywith the ultimate goal of helping customers reach their potential. Altays team is specialized in voice, video and data solutions, and it has a proven track record of providing excellent service to its customers. More information about Altay Corporation can be found at http://www.altayusa.com or call 866-54-Altay.###

description.hltext_display: 白鵬、６連覇へ軽めの始動 「いよいよという感じ」
description.content:
大相撲初場所（来年１月９日初日・両国国技館）で史上３人目の６連覇を目指す横綱白鵬が番付発表から一夜明けた２２日、東京都墨田区の宮城野部屋で軽めのけいこを行った。四股やてっぽうを繰り返して「いよいよという感じ。いい汗をかけた」と話した。先場所は双葉山の６９連勝に次ぐ６３連勝を樹立。史上最多の年間８６勝（４敗）も２年連続で達成する大活躍で、場所後はイベントに引っ張りだこだった。

description.hltext_display: 海协会会长陈云林一行今离台返京
description.content:
2010年12月22日13:50 来源：人民网-台湾频道
【字号 大 中 小】
E-mail推荐:
海协会会长陈云林率协商代表团搭乘今天下午1时40分的班机离台返京。（摄影：孙立极）
人民网台北12月22日电 （记者孙立极、王平）海协会会长陈云林率协商代表团搭乘今天下午1时40分的班机离台返京，结束了为期3天的台湾之行。在台湾海基会为代表团举行的欢送仪式上，陈云林表示，将继续努力为两岸同胞谋福祉。
陈云林说，此行是带着希望与期待而来，带着成果而归。能为两岸和平发展续写新的历史，他感到非常高兴；能为两岸同胞身体健康、生命安全做出自己的努力，则感到欣慰。
今天上午，陈云林参观了2010年台北花卉博览会。欢送仪式上，他表示，通过花博，他看到台北越来越美丽，越来越充满活力。他感谢台北、感谢台湾2300万父老乡亲。他说，两会商谈依然有许多重要课题，前进道路上还会有一些困难，但相信有他们的理解和支持，任何阻碍只能暂缓进程，永远改变不了两岸和平发展的大趋势。
海基会董事长江丙坤致辞时评价此次签署的两岸医药卫生合作协议，是从人道关怀角度出发，以人的健康福祉为依归。他说，两会的努力就是要让两岸同胞同享成果，让两岸同胞安居乐业。他解释，“安居”就是两岸和平，“乐业”就是经济繁荣。他表示，要在两会建构的平台上，继续推动两岸平等协商、循序渐进、搁置争议、追求双赢，为两岸和平继续努力。

description.hltext_display: Es albergue refugio para desamparados
description.author: Sheila Arias
description.content:
Ana María espera en el albergue, junto a sus nietos, a que sane su hijo.
Fotografía: Noroeste / Daniel Santana.
MAZATLÁN._En estas fiestas decembrinas, el albergue del Hospital General resulta el mejor refugio para la familias en desamparo.
Aquí, en este refugio, Ana María Ramírez y sus nietos de 2 y 6 años son parte de los beneficiados. Ya cumplieron 15 días y ella se quedará hasta recibir noticias de su hijo, quien se recupera de una lesión en una pierna; paga 30 pesos por albergue y comida para los tres.
Originaria de la Isla del Bosque, Escuinapa, Ana María aquí espera noticias de su hijo Luis Alberto, de 22 años, internado por una lesión que se complicó en los últimos días. Y a falta de recursos para pagar hotel y restaurante, ella prácticamente vive en este lugar.
"La verdad estamos muy agradecidos. Si no estuviera este albergue nos dormiríamos en la calle y con 30 pesos diarios apenas tendríamos una comida", dice. Ana María, de 45 años. Comparte su cama con los nietos, los hijos de Luis Antonio; los pequeños también esperan noticias.
El Albergue del Hospital General está abierto las 24 horas, todo el año, aquí los familiares de pacientes internados pueden pasar de horas a días mientras sus parientes se recuperan. La comida y el refugio cuestan 30 pesos por persona, al día.
Maribel, la responsable, asegura que entre tantas historias tristes, también los familiares que esperan le trasmiten esperanza y la fe en la mejoría de sus parientes.
"Hay un caso de una señora que se está quedando aquí, tiene un bebé que lo operaron de la columna y está delicado. Es un niño muy chiquito, historias como esas a veces nos ponen tristes, pero lo mejor que podemos hacer es ayudar a esta gente", dijo.
Para acceder a este apoyo, los interesados pueden acudir a Trabajo Social, ahí realizan los trámites para entrar al albergue y esperar el tiempo que sea necesario, todo a cambio de los 30 pesos diarios.
En el Albergue del Hospital hay espacio para hombres y mujeres, por aquí pasan familias foráneas cuando los accidentes los sorprenden en el camino. En estas fiestas decembrinas resulta el mejor refugio para los desamparados.

description.hltext_display: Cartel suspected in mass kidnapping
description.content:
Relevant offers Americas Armed men kidnapped about 50 Central American migrants in southern Mexico after holding up the cargo train they were riding on, El Salvador's foreign ministry said.
A local priest who runs a shelter for migrants said witnesses reported that women and children were among those abducted on the night of December 16, and not seen since.
"Witnesses said that the subjects climbed up on the wagons, struck the migrants with machetes and took their belongings," El Salvador's foreign ministry said in a statement. "Afterwards they took away all the women travelling on the train."
In August, hitmen believed to be from the brutal Zetas drug gang kidnapped and killed 72 migrants at a ranch near the US border. The victims were blindfolded and bound before being lined up against a wall and gunned down, authorities said.
Priest Alejandro Solalinde, who runs the "Hermanos en el Camino" (Brothers on the Way) shelter in the town of Ixtepec in the southern state of Oaxaca, said he suspected the Zetas were behind the latest abduction as well.
Solalinde said 17 people who had also been travelling on the northbound train arrived at the hostel on December 17 and said the migrants were abducted in Chahuites, about 300 km from the border with Guatemala.
"Fourteen witnesses stayed in the shelter, and yesterday and the day before someone came to ask that they be handed over to the Zetas," he said. Authorities had since removed the witnesses to a safe location, he said.
'NO EVIDENCE'
El Salvador's foreign ministry said it condemned acts of aggression against migrants traveling through Mexico to the United States.
"The foreign ministry demands that the Mexican government investigate this," the ministry said in a statement.
But Mexico's interior ministry said it had found no evidence backing claims of the disappearance.
The nationality of those kidnapped was not immediately clear, although Solalinde said they included one woman from Honduras and three women from Nicaragua. Honduras has also asked Mexico for information about the case.
Some migrants pay as much as US$10,000 (NZ$13,450) to smugglers who promise to get them into the United States. Many others see their journeys end in robbery, assault or arrest. Women often report rapes during the voyage, and some have been forced into prostitution.
Corrupt Mexican police are often accused of playing a role, turning illegal migrants over to drug gangs for a price.
Countless Latin American migrants journey some 3,000 km through Mexico hoping for a better life in the United States, some clinging to the top of cargo trains or hiding in secret compartments built into tractor trailers. Next Americas story: World Homepage

description.hltext_display: New and improved Dawson Bridge reopens
description.content:
Edmontonians commuting across the Saskatchewan River will be seeing less congestion this week as the Dawson Bridge officially re-opened to traffic Monday morning.
The blue bridge across the North Saskatchewan River in Riverdale, one of the oldest spans in Edmonton, has been closed for almost a year for a $22-million renovation.
"It was really in need of some major repairs," says Laura McNabb with the City of Edmonton. "There are about 16,000 vehicles that cross the Dawson Bridge every day. The re-opening will definitely take some traffic pressure off of the other downtown crossings."
The last major upgrades to the bridge, Edmonton's least-used river crossing, were in 1986.
The costly renovations are expected to extend the bridge's lifespan by another 50 years, says McNabb.
"The old bridge was used for coal transport, so it had a one lane for coal vehicles and one for horse-drawn carriages," says McNabb. "By renovating, we've also improved it's safety and efficiency."
The additions includes the installation of a new lightweight deck, and the replacement of old-style rivets with modern high-strength bolts. Crews also repaired worn truss components, and built a new widened wooden sidewalk.
"We even repainted the bridge. It's a gorgeous bright blue now and it looks terrific," says McNabb.
Construction was originally scheduled to be completed by early December, but plans were modified when unexpected extra work was discovered, says McNabb.
"We always knew it would be some time in December, so we're still certainly on schedule." explains McNabb.
Renovations to the bridge, originally built in 1912, are mostly finished but McNabb says the sidewalk will stay closed until January, and paving on the Rowland Road approaches will be completed in the spring.
Almost all of Edmonton's bridges over the North Saskatchewan have now been upgraded since the High Level Bridge was overhauled 15 years ago.
The city plans to replace the Walterdale Bridge next, probably in 2013-14.
Improvements to the Groat Bridge will follow, says McNabb.

description.hltext_display: 訪日外国人は７９６万３千人 年間１千万人の達成不可能に
Huge Korea drill likely to infuriate
description.content:
Reuters GEARING UP: South Korean marines carry boxes at a port on Yeonpyeong island. Relevant offers Asia South Korea announced land and sea military exercises including its largest-ever live-fire drill near North Korea in a big show of force just as tension on the peninsula was easing after Pyongyang's attack on a southern island.
The land drill, involving artillery, fighter jets and the largest number of personnel in a peace-time exercise, will take place tomorrow, after the South's live-fire artillery exercise on Monday on the island of Yeonpyeong, and is bound to infuriate the North.
South Korea is also holding three days of live-firing drills off the peninsula's east coast starting on Wednesday, a media official at the Defense Ministry said.
He would not provide details. Yonhap news agency said the drills were taking place 100 km south of the maritime border with North Korea and involved at least six naval boats.
North Korea this week offered to re-admit UN inspectors concerned about its nuclear-weapon program, leading to speculation of a resumption of six-party disarmament talks and a general sigh of relief around the world that the crisis had passed.
"Yes, it will be a show of force against that," an army officer said when asked if the shelling of Yeonpyeong island last month was a factor in the land drill's planning.
He said similar drills had been staged previously on more than 50 occasions, but the scale this time was unprecedented.
"The scale of mechanised assets taking place is enormous. When we would normally have 6 K-9 mechanized artillery, we'll have 36. We'll have the F-15 jets firing. We'll have choppers. You can say most of the mechanized assets taking part will be firing live ammunition."
It will take place in Pocheon region, less than 50 km north of downtown Seoul.
The latest crisis peaked when North Korea shelled Yeonpyeong, just south of the disputed maritime border, killing four people - including two civilians - in the worst attack on South Korean territory since the end of the civil war in 1953.
The South carried out live-fire drills on Yeonpyeong on Monday, which provoked only a verbal reaction from the North.
It had vowed to strike back if the South went ahead with the drills, prompting fears of all-out war.
China, North Korea's only major ally, has urged dialogue to resolve the crisis and urged the North to follow through on its offer to allow UN inspectors into the country.
The Chinese Foreign Ministry had no immediate comment on the planned drill. FAMILY RULE
Analysts say the North is unlikely to undertake another act of aggression like this year's attack on South Korea's Cheonan warship, blamed on the North by the United States and the South, and the Yeonpyeong shelling, at least in the near term.
Its most likely next move would be to conduct live-fire artillery drills or possibly a short-range missile test into its waters off the west coast.
Analysts have said its recent militaristic acts have served to bolster family rule as ailing leader Kim Jong-il grooms his youngest son, Kim Jong-un, as his successor.
"North Korea likes to step toward the brink and then away from it again," said Brian Myers, an expert on North Korea at South Korea's Dongseo University.
"The news from Pyongyang in the past few days indicates that the Kim Jong-il regime is now in the backing-off part of its usual cycle."
He said the North probably did not expect the South to carry through with live-fire exercises on Monday.
"If it had, it would not have made such loud threats of reprisal in its domestic media. After the exercises took place, the Kim regime had to tell its own people that the South's 'provocation' was not worth responding to, a flip-flop it cannot afford to repeat in just a few days. I don't expect the North to be quite as vocal about the next round of exercises."
Finance Minister Yoon Jeung-hyun, speaking before the announcement of the drill, said domestic financial markets had weathered the crisis and the South Korean economy, Asia's fourth-largest, stayed on a growth track.
But he warned that the tension could still dent consumer spending with a key sentiment measure due on Friday.
The won edged down slightly while stocks and bonds were stable as traders shrugged off the North Korea risk.
Traders said earlier that the currency was generally being affected more by concern over the euro zone.
Consumers and businesses in South Korea say they have lived with tension on the divided peninsula for decades and markets do not always react although the recent crisis had rattled global markets and remained an underlying risk.
Next Asia story: World Homepage

description.hltext_display: Spanien darf mit dem Sparen anfangen
description.content:
Handelsblatt Top News heute, 07:14 HANDELSBLATT
Das hoch verschuldete Spanien hat auf dem Weg zur Sanierung des Staatshaushalts ein erstes kleines Etappenziel erreicht. Die Regierung von Ministerpräsident Zapatero brachte am Dienstagabend den Haushaltsplan für 2011 mit knapper Mehrheit durchs Parlament. Dieser sieht drastische Kürzungen bei den Ausgaben vor.
HB MADRID. Das spanische Parlament hat den Weg für drastische Sparmaßnahmen freigemacht. Mit knapper Mehrheit nahmen die Abgeordneten den Budgetentwurf der Regierung an, der eine deutliche Reduzierung der Staatsausgaben vorsieht. 177 Abgeordnete stimmten für das Sparpaket - einer mehr, als für die Verabschiedung nötig war. 171 Parlamentarier lehnten es ab.

description.hltext_display: 「春の訪れ早そう」気象庁 関東以西は寒い時期も
Esperan repunten ventas el viernes
description.author: Melissa Sánchez
description.content:
Clientes revisando la mercancía en el Tianguis de la Juárez.
Fotografía: Noroeste / Efraín López.
MAZATLÁN._Con un vasto conocimiento sobre el comportamiento de sus consumidores, los comerciantes de la Colonia Juárez no se alarman ni se desesperan porque las ventas no van tan bien como quisieran, pues de antemano saben que la mayoría de sus clientes acostumbran hacer las compras de última hora en época navideña.
Adaptados a la manera en que se dan los negocios en la Juárez, los mercaderes y tianguistas están a la espera de que las ventas se "disparen" el pleno 24 de diciembre, como ha pasado en años anteriores.
"Sí ha venido gente, se paran, ven y preguntan precios, pero todos sabemos que realmente la venta empieza el jueves y el viernes, sobre todo el viernes", señaló un Omar Díaz, quien tiene un puesto de juguetes.
Entre esas personas que se acercan a comparar precios y revisar la mercancía, más de alguna termina por adquirir un producto, lo que poco a poco les ha generado ganancias, dijo.
"Ahorita la gente lo que anda haciendo es viendo precios, comparando, para ese día que si se vende más o menos, donde ve precios accesibles, pues ahí van", agregó Lidia Díaz, otra tianguista.
Aparte de los juguetes, la ropa y los zapatos han sido de los más solicitados por los compradores, como las blusas, los pantalones, las botas y los bolsos, afirmaron varios comerciantes.
Sin embargo, los vendedores de carnes y verduras no están corriendo con la misma suerte que los tianguistas; para ellos, las ventas han sido casi nulas, debido a que las personas rara vez compran lo necesario para las cenas navideñas con tanta anticipación.
"Este año nada que ver. Ha habido gente, pero está muy lento. En la tarde es cuando viene más gente, pero andan viendo el tianguis, comprando ropa. Lo de la fruta y la verdura apenas el día 24, para la cena de Navidad", apuntó la propietaria de una frutería.
El tianguis de la Juárez, que tradicionalmente se establece los domingos en la plazuela de la colonia, ahora permanecerá activo durante toda la semana, para ser removido el sábado 25 de diciembre en la madrugada, lo que ha contribuido a aumentar el tráfico vehicular, ya de por sí denso, que reina entre las avenidas Enrique Pérez Arce y De las Américas.

description.hltext_display: Waste services collecting as normal
description.content:
WASTE and recycling crews are collecting as normal apart from inaccessible smaller streets suffering from the adverse weather.
Extra salt has been delivered to the borough by Hertfordshire County Council, which is responsible for road gritting.
Council-owned car parks have been gritted and officers have been spreading salt in the main shopping areas in Borehamwood.
The footways in the main parks are also being cleared by contractors and ice is being broken on the lakes as a safety measure to prevent people from attempting to walk across it.
Councillor Jean Heywood, environment portfolio holder, said: "We have been working hard to minimise any disruption to our waste and recycling collection services and our crews have been out as normal this week, and will continue to do so providing there is not a severe deterioration in the weather.
"Obviously there are a few streets here and there that we have not been able to access first time, but we will try again where it is safe to do so and thank residents for their patience. Some bin lids are also frozen, but generally everything is running well.
"Our crews are out in all weathers and we have had calls from the public supporting us, saying they are surprised we have even attempted it in this poor weather, so it is nice to be appreciated and we always try to provide a first class service."
Residents can check the council's website for all the latest information or call on 020 8207 2277.
If you need to speak to someone about gritting or highways issues you need to contact Hertfordshire County Council on 0300 123 4040 or visit www.hertsdirect.org

event_or_fact.property: We have been working hard to minimise any disruption to our waste and recycling collection services and our crews have been out as normal this week, and will continue to do so providing there is not a severe deterioration in the weather.

description.hltext_display: 12 Best Places to Work in 2010
description.content:
Click through for Glassdoor.com's 12 best tech places to work.
Topics: Workforce
Glassdoor.com, the site where employees anonymously post information about their companies, has released its 2010 Tech Industry Report Card, which lists the 12 top places to work in the tech industry.
Facebook came out on top of the heap with employees saying they were "very satisfied" and giving CEO Mark Zuckerberg a 96 percent approval rate. Zuckerberg was recently named Time Magazine's 2010 "Person of the Year."
According to MSNBC, Facebook wasn't even on the Best Places to Work list last year, and it must be noted that the employee satisfaction score was based on only 34 reviews and CEO rating on 50 reviews. It only considers companies with at least 25 reviews submitted. Glassdoor selects the top 50 companies overall based on employee surveys covering career opportunities, communication, compensation and benefits, employee morale, recognition and feedback, senior leadership, work/life balance, and fairness and respect.
Apple's Steven Jobs was the highest-rated tech executive with a 97 percent approval rate, followed by Zuckerberg and Google's Eric Schmidt at 96 percent. The site also noted an interesting trend: Citing the cases of HP, Yahoo and AOL, it found the approval rating of the successor tends to soar after a company replaces its CEO. That might not hold true much longer, though, after layoffs such as those at Yahoo.
This slideshow highlights the 12 highest ranked tech companies.
More Slideshows:

description.hltext_display: Microsoft Driver Updates - Are You in Search For Them?
description.content: Are you using a Microsoft driven computer system? And from some time you are facing troubles with it while experts suggested you to install . Each computer is crafted with to perform according to the specified ways. Drivers are type of software programs that enable the various computer components to execute together in a proper order. The hardware devices attached to your CPU only operates when a compatible and up to date driver is installed in the computer and can conveniently relay the commands from the CPU to them.A newly installed Windows driven computer system never face such problems when you plug in any new device is it automatically plays without exhibiting errors. This is all because Microsoft comes with built in driver programs that help the device to be recognized by the CPU. But as the time lapses you must install the newly released version of drivers for better computer functioning. New driver updation is also recommended because various devices work connectively with each other and the old ones are obsolete by the time. There are increasing numbers of complaints against Microsoft that they are not upgraded with up to date database of drivers. And for example if Windows XP is installed in your PC many of the hardware devices will not work automatically and in order to make them run you need to update the drivers for them.Therefore to avoid such problems, most hardware manufacturers frequently update their drivers or atleast once a year. As we all know that Microsoft is widely known and is among the best operating systems. So they must make a point to upgrade their driver versions from time to time. Beside this they must also take care of the rising errors and bugs in the drivers. Even new programs and software updates keep on getting introduced with time and so the hardware drivers must figure out the same to cope up with.If the attached hardware devices are not functioning then updating the drivers is of great importance. Therefore a question like whether you require the do not arise at all. The valid question is from where you can get the right driver update in a less time without confronting any hassle.In case you have ample of free time you can thoroughly check all the drivers installed in your PC and explore whether each one is updated with latest variant or not. Many computer users who can hardly spare time on driver updates opt for driver update tools that work on their behalf. This utility tool automatically scans your system and checks each and every driver for functionality and rectifies the old and outdated ones. Thus, the driver checking software renders you a system with high optimum performance and error free functioning.

description.hltext_display: Clickfire Makes Modern "Animagic" for Petsmart’s Holiday Card Campaign
description.content:
This holiday season pet lovers have an opportunity to immortalize their furry family members in an animated family portrait that stylistically nods to the classic animated holiday specials we all know and love.
Produced by New York-based interactive design studio ClickFire Media for agency Bernstein Rein, 'Holiday Pawtraits' puts a contemporary twist on the nostalgic hybrid "Animagic" style by placing the card's customizable, 3D-animated characters into handcrafted miniature model sets. Visitors to the site can customize up to three pets and five family members and choose from three backgrounds to create their photo-real holiday scene. "There are an infinite number of possibilities when it comes to designing a dog or a cat: coat length, color, the style of their spots," says creative director Nick Agderian. "Animal lovers are very adamant so we created a system of variables to approximate any breed - hybrid, purebred or mutt. You could spend no time engaging with the site or as much time as you want."
The production took place over an intensive two-and-a-half-month period that started with meticulous storyboarding of all the character variations. "There was no set process for compositing and matching 3D characters with filmed model scenes so we forged our own path," says producer Ephraim Kehlmann. "We combined 3D and Flash and compositing it back into video in Flash and rendered on the fly." Once complete, users can share their portraits via Facebook or email, rotate their scenes, activate mini-animations and hook up to Snapfish to order traditional photo prints. The animation's timeless quality also gives PetSmart the option to build and add to the characters for future iterations of the experience.
Bernstein-Rein Art Director Travis Kleiner notes, "'Holiday Pawtraits' is the perfect holiday e-card for PetSmart. Not just because it's customizable and shareable. But because it really celebrates the pet as a true member of the family, which every pet lover already believes anyway." Technical Details:
ClickFire artists created eight approximately-1,200 polygon models in Maya 3D from an illustrator's sketches, rigging and then animating each model, scaling the various adjustable human and animal attributes. Each of the models had to contain all possible permutations of its character - the single dog model, for example, contains information for leg, body, neck, head, ear, tail, mouth and tongue length, girth, size, type and position. ClickFire then exported each model as a COLLADA file from Maya to open-source Flash 3D graphics engine Away3D.
"There was no 'how-to' for any of this," noted Kehlmann. "We developed the entire process in house based upon a combination of experimentation and knowledge from previous projects. We wrote all the code that gives the end user the ability to adjust attributes from scratch, since Away3D only knows how to render the model information given to it. The great news is that the entire application and all of our corresponding programs are completely scalable, so we can improve next year with even more variations."
The studio also created a series of texture maps to ensure users would be able to create a likeness of their cat or dog, a fact complicated by the abundant variations in coat colors, patterns and lengths. The studio exported the basic texture maps (UV maps) from the original model, then created a series of basic skins or color patterns and overlaid layers that added hair patterns and spots that are dynamically placed by users within Flash. ClickFire shot the backgrounds rotating in stop motion, calculating the room's virtual center point in the Flash applications 3D space so the 3D models could be match moved within the 2D background image sequences. "At the end of the day, I believe this entire process is highly unusual for a website and unprecedented for a holiday e-card," stated Kehlmann. "It's more closely related to game development."
Credits:
Client: PetSmart
Title: Holiday Pawtraits
Launch Date: November 2010
Agency: Bernstein-Rein
Creative Director/Copywriter: Janel LaMonica
Art Director: Travis Kleiner
Executive Producer: Susan Neuman
Associate Producer: Darci Boling
Project Manager: Cassie Parker
Interactive Design Studio: ClickFire Media
Producer: Ephraim Kehlmann
Creative Director: Nick Agderian
Interactive Designer: Claudeland Louis
Lead Developer: Jason Tordsen
Flash Developer: Damion Murray
Server Side Developer: Matt Wilber
3D Artist: Jasmine Bobe
3D Texture Artist: Jane Kim
Model Maker: Peter Erickson
Illustrator: Justin Wolfson
Flame Artist: Liz Berndt

description.hltext_display: Se olvidan del vado, aseguran vecinos
description.author: Sheila Arias
description.content:
Lo único que hay en el vado de la Robles Quintero es un letrero del Ayuntamiento; los únicos que pueden atravesarlo son peatones, motociclistas o aquellos que andan en bicicleta.
Fotografía: Noroeste / Daniel Santana.
MAZATLÁN._ Ya faltan nueve días para que termine la administración Municipal y los vecinos del vado de la Robles Quintero están seguros que las autoridades olvidaron reparar esta calle. A cuatro meses de que las lluvias destruyeron la vía, los conductores han improvisado un camino.
La calle que une a las colonias Federico Velarde y Ramón F. Iturbe quedó destruida el pasado 6 de septiembre debido a las fuertes lluvias, y aunque el Ayuntamiento colocó letreros oficiales de obra, hasta el momento no se ha hecho nada por falta de presupuesto.
"Jorge Abel ya se va, no creo que se tome la molestia de arreglar aquí, esto lleva días. Al Gobierno le urge irse no arreglar calles", comentó una vecina de la zona.
El vado está destruido de un costado, el lugar se ha convertido en un tiradero de basura y por los desperdicios estancados hay mal olor.
"A veces sale agua con espuma y así dura días; no entiendo si esta es una calle principal por qué la dejaron caer así. Todo el día huele feo. El gobierno ya se va, ¿usted cree que les urge reparar aquí?", criticó un vecino de la calle Federico Velarde.
El vado de la Robles Quintero estuvo días con montones de tierra que impedían el paso vehicular y por momentos fue un peligro para los peatones. Hoy los conductores han improvisado el paso, pues abrieron camino para circular uno a uno; uno avanza y el de sentido contrario espera.
Desde hace cuatro meses, cuando el vado quedó destruido, los vecinos han exigido que las autoridades reparen esta vía. Sin embargo, no hay eco a sus exigencias, la calle sigue destruida, acusan.
El pasado 10 de diciembre el Gobierno Municipal informó que la reconstrucción del vado requiere una inversión de un millón 300 mil pesos, recursos que no hay en este momento, por ello pretendían economizar en otros proyectos para avanzar en esta calle. Aunque todo sigue igual.
"A veces sale agua con espuma y así dura días; no entiendo si esta es una calle principal por qué la dejaron caer así. Todo el día huele feo. El gobierno ya se va, ¿usted cree que les urge reparar aquí?"
Vecino de la calle Federico Velarde

description.hltext_display: Miami Dolphins Choose Christie Microtiles and Arsenal Media Immersive Multimedia Wall
description.content:
Cypress, Calif. – Miami Dolphins fans are the first in professional sports to literally get their hands on a unique, interactive-multimedia display, featuring Christie MicroTiles, now running on the club level of Sun Life Stadium.
The Dolphins Interactive Wall combines an irregular cluster of 41 Christie MicroTiles modular display tiles, live and packaged video feeds, touch sensors, text messaging applications and large format print graphics installed as a wide, seven-foot high video display wall that fans can watch and use.
Tuned to the team’s integrated sponsorship, media and in-stadium marketing plans, the multimedia display features four content zones that inform and entertain fans. Content includes interactive highlights from the team’s history, live game feeds, video replays and highlights, texting-based instant polls, photo galleries, and information about the team’s stadium services and community programs. Corporate sponsorships are designed directly into much of the Dolphins Interactive Wall’s content, making those brands part of the fan experience. Between on-demand Top Dolphins Moments, for example, viewers have fun wiping away virtual sea bubbles embedded with sponsor logos while dolphins swim in a virtual tank created by the Christie MicroTiles’ virtually seamless display blocks. (Clickhttp://db.tt/E0m0sMu to see a video of the Interactive Wall in action.)
First in Pro Sports:
The first of its kind in pro sports, the Dolphins Interactive Wall debuted Nov. 14 at the Dolphins-Tennessee Titans game.
The Dolphins Interactive Wall is a customized version of The BuzzWall, developed by Christie, recognized as one of the world’s most innovative visual display companies, and Montreal-based Arsenal Media, recognized worldwide as a leader in digital media for unique applications.
“The Dolphins view the new wall as ‘transformational technology’ that’s helping raise the standard of the team’s in-stadium experience,” says Tery Howard, senior vice president and chief technology officer, Miami Dolphins. “The wall also introduces new incremental marketing opportunities for the Dolphins’ corporate sponsors, enabling them to build affinities with fans through content that’s dynamic, fun, timely and contextually relevant.
“Technology really provides us with the flexibility to have Sun Life Stadium take on the personality of the event and tailor it to that particular experience,” continues Howard. “Elements like The BuzzWall are a great example of how fans can come into this stadium for a University of Miami (UM) game and see it very well branded as UM, and the next day, we can have a Miami Dolphins game and easily change the branding. Offering a fully integrated experience is extremely important to our tenants, our marketing partners, guests and us. This is why technology such as Christie MicroTiles appeals so much to us.”
Arsenal Integrated, the multimedia R&D wing of Arsenal Media, is a creative production and strategy firm. Part of Christie’s lead creative team, the marketing and engineering groups of both companies planned and executed the global product launch of Christie MicroTiles in late 2009.
Fans Drawn to Wall :
“The reaction from fans has been very positive, and we’re seeing people not only drawn to the wall, but staying to play with it,” says Denys Lavigne, president of Arsenal Media. “The wall shows what’s really possible with digital signage – an application that’s completely targeted to the space, and its business and revenue opportunities. This is not something people just happen to notice and watch. It’s more intimate. The wall creates a relationship and a buzz that works for the fans, the team and its corporate sponsors.”
“What has excited me the most is how the wall speaks to all ages,” says Howard. “There is so much of a footprint on this wall you can attract all ages. We didn’t originally target the content at kids, but they were all over it. As a result of that, you would have the parents there as well, and they’re consuming other content at the same time. It’s a multi-tasked offering that speaks to different demographics and age groups.”
Another Montreal company, Float4 Interactive, using sensors and software to create interactions a step beyond conventional touch applications, developed the BuzzWall’s immersive touch capabilities. txtstation Global Mobile Marketing, of Austin, Texas, provides the wall with real-time fan polling capabilities, activated by simple text messaging.
Dolphins Known for Tech Innovation:
The Dolphins Interactive Wall is the latest innovation for one of pro sports most tech-savvy franchises. The stadium has one of the largest hi-definition video boards, and one of the longest LED ribbon displays in all of pro sports. The Dolphins were the first sports team to deploy virtual videoconferencing, and have more than 1,500 HD displays operating around the facility, showing supplemental information for fans and digital versions of menus in the concession areas. The team also uses and markets a wireless handheld game-day TV service called FanVision.
“The launch of the Dolphins Interactive Wall was something of a first birthday celebration for Christie MicroTiles, and we can’t imagine a more powerful demonstration of what’s possible with this new display technology,” says Kathryn Cress, vice president corporate & global marketing, Christie. “The Dolphins have demonstrated a lot of vision in going well beyond the pure ‘Wow’ factor of the tiles, and exploring the business benefits, which are numerous.”

description.hltext_display: Rajadas de vento até aos 100 Km/h activam aviso amarelo na Madeira
description.content:
O Instituto de Meteorologia (IM) ativou hoje o aviso amarelo no arquipélago da Madeira, o menos grave numa escala de três, devido às previsões de vento forte, com rajadas que poderão atingir os 100 Km/h.
De acordo com a informação que estava hoje disponibilizada no site do IM, cerca das 07:30, o aviso amarelo deverá permanecer ativo até às 15:00 de hoje.
Para o dia de hoje, as previsões meteorológicas na Madeira apontam para a existência de períodos de céu muito nublado, com ocorrência de aguaceiros fracos, em especial nas terras altas, cuja frequência deverá diminuir durante a tarde.
O vento soprará moderado a forte (30 a 45 km/h) de noroeste, com rajadas até aos 90 km/h, soprando temporariamente forte a muito forte (45 a 60 km/h), até ao início da manhã, altura em que as rajadas serão na ordem dos 100 km/h. A partir do meio da tarde assistir-se-á à diminuição gradual da intensidade do vento, que passará a ser moderado (15 a 25 km/h).
Na região do Funchal, por sua vez, o céu apresentar-se-á muito nublado e com o vento a ser geralmente fraco (inferior a 20 km/h) do quadrante oeste.
O estado do mar caracterizar-se-á pela agitação marítima intensa - o segundo motivo pelo qual o aviso amarelo está ativado, além do vento forte -, com a costa norte a ter ondas de noroeste com quatro a cinco metros, que subirão até aos seis metros de altura no início da tarde. Na costa sul, as ondas serão de oeste com 3,5 a 4,5 metros, passando depois a ondas de sudoeste.
No território continental, apenas os distritos de Beja e Faro apresentam aviso amarelo, devido à agitação marítima que se fará sentir. Nos restantes pontos do país, o IM não ativou qualquer aviso.
De acordo com o IM, o céu estará hoje muito nublado, apresentando algumas abertas a partir da tarde, em especial na região sul. Os aguaceiros irão diminuir gradualmente de frequência e a queda de neve ocorrerá acima dos 1200/1400 metros, a partir do início da noite.
O vento será fraco a moderado (10 a 30 km/h) do quadrante sul, soprando temporariamente moderado a forte (30 a 40 km/h) no litoral, a sul do Cabo de Sines, até ao final da manhã, e rodando para noroeste a partir do final da tarde. Nessa altura tornar-se-á forte a muito forte (40 a 60 km/h)nas regiões do litoral, com rajadas na ordem dos 90 km/h.
Nas terras altas, o vento será moderado a forte (30 a 50 km/h) de sudoeste, com rajadas na ordem dos 90 km/h, as quais enfraquecerão durante a tarde, e rodando para noroeste a partir do início da noite.
Quanto ao estado do mar, na costa ocidental a norte do Cabo de Sines as ondas serão de sudoeste com dois a três metros, tornando-se depois em ondas de noroeste com quatro a 5,5 metros no final do dia. A sul desse ponto as ondas de sudoeste terão três a 4,5 metros de altura, tornando-se em ondas de noroeste com quatro a cinco metros, no final do dia. Por fim, na costa sul, existirão ondas de sudoeste com três a 4,5 metros.
Entretanto, a barra de Faro está já condicionada, segundo o site oficial da Marinha portuguesa.
Relativamente às temperaturas máximas previstas para hoje, o Porto deverá registar 14 graus Celsius, Lisboa e Ponta Delgada 16º, Faro 17º e Funchal 19º.
*** Este texto foi escrito ao abrigo do novo Acordo Ortográfico ***

description.hltext_display: Calcinado en Sestao un vehículo que constaba como sustraído
description.content: BILBAO. Un vehículo que constaba como sustraído resultó calcinado este martes por la noche y las llamas afectaron también a otros tres vehículos que estaban estacionados en la zona, según han confirmado fuentes de la Ertzaintza a Europa Press. Los hechos ocurrieron sobre las diez de la noche en la calle Marcos Grijalbo cuando se informó del incendio de un Opel Vectra estacionado en esa vía. El coche figuraba como sustraído y había sido utilizado por delincuentes habituales. Como consecuencia del incendio, otros tres vehículos que estaban estacionados en la calle sufrieron diversos daños, causados por el efecto de las llamas.

description.hltext_display: Battle Over the Ability to Shop and Compare in the Travel Marketplace
description.author: Thomas Steinmetz
description.content:
American Airlines law suit
Business Travel Coalition (BTC) today commented on the implications of the ruling handed down in Chicago today by Judge Martin Agran in Travelport, LP v. American Airlines, Inc. The Circuit Court of Cook County, in Case No. 10 CH 48028, decided in favor of American Airlines. While the outcome unfavorably impacts Orbitz customers and Orbitz For Business corporate clients, by reducing fare searching, booking and servicing efficiencies, travel professionals the world over have recognized that this lawsuit represents merely the opening skirmish in the larger battle for the future of the open marketplace for travel.
“The stakes in this conflict are clear: either an improved airline industry and distribution marketplace centered around the consumer, or one that subordinates consumer interests to the self-serving motivations of individual airlines endeavoring to impose their wills on consumers and the other participants in the travel industry,” stated BTC Chairman Kevin Mitchell. “Single-supplier direct connect proposals, like the one advanced by American Airlines, can cause massive fragmentation of airfares and ancillary fees depriving consumers of the ability to compare the total cost of air travel options across all airlines.”
According to BTC, the industry and public policy debate over American Airlines’ Direct Connect plans has been raging for the past year moving clearly to the consumer forefront with American Airlines’ unprovoked assault on Orbitz. Over the course of that debate, American Airlines has repeatedly changed its rationale for why Direct Connect is needed, arguing at various times that it is about cost containment, product customization and technological innovations, among other reasons. The failure of these shifting explanations to convince airline industry stakeholders to embrace the unproven system then led to a new strategy from American Airlines of blunt threats aimed at Orbitz.
Mitchell points out, “When an airline must constantly change its rationale for implementing a program, or in the case of Orbitz, resorts to threats to gain acceptance of a new business model, it vividly demonstrates that there is in fact no unmet market need requiring a solution. Whether in North America or Europe, what American Airlines is selling, nobody in the downstream distribution chain, to BTC’s knowledge, is saying they want.”
Interim results from a currently open BTC survey of corporate travel managers point to an overwhelming rejection of American Airlines’ attempts to change the distribution system model to its unique advantage while driving corporate travel departments’ costs up and undermining their ability to adequately service their travelers.
• 94% of surveyed travel managers indicate access to all airfare and ancillary fee information is either indispensably important or very important for their corporate managed travel programs.
• 87% believe that in advocating its Direct Connect strategy American Airlines is endeavoring to secure higher fares-paid by undermining the independent travel distribution system and corporate managed travel programs and by driving more consumers to aa.com where comparison-shopping, expert advice and corporate travel policies are non-existent.
• 88% of travel managers who oppose American Airlines’ Direct Connect believe that the program will result in fragmentation of airfares and fees and that without access to all air travel options travelers will pay higher prices.
• 98% do not support American Airlines’ Direct Connect strategy.
NOTE: Travel industry professionals can participate in the survey at http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/direct_connect through the end of December. Survey results and analysis will be published in early January.
Founded in 1994, Business Travel Coalition empowers corporate travel managers to influence issues of strategic importance to their organizations.

description.hltext_display: Alice Joy Reid
description.content:
Services for , 82, of Lamesa, were held on Wednesday, December 22, 2010, at 2:00 p.m., in the Lamesa Church of Christ with Pastor Mark Hackett officiating.
Burial followed in Lamesa Memorial Park under the direction of Branon Funeral Home.
Visitation was held at Branon Funeral Home, from 6 to 8 p.m., on Tuesday, December 21, 2010.
Mrs. Reid passed away on Monday, December 20, 2010 in Lamesa, Texas.
Alice Joy Barron was born on November 19, 1928 in Lamesa, Texas where she remained a lifelong resident. The first of five children born to Spencer and Earnestine Barron of Lamesa, Alice was raised on the family farm south of Lamesa and attended grade school in the Liberty Community. She graduated high school in 1945 from Lamesa High School. She attended and graduated from Texas Tech College in 1949 with a Bachelor’s degree in Speech.
It was in college that she met Bill R. Reid of Goodnight, Texas and later married on September 27, 1952. They raised three sons and a daughter in Dawson County on their family farm east of the Midway Community. Early in her marriage, Alice was a homemaker and a driving influence in her children’s and husband’s activities.
Alice was an active part of Texas Farm Bureau, coordinating queen contests and youth talent competitions on both the local and state level. A devout Christian and member of the Church of Christ of Lamesa, she was a Sunday School teacher, Girl Scout Leader, member of the Lamesa Study Club, and an active 4-H Adult Leader receiving the 4-H Silver Spur Award for her leadership efforts.
Alice pursued her passion and began a career as an English teacher at Lamesa High School in 1978. Receiving great fulfillment from her profession, Alice gave many long hours to teaching and touched many lives for the better along the way. Alice retired from teaching in 1999 after 21 years.
Alice is preceded in death by her husband, Bill; a son, Spencer; her parents; and one brother, Burl Barron.
She is survived by her children, Cody Reid and wife, Karen, of Omaha, Nebraska, Katrina Dorris and husband, Richard, of San Angelo, Randy Reid and wife, Anna, of Loop, and daughter in-law, Royce Reid of Austin, Texas. Surviving are two brothers, Carrol Barron of Fremont, Ohio, and Jimmy Don Barron and wife, Kayron, of Brownfield, a sister, Ruby Dutton and husband, Claude, of Abilene, and two sister in-laws, Mary Barron of Denver City and LaNelle White of Borger. Also surviving are six grandchildren, Hayden Reid and wife, Jennifer, Taylor Reid and wife, Samantha, granddaughter Ryan Reid, and Duncan Reid, all of Austin, Chance Dorris of San Angelo, Austin Reid of Omaha, Nebraska, and one great-granddaughter Blake Emily Reid of Austin. Alice also leaves behind among her many friends, lifelong and dear friend Pat Davis of Lamesa.
The family suggests that memorials be made to a favorite charity. They also would like to thank all the caregivers, friends and family who so faithfully visited and stayed with her during her illness.

description.hltext_display: Südkorea kündigt neue Militärübung an
description.content:
Im Konflikt zwischen den beiden koreanischen Staaten lässt der Süden erneut die Muskeln spielen. Unweit der Landesgrenze startet Südkorea eine großangelete Schießübung mit Kampfjets, Panzern und Hunderten Soldaten.
HB SEOUL. Drei Tage nach Militärübungen nahe der umstrittenen innekoreanischen Seegrenze hat Südkorea eine großangelegte Schießübung unweit der Landesgrenze zu Nordkorea angekündigt. Die eintägige Übung von Heeres- und Luftwaffeneinheiten soll an diesem Donnerstag in Pochon stattfinden, das nur etwa 20 Kilometer südlich der Grenze liegt.

description.hltext_display: Disminuye flujo de paisanos
description.author: Dantiela Mendoza
description.content:
El número de vehículos provenientes de Estados Unidos ha disminuido; se prevé que lleguen más después de Navidad.
Fotografía: Noroeste/ Daniel Santana.
MAZATLÁN._ Ante la cercanía de las fiestas de Noche Buena y Navidad, el flujo de paisanos ha disminuido en los últimos días; cada vez es menor la cantidad de vehículos extranjeros que se ven circular por la Carretera Internacional México 15.
Esta es la principal vía de tránsito para los mexicanos oriundos de Nayarit, Jalisco, Michoacán y Guerrero, que regresan de los estados de California, Colorado y la franja fronteriza de Baja California y Sonora a pasar las fiestas navideñas con su familia.
"Desde que inició el mes y hasta el fin de semana pasado se veían las caravanas todo el día, pero a partir de ahora (martes) ya se ven pocos paisanos", comentó Janeth Tostado, jefa de servicios al cliente de la Gasolinera El Venadillo.
Con una experiencia de cuatro años en el puesto, comentó que a medida que se acerca la Navidad será menor el flujo y después de la Navidad hay otro pequeño repunte, en vistas a las fiestas de Año Nuevo.
Dicha estación de servicios es una parada estratégica en Mazatlán para quienes vienen del norte, porque además de abastecer de combustible sus vehículos, pueden descansar, alimentarse, ir al baño y comprar víveres, por la seguridad que ofrece a los viajeros.
José Agustín, un paisano originario de Acapulco, destacó que a pesar de los rumores sobre inseguridad en su trayecto de California hasta Sinaloa ha recibido buen trato de parte de las autoridades, así como de los prestadores de servicios y ambiente seguro.
"No hemos encontrado ningún contratiempo en el camino desde Tijuana, gracias a Dios, vamos bien y esperamos llegar así a nuestra casa, ni hemos visto, ni hemos oído nada sobre problemas de inseguridad o violencia", afirmó el acapulqueño.
Esta misma buena fortuna les tocó vivir a la Familia Montoya, originarios de Nayarit, quienes antes de hacer el viaje tenían algo de temor al pensar que Sinaloa es paso obligado para llegar a su casa.
"Uno oye muchas cosas y en las noticias se dicen hechos que hacen a uno temer volver a casa, pero con la bendición de Dios nos aventamos y aquí estamos, nos ha ido bien y hoy (ayer) mismo llegaremos para estar a tiempo para la Navidad con la familia", expresó el jefe de la familia.
Las fiestas navideñas y de fin de año son las fechas en que las carreteras de México mayor flujo hacia el sur de mexicanos radicados en Estados Unidos y la franja fronteriza por motivos de trabajo.

description.hltext_display: 青春期撞上更年期 剧情
description.content:
由金牌制片人刘毛毛联手著名导演庞好倾力打造，由杜淳、马伊?、董璇、曹炳琨等实力明星主演的电视剧《青春期撞上更年期》，12月14日在石家庄电视台一经播出，立即走红荧屏，热度迅速飙升。
▲海报
剧中演绎情侣的杜淳与董璇两人，认识十年却是首度合作，董璇称可能还是两人的主攻方向不同造成的：“他拍了那么多红色经典，我以前主要是拍古装剧，所以我们每次见面都说要一起拍戏，但总没成。”这次合作拍摄《青春期撞上更年期》并饰演情侣，董璇也称真的是“缘分到了”。
该剧除了演绎一出“青春期”所代表的年轻人感情纠葛之外，“更年期”所代表的父辈族群对于他们感情的干涉，成为了该剧的一大看点，两代人在处理事情的方式上有所分歧，年轻人捍卫自己爱情而与家长包办婚姻抗争，造成两代人情感的冲撞，更有复杂的三角恋情。相信随着该剧的热播，人们对于情感的认识和处理感情问题的方式，也会在剧中找到自己相应的答案。

description.hltext_display: Real Life: A Christmas like no other for us
description.content:
Gramma arrived last Friday. We were all at the airport to greet her.
While her hip was killing her and she was a little dishevelled after a long travel day, the smile on her face said it all before she said a word.
"I'm so happy to be here," she said.
And we're so happy to have her.
Tamara was the first to experience the trickle-down effect of gramma's visit. Some of the world's great waterfalls can be found in our house these days.
I warned the boys that they might see gramma cry a few times during her visit. But that didn't help Jaden the first time it happened in front of him.
It was during her 77th birthday party on Sunday. I looked up from my plate and there she was – gone. (It's an old family saying.)
Mom returned from the bathroom a few minutes later, but there was no stopping the flood this time. She apologized to Tam's parents and her sister Brianne, but it wasn't necessary. They knew that, and I think she did, too.
Then Jaden was gone. I found him on my bed, sobbing.
"It's OK, buddy," I said. "It's OK for gramma to cry. She just misses grandpa."
"I do, too," he cried.
Literally. The tears ran down his cheeks.
Now it was my turn.
Our vacation with gramma and grandpa back home in August was spectacular. We had so much fun. I had bonded with my dad years ago. We had buried the hatchet, so to speak.
"Scott," he said to me after one story-telling debacle around the firepit. "You're one crazy SOB."
I took it as a compliment. I know that's how he meant it. We aren't identical, but there are so many similarities. The older I get, the more I recognize them.
August was Sean and Jaden's opportunity to embrace the Haskins side of the family. They did.
Thankfully, Tamara knows how to use a camera ... and I'm told there's even a video aspect that can be quite useful.
It's special indeed to see Sean and Jaden and grandpa hard at it, tying – or at least trying – a knot.
"Pay no attention to anything your father might have said to you," my father says.
I should be insulted, but I'm not. I find it wonderful, beautiful.
We can't help with the hole in my mom's life when she goes home early next month. There will be some lonely times.
But we can help with the hole in her heart.
It has to be reassuring to her to know that she is not alone.
It is one of the many things that makes Tamara special.
There is no jealousy and no concern about having to share. It has been said that a son is a son until he takes a wife, but that isn't the case in this case.
I will kick her posterior in cribbage every chance I get. Because I'm a much better player.
Mom and I used to play for $2 a game. Now we play for $5 a game, because that's what's what dad would do.
Christmas Eve at the Bilyk household is going to be tough. Let's not try to pretend otherwise. There will be something, someone, missing.
But if there's one thing I know about this family, it's that my mom will be made to feel welcome. That's all they can do. That's all anyone can do.
Tamara, bless her heart, has made her feel welcome. Turning a spare room into "her room" was indeed a labour of love.
The toughest day is going to be Jan. 2. That's the day my dad would have turned 78. I might want to keep Jaden away from her on that day.
From the Haskins/Bilyk family to yours, here's wishing you a very Merry Christmas.
