Services: Strathclyde Associates Trading & Management Construction Company
description.content:
The services we provide to our customers are supply of high end construction management personnel with relevant language skills i.e. Thai, Korean and Malay. The services we provide to our customers are supply of high end construction management personnel with relevant language skills i.e. Thai, Korean and Malay. Some examples of personnel we supply are: CAD Drafter , Construction Estimator, Field Safety Professional, Inspector , Certified Welding Inspector (CWI), Construction Roadway Inspector , Construction Inspector, HVAC Field Supervisor, Project Manager/Superintendents (USACE), Construction Quality Control - USACE CQM, Senior Project Engineer, Glass Construction Manager - VP Level, Mechanical Construction Project Engineer, Waste Water Treatment Project Manager, Construction Materials Tester, Sr. Mechanical Designer, Provides consulting services in the following areas: MANAGEMENT & OPERATIONS CONSULTING: Organizational Structure Review, Competitive Strength Determination, Individual Performance, Setting the Right Goals, Determining Proper Metrics, Avoiding Unintended Consequences
CONSTRUCTION CONSULTING: Program Management, Construction Management, Project Management, Cost Management, Time Management , Quality Management, Contract Administration, Safety Management, Construction Claims Support, Construction Defect Investigations, Water and Mold Investigations, Insurance Claims, Construction Accidents, Expert Witness Testimony , Construction Monitoring and Inspections, Plan Review (Constructability and Risk), ADA Compliance (Existing and New) , Material Selection Review
CLAIMS MITIGATION CONSULTING: Review & Analysis of Drawings & Specifications, Review & Analysis of Construction & Delivery Schedules, Early Stage RFI process Review, Pre-Construction Stakeholder Sessions, Conflict Resolution Procedure Review & Establishment, and Change Order Procedure Review & Establishment We are very involved in clean room IT factories in Thailand and particularly the new Songdo International City near Seoul in Korea.
Strathclyde Associates Trading and Management Construction Company is passionate in the belief that from adversity comes opportunity. We believe that sustainable competitive advantage is always predicated upon the focused execution of a few core strengths or priniciples that are indemic to each particular company.
Challenging economic times provide the opportunity for companies to take the steps necessary to becoming more successful, to get leaner and more focused. Those actions taken today to make a company more successful also provide the needed framework for eventual transition of the business.
We help companies find those core strengths and take those steps now.
As mentioned our two main areas of expertise are construction materials and management personnel. In both these fields, there are some bad reputations in the area of fraud and fraudulant transactions. There are many scams and in the field of personnel, many scammers. We are proud of our reputation of checking and verifying all our products and personnel. Fraudulant financial transactions are the norm. Our checking procedures are second to none.
The company was established in early 2005 to serve the booming international construction industry. We work with associate companies worldwide.
Soon after its establishment, Strathclyde Associates Trading and Management Construction Company made a number of associations mainly in the Pacific and Southeast Asia regions. These business partnerships added extra strength to Strathclyde Associates Trading and Management Construction Company. We are proud to be associated with projects in countries including Thailand, Indonesia, Singapore and Seoul, S Korea.

description.hltext_display: LG：做中国最大供应商
description.content:
友达赴内地投建液晶面板厂申请获批的消息成为面板界热议的话题，LG Display首席执行官权英寿（Kwon Young-soo）日前在接受采访时表示，其8.5代线将强于友达7.5代线，并要做中国最大的液晶面板供应商。
权英寿透露，目前他们还没有明确制定一个在中国建立高世代液晶面板厂的计划，日后还需进一步讨论，但先下手并不一定意味着确立优势，毕竟7.5代和8.5代线是两条不同的生产线。
他进一步分析说，8.5代线需要更好的生产设备支持，而且成本更具竞争力，其基板大小适合切割55寸、47寸和32寸基板；而7.5代则更适合切割42寸和47寸基板。
权英寿披露，LG明年目标就是成为中国最大的液晶面板供应商。虽然面板界下半年出现了存货过高的局面，但是明年二季度就会转为供货吃紧，三季度时就会严重短缺。
他预计，明年液晶面板需求量预计达到2.5亿片，其中3D面板将占据10-20%。而LG明年向中国出货的液晶面板量将达到4000万片，3D机型将占其中的20%。

description.hltext_display: Ολυμπιακός: Απλώνει… δίχτυα στην Αφρική
Верижна катастрофа затвори част от бул."Брюксел" в столицата
description.content:
Верижна катастрофа е станала на бул."Брюксел" в София, съобщи слушателят на Дарик Веселин Иванов. При инцидента са се ударили около 20 автомобила, съобщи пресцентърът на МВР. Поради тази причина пътят в посока към аерогарата е затворен. Използва се стария обходен път под моста. Платното от летището към центъра на столицата е отворено. Няма данни за пострадали, а само за материални щети. Верижна катастрофа заради заледяване е станала и на моста "Казичене". Той също е затворен за движение.
Катастрофа на бул."Брюксел" не е вследствие на непочистен път. Причината е мъглата и несъобразена скорост, каза пред Дарик шефката на Столичния инспекторат Веска Георгиева: „Не мога да кажа дали са 50 колите, които са се удари. Аз минах по бул. „Брюксел някъде около 8.20 часа, беше мокро и имаше гъста мъгла. Разбрах, че е станала катастрофа, причината за която е превишена скорост. Проверих дали е имало обаждане от страна на фирма Титан, че искат да обработват моста - не, няма такова обаждане. В 05.00 часа е имало обаждане на гражданин, че е хлъзгаво. Началникът на район „Средец" инженер Мария Петрова е минала по моста, тъй като е била дежурна по това време, не е имало заледяване, имало е гъста мъгла. Бързам да предотвратя мнения в тази посока като ви информирам, че мостът и въобще територията в София не може да се обработва с пясък. Инертните материали са тези, които дават по-голямо сцепление при мокър участък, но не може да се обработва с пясък. Даже ако са обработени със смеси, пак ще направи пътя мокър, сместа не суши".
Пътната настилка по софийските улици е хлъзгава, а гъстата мъгла затруднява още повече движението. Шофьорите трябва да са изключително внимателни, предупреждават и други слушатели.
Закъсненията на колите на градския транспорт в София са между 10 и 15 минути, съобщиха от „Център за градска мобилност" към Столична община.
Натоварен е трафикът на кръстовищата на булевард „Ломско шосе" и улица „Хан Кубрат", на бул. „Г. М. Димитров" и ул. „Никола Габровски", на бул. „Симеоновско шосе" и „Г. М. Димитров", на бул. „Иван Ев. Гешов" и „Георги Софийски".Интензивно е движението и по булевардите „България" и „Александър Малинов".
Деветнайсет души са ранени, за живота на един от които има опасност, при 18 пътни произшествия в страната през последното денонощие, съобщиха от пресцентъра на МВР. В София са станали две тежки и 114 леки катастрофи, при които са били ранени двама души. От началото на годината по пътищата в страната са загинали 764 души.Основните пътища са проходими при зимни условия. Пътните настилки в страната на места са мокри, заснежени, частично заледени. Те се почистват и обработват.Пътната настилка на АМ "Тракия" е суха, на места мокра. Мъгла има в районите на Стара Загора, на Елин Пелин - с видимост до 50 м. Настилката на АМ "Хемус" е суха, на места - също мокра. Аварийната лента от км "16" до км "17" /София-Ботевград/ е затворена. Настилката на АМ "Марица" е суха, на места мокра. В прикачения звуков файл чуйте разказите на слушателите на Дарик за обстановката по пътищата от тази сутрин

description.hltext_display: Aumenta en 100 % aforo vehicular
description.author: Belizario Reyes
description.content:
El tránsito en las carreteras continuará hasta Navidad, adelanta Policía Federal de Proximidad Social
Belizario Reyes
El tránsito en las carreteras continuará hasta Navidad, adelanta Policía Federal de Proximidad Social
MAZATLÁN._ Hasta en un 100 por ciento se incrementó el aforo vehicular en las carreteras federales de la región en el periodo vacacional de invierno, reportó el Inspector de la Unidad Mazatlán de la Policía Federal de Proximidad Social, Roberto Gutiérrez Lara.
"Tenemos un aforo del 100 por ciento, te estoy hablando de cuatro o cinco días (antes), desde el fin de semana", agregó Gutiérrez Lara en entrevista.
Añadió que lo fuerte del aforo vehicular continuará hasta este 23 y 24 de este mes y de ahí disminuirá hasta que se dé el regreso de los connacionales hacia el norte.
Gutiérrez Lara comentó que desde que ingresan a Sinaloa los paisanos cuentan con el apoyo de dicha corporación policial.
Del domingo a la fecha en la zona urbana de Mazatlán también se ha registrado aumento de hasta un 40 por ciento del flujo vehicular, de acuerdo con autoridades de la Policía de Tránsito Municipal.

description.hltext_display: Jungo to Showcase Automotive Connectivity Middleware at CES 2011
description.content:
Jungo Ltd. will debut an in-car mobile middleware solution in January for any smartphone or Internet device. Automotive Connectivity Middleware (ACM) provides complete protocol stacks and rich media and phone management software and also supports easy integration with mapping and telematics applications.
Tags: mobile, middleware, telematics, Jungo, ACM, infotainment, phone management, connectivity,
Jungo Ltd. will debut an in-car mobile middleware solution in January for any smartphone or Internet device. Automotive Connectivity Middleware (ACM) provides complete protocol stacks and rich media and phone management software and also supports easy integration with mapping and telematics applications.
Automotive Connectivity Middleware (ACM) will make it easier for manufacturers of in-car infotainment systems to include connectivity features directly into products and get them to market quickly, according to Jungo Connectivity Software General Manager Ophir Herbst.
“Jungo’s Automotive Connectivity Middleware is a mature and field-tested solution for connecting head units to any device, on top of any protocol, within a rich phone and media application framework,” said Herbst said in a statement.
Jungo’s ACM’s rich media connectivity framework provides:
Connectivity to any device: iPhone, iPod, iPad, Android devices, MTP devices and media players (including iPod Out and Terminal Mode protocols)
Connectivity on any protocol: USB, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G;
Media management functions (indexing, streaming, playback),
Phone management (placing calls, phonebook management) and
Internet connectivity software.
ACM is designed as an “open platform,” Herbst added, allowing OEMs use the same code-base across different platforms. It supports Linux, Android, QNX, Windows CE, ulTRON other popular operating systems used in in-car infotainment systems.
Jungo’s ACM will debut at the 2011 Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas.

description.hltext_display: Weihnachten in der Reha-Klinik
description.content:
Lindsay Lohan ist in ernsten Schwierigkeiten: Die Schauspielerin, die sich noch immer in der Entzugsklinik befindet, wurde dabei erwischt, wie sie mit Freundinnen ausgelassen feierte - Alkohol inkklusive. Nun wurde LiLo sogar der „Weihnachtsurlaub“ gestrichen ...
seitenblicke.at
Es gibt ein paar Dinge, die man in einer Entzugsanstalt nicht unbeding tun sollte, wenn man die Verantwortlichen nicht verärgern und vor allem seine Genesung nicht gefährden will. Das Feiern wilder Partys zählt mit Sicherheit dazu - noch dazu auf dem Gelände der Einrichtung. So kann man sich nun sehr gut vorstellen, wie die Stimmung innerhalb der Betty-Ford-Klinik derzeit ist, denn Lindsay Lohan und einige ihrer neuen Freundinnen haben ebendies getan. Und sich dabei erwischen lassen.
Girlsparty
Wie die Website TMZ.com berichtet, wurde der Samstag des letzten Adventwochenendes zum Desaster für LiLo & Co: Die Schauspielerin und einige andere Patientinnen, die derzeit in einem Nebengbäude der Klinik untergebracht sind, nutzen die räumliche Entfernung zu ihren „Aufpassern“ im Hauptgebäude, um es abendlich ordentlich krachen zu lassen. Demnach soll auch jede Menge Alkohol geflossen sein.
Es ist nicht genau bekannt, wie das Personal von der Party erfahren hat, Tatsache ist, dass alle, nun ja, nicht gerade erfreut waren. Die Patientinnen wurden wieder in das Hauptgebäude verlegt, wo sie jetzt unter strenger Beobachtung stehen, und bekamen weitere Sanktionen, wie Ausgehverbot, auferlegt.
„Intensive Therapie“
Auch Lindsay Lohan muss die Konsequenzen tragen: Der bereits zugesagte Ausgang zu Weihnachten wurde ihr nun wieder untersagt, was bedeutet, dass die 24-Jährige die Feiertage in der Betty-Ford-Klinik verbringen wird. Und das, obwohl noch gar nicht feststeht, dass Lohan in der besagten Nacht tatsächlich Alkohol getrunken hat. Doch das alleinige Mitmachen bei der verbotenen Party reichte den Verantwortlichen der Entzugsanstalt scheinbar bereits, um darauf streng zu reagieren. Gerüchten zufolge verließ Lindsay allerdings sogar mit zwei anderen Patientinnen an jenem Samstag sogar die Klinik, um sich in einer Bar zu amüsieren ...
Offiziell handelt es sich jedenfalls bei dem Verlegen zurück ins Hauptgebäude samt verhängtem „Hausarrest“ natürlich nicht um eine Strafe, sondern um eine notwendig gewordene „intensive Therapie.“ In diesem Sinne: Frohe Weihnachten, Lindsay Lohan!

description.hltext_display: Guvernul alocă peste 59 de milioane de euro pentru salariile preoţilor
description.content:
Guvernul dă peste 59 de milioane de euro pentru salariile a 35.000 de preoţi şi dascăli. Potrivit Legii Bugetului de stat pe 2011, banii alocaţi pentru salarizarea personalului de cult sunt mai mulţi cu 9 la sută faţă de anul în curs. În schimb, salariile bugetarilor vor fi majorate doar cu 15 procente.
Deşi s-a arătat zgârcit cu bugetarii şi le-a scăzut salariile cu un sfert în acest an, Guvernul creşte salariile preoţilor. Legea Bugetului de stat pe 2011 prevede mărirea contribuţiei statului pentru salariile personalului de cult de la 227,8 milioane, la 248,6 milioane de lei. Reprezentanţii Secretariatului de stat pentru Culte spun că NU este vorba de o majorare.
Statul se îngrijeşte şi de salariile celor 20.000 de dascăli. Contribuţia statului la salariile acestora va creşte cu 30%, conform Legii Bugetului de stat.
Reprezentanţii Patriarhiei Române susţin că preoţii au cele mai mici salarii din România.
"Un preot debutant are un salariu de 890 de lei, iar un preot cu toate gradele profesionale ajunge la 1.800-1.900 de lei, ceea ce este foarte puţin", a declarat părintele Constantin Stoica, purtătorul de cuvânt al patriarhiei Române.
În România sunt aproximativ 15.000 de preoţi ortodocşi. Statul acordă 60% din salariile de bază pe care le câştigă personalul clerical. Procentajul ajunge până la 80%, în cazul preoţilor din parohiile sărace.

description.hltext_display: Remona Leonard
description.content:
Services for , 81, of Andrews, were held at 2 p.m. Tuesday at McNett Funeral Home Chapel in Andrews with the Rev. Glenn Hammack officiating.
Burial followed in Andrews North Cemetery under the direction of McNett Funeral Home.
Mrs. Leonard died on Friday, Dec. 17, 2010 at Medical Center Hospital in Odessa, Texas.
She was born on April 25, 1929 in Gatesville County, Texas. She married Frank Leonard July 15, 1953 in Killeen, Texas. They moved to Andrews in 1973 from Eunice, N.M.
She was a member of House of Mercy Ministries Church in Andrews.
She was preceded in death by her husband, Frank, in 2006.
Survivors include three sons, Mike Leonard and Kevin Leonard, both of Andrews, and Tony Leonard of Lamesa; one brother, Henry Thomson Jr. of Oregon; four sisters, Bobbie Nell Eads, Peggy Wilkerson, Lynda Ellis, all of Killeen, and Jerry McCarver of Gatesville; and five grandchildren.

description.hltext_display: St. Thomas More students shave heads for cancer research
description.content:
Like most teenaged girls, Tehya Sutton is somewhat attached to her hair.
So it was understandable when Sutton's eyes began welling up with tears as her blonde locks were twisted into ponytails and cut off at the in front of dozens of shocked students at St. Thomas More junior high school.
Sutton, in Grade 8 at St. Thomas, was one of seven students and two members of the faculty who helped raise over $5,000 for cancer research by having their heads shaved during the lunch-hour event.
Sutton's mother was on hand to wield the clippers for her daughter, who vowed to shave her head in return for donations for cancer research.
"It feels so weird," laughs Sutton, who ran her hands over her sheared head while her mom showered her with kisses. "I think it's definitely worth it, though."
Sutton, along with fellow students who donated their heads and hearts to the event, spent weeks campaigning and raising money for pledges.
Grade 9 student Jacob Wasylenko raised over $3,000.
He says cancer research is an important cause, and people should be raising money and awareness all year long.
"This is the first time I've shaved my head for cancer, but I've participated in other cancer walks and stuff," says the 14-year-old, who has lost a family member to cancer. "Supporting cancer research is just a good thing to do."
Many of the donations were small – $10 here from a friend at school, $20 there from a family member – but they were plentiful. The kids even moved their campaign online, with the help of teachers Edmund Vale and Paul Borchert who also shaved their heads last week.
"I can't give enough kudos to these kids. They raised a lot of donations, they are so brave and they are educating other kids," says Vale, a Phys-ed teacher at Thomas More.
"Cancer is something that touches everybody, and yet people don't do enough to understand it or to fight it," says student council member Cassandra Duchene. "This is a great way to start supporting the cause but we can never do too much, so we plan to find different ways to support cancer research in the New Year."
Volunteer students at St. Thomas More and several parents who attended the event were given the honours of conducting the mass shearing.
The two girls who participated plan to donate their 10 inches of hair to Locks of Love.
Shave to Save was organized by the school's student council with all proceeds going to the Canadian Cancer Society,

description.hltext_display: 손흥민, '차붐 넘어' 최연소 기록 갈아치운다!
description.content:
조광래 "손흥민 아시안컵 데려가고 싶다"… 아시안컵 최연소 선수 기록 깰 듯
(서귀포=연합뉴스) 이영호 기자 =
"해외파가 가세해 빠른 패스가 이어지면 더 좋은 플레이를 보여줄 것으로 기대한다"
조광래(56) 축구대표팀 감독이 2011 카타르 아시안컵 축구대회 최종엔트리에 '샛별' 손흥민(18.함부르크)을 발탁하겠다는 뜻을 밝혔다.
조 감독은 22일 오후 제주도 서귀포 제주월드컵경기장에서 치러진 자체 연습경기를 마치고 나서 "오늘 경기 모습을 봐서는 아시안컵에 기용할 가능성이 있다고 생각한다"며 "코칭스태프와 협의해 오늘 저녁 최종 엔트리(23명)를 확정하겠다"고 말했다.
이번 시즌 독일 분데스리가에 데뷔해 3골을 터트리며 구단 최연소 득점 기록을 세우는 등 맹활약을 펼친 손흥민은 조광래 감독의 러브콜을 받고 아시안컵 예비엔트리에 이름을 올리며 제주도 전훈에 참가했다.
지난 20일 밤 대표팀에 합류한 손흥민은 단 이틀 동안의 테스트를 거치고 나서 사실상 조광래 감독으로부터 아시안컵 멤버로 낙점을 받게 됐다.
이에 따라 내년 1월 7일 개막하는 아시안컵에서 만 18세 6개월이 되는 손흥민은 차범근 전 수원 삼성 감독이 만 18세 11개월의 나이로 1972년 5월에 치러진 방콕 아시안컵에 출전해 세웠던 역대 아시안컵 최연소 대표선수 기록을 깼다.
조광래 감독은 "손흥민이 측면에서 공격적으로 날카로운 모습을 보여줬다. 해외파 선수들이 합류해 빠른 패스를 받으면 더 날카로운 모습을 연출해줄 것이다"며 "아시안컵에 기용할 좋은 선수다"고 칭찬했다.
조 감독의 '깜짝' 발언에 손흥민은 깜짝 놀라고 말았다.
손흥민은 '조 감독이 아시안컵에 데려가겠다고 했다"는 취재진의 말에 "그냥 대표팀에 합류해 형들과 훈련하면서 경험을 쌓으려고 했는데..."라며 놀란 기색을 숨기지 못했다.
그는 "아직 확실하게 엔트리가 발표된 게 아니지만 감독님이 그런 말씀을 해주신 게 감사하다"며 "훈련을 하면서 아쉬움이 많이 남았다. 조금 더 배워야 한다"고 강조했다.

description.hltext_display: Local news briefs - Dec. 22, 2010
description.content:
AKRON: Bowl a strike for college scholarships today at Midway Lanes, which is holding a fundraiser for Akron Council PTA.
Here's the deal: pay $8 for three games (shoes included) between 9 a.m and 11 p.m. and Midway, owned by Ray Stalnaker, will give $4 to the PTA's scholarship fund for Akron Public Schools seniors.
Midway Lanes will offer the same deal and hours on Dec. 29.
Midway Lanes is at 1070 E. Tallmadge Ave. in Akron.
For additional information on the bowling event, call 330-633-8104.
LAKE SCHOOLS
Levy bid in May
LAKE TWP.: The Lake Local Board of Education approved a Resolution of Necessity during its meeting Monday night.
This is the first step for the district to place a 0.5-mill permanent improvement levy on the May ballot.
If the levy is approved, Lake Local then would partner with the Ohio School Facility Commission to build a new high school on their campus.
The current Lake Middle School would then become an elementary school, and the present high school would become a middle school.
In other action, the board appointed Attorneys Jon A. Troyer, Tom Connors and the Alliance Defense Fund to represent the district.
The board also adopted a policy regarding students' use of electronic communications equipment.
Students may not use or display their cellular phones and other electronic communication devices during school hours unless for academic use and with explicit permission of school staff.
PORTAGE COUNTY
Rate hikes on hold
RAVENNA: Water and sewer rates for customers of the Portage County Water Resources department won't be increased in 2011.
Portage County commissioners voted unanimously Tuesday to suspend scheduled increases that were scheduled to go into effect Jan. 1.
''The board reviewed the account balances in the department, and the Water Resources' five-year capital plan and believes we can forgo the rate increases for the next year without a negative impact on the department,'' said Commissioner Chris Smeiles in a statement.
Rates had been scheduled to increase by 21/2 percent for Streetsboro waste water customers, 31/2 percent for Portage County waste water customers and 31/2 percent for retail drinking water customers.
The commissioners also named Jeff Lonzrick, engineering division manager, to the post of interim director.
Director Harold Huff, who has served 15 years, is retiring Dec. 31.
The department is advertising for a new director.
MEDINA COUNTY
Pedestrian killed
SHARON TWP.: A Medina woman walking across state Route 18 was struck and killed Tuesday morning by a passing semi-trailer truck.
Michelle A. Jarvis, 42, died at Medina Hospital from injuries sustained in the crash.
Ohio State Highway Patrol troopers say Jarvis was crossing the roadway from the north at about 6:45 a.m. when the semi driven by a 62-year-old Orange Village man struck her just west of the Ridge Road intersection.
No charges were filed, and the crash remains under investigation.
RAVENNA
Lincoln display
RAVENNA: The national traveling exhibition Forever Free: Abraham Lincoln's Journey to Emancipation opens Sunday at Reed Memorial Library, 167 E. Main St..
The display will be in Ravenna through Feb. 12.
Several events are planned during the exhibition. The first is a visit by Abraham Lincoln, portrayed by Gerald Payn, at 2 p.m. Jan. 8, followed by tours of the exhibition.
At 2 p.m. Jan. 9, Chris Vallillo, musician and folklorist, will perform Abraham Lincoln in song, using narratives and period and contemporary songs to talk about Lincoln's life.
For more information, call 330-296-2827 or go to http://www.reed.lib.oh.us.
SUMMIT COUNTY
Officer honored
AKRON: Summit County Children Services has honored Akron police officer Nathan Keith for saving the life of a child at the agency's visitation center.
Keith, who was working off-duty at the center last month, was recognized for his quick thinking and decisive action in administering emergency aid to a 3-year-old child who was choking on a piece of candy.
Keith attended the December meeting of the agency board and was presented with a plaque by Children Services Executive Director John Saros. Keith has been with the Akron Police Department for nearly 18 years and is assigned to the information systems division.
AKRON SCHOOLS
Bowling for scholars
AKRON: Bowl a strike for college scholarships today at Midway Lanes, which is holding a fundraiser for Akron Council PTA.
Here's the deal: pay $8 for three games (shoes included) between 9 a.m and 11 p.m. and Midway, owned by Ray Stalnaker, will give $4 to the PTA's scholarship fund for Akron Public Schools seniors.
Midway Lanes will offer the same deal and hours on Dec. 29.
Midway Lanes is at 1070 E. Tallmadge Ave. in Akron.
For additional information on the bowling event, call 330-633-8104.

The current Lake Middle School would then become an elementary school, and the present high school would become a middle school.
In other action, the board appointed Attorneys Jon A. Troyer, Tom Connors and the Alliance Defense Fund to represent the district.
The board also adopted a policy regarding students' use of electronic communications equipment.
Students may not use or display their cellular phones and other electronic communication devices during school hours unless for academic use and with explicit permission of school staff.

For more information, call 330-296-2827 or go to http://www.reed.lib.oh.us.

description.hltext_display: Microseguros en el Perú
Migranten sind karrierebewusster als Deutsche
description.content:
Menschen mit ausländischen Wurzeln sind in Deutschland deutlich besser integriert als bisher angenommen. Das geht aus einer Studie der Bertelsmann-Stiftung hervor, aus der die Frankfurter Rundschau vom Mittwoch (22.12.2010) zitiert.
Danach sind Migranten zum Beispiel karriereorientierter als Deutsche ohne Migrationshintergrund. Während neun von zehn Befragten mit Migrationshintergrund angaben, beruflich weiterkommen zu wollen, sind gerade einmal 45 Prozent der Deutschstämmigen so sehr auf ihr berufliches Weiterkommen bedacht.
Kein traditionelles Rollenverständnis Bildunterschrift: Ähnlich sieht es bei der Arbeitsteilung zwischen den Geschlechtern im Haushalt aus: 41 Prozent der Männer mit Migrationshintergrund betrachten Putzen, Kochen und Kindergroßziehen als gemeinsame Aufgabe von Paaren. Bei den Befragten ohne Migrationshintergrund sehen das nur etwa ein Drittel der Männer, nämlich 35 Prozent, so.
Was die Berufstätigkeit von Frauen angeht, so lehnen gut dreiviertel der Migranten (74 Prozent) die Vorstellung vom Heimchen am Herd ab. Bei den Bürgern aus muslimisch geprägten Ländern könnten laut Studie 70 Prozent einem solchen traditionellen Mutterbild nicht zustimmen. Sie sind damit nicht konservativer als die Deutschen.
Kindergartenpflicht für Dreijährige
Die Mehrheit der Migranten wünscht sich kostenlose Kindergärten und ist sogar dafür, eine Kita-Pflicht für Dreijährige einzuführen. Die meisten Befragten wollten ihre Kinder am liebsten im Kindergarten oder in der Ganztagsschule betreuen lassen.
Für die Umfrage der Bertelsmann-Stiftung wurden Menschen mit und ohne Migrationshintergrund befragt, um ihre Einstellungen zu den Themen Familie und Beruf miteinander vergleichen zu können.
Autor: Bachir Amroune (dapd, epd, afp)
Redaktion: Ursula Kissel

description.hltext_display: Cierran clases entre ausentismo en Mazatlán
description.author: Noroeste / Redacción
description.content:
Con horarios recortados y pocos alumnos, escuelas tienen el último día del ciclo antes de las vacaciones navideñas
Noroeste / Redacción
Fotografía: Noroeste.
< anterior
< anterior
siguiente >
NOTAS RELACIONADAS
Cumplen escuelas mazatlecas, pero ya sin clases
Defiende SEPyC calendario escolar
MAZATLÁN.- En la mayoría de las escuelas de educación básica de Mazatlán, el último día de clases se convirtió en una "farsa" escolar.
El gran ausentismo de alumnos fue la principal característica de la jornada, la cual estuvo enmarcada por entregas de calificaciones, reuniones con padres de familia y posadas.
En la primaria Gabriela Mistral, los alumnos acudieron acompañados de sus padres, se entregaron calificaciones, recogieron el libro de tareas y antes de las 10:00 horas ya se habían retirado del plantel.
Lo mismo sucedió en la primaria Venustiano Carranza, donde los alumnos sólo recibieron indicaciones para hacer sus tareas en vacaciones y posteriormente regresaron a sus hogares alrededor de las 09:00 horas.
Otras escuelas, como la primaria Justo Sierra, realizaron la tradicional posada. Los alumnos llegaron entre 09:00 y 09:30 horas y salieron a las 11:00 horas después de celebrar la navidad con sus compañeros de clase.
A pesar de que en el día no se impartieron clases, los padres de familia lamentaron que el periodo vacacional haya comenzado tan tarde.
"Para que los hacen venir si ya nada más es puro parapeto, los niños ya estaban desesperados por salir, por qué nos alargan la salida, de todas maneras pierden muchas clases en días que no son descansos oficiales", comentó una madre de familia de la primaria Gabriela Mistral.
En algunas secundarias como la Federal 1 y la Federal 6, los alumnos se presentaron a las primeras cuatro horas, aunque según explicaron los estudiantes no tuvieron clases.
"Ya nos vamos, no hay clases, nada más nos hicieron venir porque según nos iban a castigar pero ni nos dieron clases", expresó una alumna de la secundaria Federal 1 cuando salía del plantel, alrededor de las 8:30 horas.
En la Primaria Juan Carrasco del turno matutino acudió solo alrededor de una décima parte de los alumnos.
La directora del plantel, María de la Luz Martínez Piña, dijo que ante la escasez de alumnos, el día se aprovecharía para realizar una reunión de planeación de trabajo del tercer bimestre con los maestros.
La Primaria Simón Jiménez Cárdenas, de Valles del Ejido, tuvo actividad normal, pero solo dos horas, pues salieron a las 10:00 horas.
Ahí, por ejemplo, en el grupo de primero, que tiene 44 alumnos, solo asistieron 15, y en el de sexto, que tiene 46 estudiantes, faltaron 16.
En primarias como la Luis Donaldo Colosio, del Infonavit Alarcón; Rafael Lizárraga Zazueta, del Fraccionamiento Misiones, y Emilia Amador de Robertson, del Infonavit Jabalíes, ya no se observó ninguna actividad ayer.
En los colegios particulares también se registró un marcado ausentismo.

description.hltext_display: 三星商用大屏助力亚运
description.content:
【文章摘要】作为本届亚运会的赞助商，三星虽然没有参与竞技体育，但开幕式的惊艳亮相、亚运进行中的安防保障，以及电视转播中的精彩瞬间呈现也给观众们留下了深刻印象。三星为现场和电视机前的观众呈现了精彩“视界”。
第十六届广州亚运会已经闭幕，但亚运会的精彩时刻我们仍历历在目。作为本届亚运会的赞助商，三星虽然没有参与竞技体育，但开幕式的惊艳亮相、亚运进行中的安防保障，以及电视转播中的精彩瞬间呈现也给观众们留下了深刻印象。三星为现场和电视机前的观众呈现了精彩“视界”。
三星LED 点亮开幕式
LED是目前三星的一项核心业务，也是未来显示与照明市场发展的趋势，在本次亚运会开幕式上，三星LED产品让我们领略了高科技产品带来的震撼。在本次亚运开幕式上共使用了400万个三星Full color LED，Full color LED每个package中都内置了红、绿、蓝3个LED芯片（chip），由各个芯片控制电流可以生成所有色彩，使得它们更加光彩夺目。三星LED通过本次广州亚运会，充分展现了产品优势、技术优势，为观众呈现了一个不同凡响的开幕式。
直播亚运 抓住精彩瞬间
在电视节目转播的过程中，主持人身后的两个大屏显示器，随时为观众抓取和呈现赛场的精彩瞬间，细心的观众朋友可能已经通过大屏显示器下方的标志认出了是三星的产品。没错，这就是由三星提供的820DXn-2商用大屏显示器。三星商用大屏显示器820DXn2拥有全高清1080p画面质量，极高的文本清晰度，并内置扬声器，能够让您感受到清晰的电视画面和声音内容。而且，它拥有强韧的DID面板，可保证其在整个使用寿命中的可靠性和可读性。此外，三星商用大屏显示器820DXn2还具有超过50,000小时的使用寿命以及运行温度低、防尘、防灼屏等功能，所以，长时间的不间断工作、较差的工作环境对它来说都能轻松胜任。
作为一款高端的商用大屏显示器，三星820DXn2出了追求显示画面清晰、性能优越稳定之外，同时也注重低能耗和环保指标。据了解，三星820DXn2符合最新能源之星5.0标准的品质，令其成为市场同类产品中最环保的显示器，它仅消耗普通显示器70%的电量非常符合现代商务人士的低碳、环保理念。
三星商用大屏 护航亚运安防
作为本届亚运会的赞助商，作为商用大屏领域的领跑者，三星为广州亚运会的安防提供了有力的保障。本届亚运会，三星提供了124台商用大屏显示器460UT，用于监控和信息发布系统显示。三星商用大屏460UT是其大屏拼接解决方案的拳头产品，拼接缝隙已经达到了6.7mm，最窄处仅有2.4mm，这种肉眼几乎观察不到的边框距离，也使得它首次在物理层面上实现了无盲区呈现的拼接效果，超大画面无缝显示，显示分辨率可达到1366×768的高清显示标准，亮度也可达到700cd/m²，能将影像自然、清晰的显示出来，并且能最大程度地减少观看者的视觉盲点与视觉割裂感，完美还原前端监控视频。
三星商用大屏 保障亚运交通畅通
三星商用显示大屏在国内交通行业应用广泛，在本次亚运会期间，广州地铁共采用了96台三星460UT，主要用于广州地铁的信息发布及地铁PIS系统显示应用。作为一项国际型的重大赛事，每天观看比赛和进行城市旅游的人给交通系统带来了巨大压力，作为信息发布和系统显示的直接窗口，也必须承受24小时高强度的工作，这对显示系统提出了很高的要求。
第十六届广州亚运会是三星第六次赞助亚运会，三星给予了极大的重视，三星商用大屏从开幕、直播、安防、交通等各个方面为亚运保驾护航，凭借其产品先进的技术、高端的科技、稳定的性能再一次证明了三星作为全球显示领域领军企业的雄厚实力。

description.hltext_display: Fisher Capital Management Seoul Korea: Market Overview 1st Quarter 2010
description.content:
- India is in a sweet spot. Fisher Capital Management Seoul Korea: Market Overview 1st Quarter 2010 - India is in a sweet spot. The central government budget which set the tone for reducing fiscal deficit and an unexpected increase in the policy rate to rein in inflation has convinced the markets and economists that India is on its way to having a robust economic growth. Industrial output also continued to grow at a fast pace in January as companies produced more cars and cement. In the fiscal year 2011 that ends in March 2011, GDP growth of 8.5% is achievable. Long-term predictions for the southwest monsoons are expected to be normal, giving a boost to agricultural production and domestic demand. Fisher Capital Management Seoul Korea- Inflation in India has been surging, driven by a low base and high food prices as the weakest monsoon rains in 37 years last year hurt farm output. Inflation running at 8.5% may have peaked and it is expected to ease by April as the winter-sown crop comes to market. The year-on-year inflation rate for food articles was 16.22% in the week ending March 13, far above the comfortable zone for the central bank and the government. In order to manage the inflationary expectations, the central bank increased overnight lending and borrowing rates by 0.25 percentages point each, making it one of the first major central banks to raise rates. The central bank further announced that it would continue to roll back its loose monetary policy to manage prices, as the country cant have sustained strong growth with high inflation. We expect a 0.25-percentage-point rate hike in mid-April and another increase of one percentage point through March 2011. Fisher Capital Management Seoul Korea: Market Overview 1st Quarter 2010 - The rebound in industrial activity also saw a surge in Indias exports for the third month running in January. Exports in January rose 11.5% from a year earlier to $14.34 billion, after having increased 9.3% to $14.61 billion in December. Imports increased 35.5% in January to $24.70 billion while oil imports rose by 56% to $7.05 billion. Non-oil imports, a barometer of investment activity, grew 28.8% to $17.65 billion.
On the back of robust economic numbers and policy pronouncements, the rating agency Standard & Poors raised its rating outlook to stable, expecting the fiscal situation to recover and growth to remain strong in the coming years. The governments commitment to follow the recommendations of the 13th Finance
Commission, as well as its move to reduce fertilizer subsidies and raise domestic fuel prices were taken as positive indicators. The countrys external position continues to be in a comfortable zone.
Fisher Capital Management Seoul Korea: Market Overview 1st Quarter 2010 - It is unlikely that India will benefit from the Google-China spat as the Indian government will not provide the kind of benefits China extends to the manufacturing sector in China. But some relocation is likely to emerge. For example, American companies GoDaddy and Dell have threatened to pull out of China and relocate themselves in India.

description.hltext_display: Bringing E-Waste Best Practices to Government
description.content:
Lora Bentley spoke with Robert Houghton, president of technology change management specialist Redemtech.The company recently won a contract to provide information technology services, including equipment maintenance and purchasing used and refurbished equipment, for the U.S. General Services Administration.
According to Recycling Today, a recent report from the Department of Justice revealed that the Bureau of Prisons Industries' UNICOR, which has handled the federal government's e-waste recycling and management needs for years, has exhibited a pattern of "lax worker safety and environmental protections and insufficient knowledge of the destination of export shipments of electronic scrap," among other things.
Bentley: What will Redemtech offer government agencies that UNICOR has not?
Houghton: In the very simplest sense, what we hope to be able to propose to the government is that they move toward adopting the asset management best practices that corporate America has found profitable and helpful to security and sustainability for a number of years.
The federal government is the largest IT user in the world, but their asset management practices have not necessarily kept up with their consumption of IT. There’s a great deal of opportunity for the government to become more efficient and adopt policies and methods for reuse to reduce expenditures and improve sustainability – and also to be more environmentally responsible.
“The federal government is the largest IT user in the world, but their asset management practices have not necessarily kept up with their consumption of IT.”
Robert Houghton
President
Redemtech
Bentley: Why do you think there is such a disconnect at UNICOR?
Houghton: Well, I’m probably not the best person to address that, but I wrote a blog post when the OIG (Office of Inspector General) report came out in which I said, as a citizen and a member of the electronics recycling community, I find it troubling that UNICOR has misrepresented its practices to one and all for all these years. Secondly, I find it troubling for the future that basically the same methods for oversight and governance that allowed the problems to occur are still in place. While UNICOR has changed management, oversight and governance have not changed.
The new guy is someone that many of us know and respect, and that change should bring improvements, but what’s to prevent another person at another time from taking it in the wrong direction again I’m not sure.
Bentley: What makes Redemtech different?
Houghton: When you look at a company that is used to serving large enterprise business such as Redemtech does, we are subject to a great deal of scrutiny by our customers just in the normal course of running a for-profit business. It poses a level of rigor and discipline on a service provider that perhaps the government’s not used to. But UNICOR aside, there are some great opportunities for federal and state governments to use what the private sector has learned in terms of asset management best practices.
That’s really why Redemtech felt the time was right to get the General Services Administration contract. At the same time, we’re making similar proposals to the states. If anything, the problems are more severe from a budgetary perspective at the state level than they are at the federal level. So refurbishing and reusing existing hardware rather than buying new is a real opportunity to save tax dollars. The states are very receptive to it. It’s a revolutionary idea – asking government to be as thrifty as private business.
Bentley: Are there any changes you will make in how you provide your services to a government customer as opposed to how you work with private sector customers?
Houghton: Actually, each customer is somewhat unique even within the private sector. We expect the same will be true with government agencies. The biggest difference probably with government agencies is that there is a law in place that sets up a surplus management practice. With commercial clients, Redemtech is responsible for handling refurbish and reuse and for handling resale of surplus and even handling the recycling of the material that doesn’t have value and can’t be sold as surplus. At the government level, resale is something that often goes through an auction or surplus process, so we won’t be helping in quite the same way. We’ll be helping maximize the sale of those items, but the government will still be conducting the sale.

description.hltext_display: Road safety has to rely on people making profits
description.content:
The Marxist philosophy of Keith Peat is absurd. There isn’t a single piece of life-saving equipment that isn’t sold at a profit to manufacturers and retailers. Fire engines and ambulances are sold at huge profits. Smoke alarms, life-belts, signal flares, ladder stabilisers and household escape ladders etc, are sold profitably to suppliers on the assumption that they may save the buyer’s life.
With few exceptions, people who work in organisations dedicated to saving life...

description.hltext_display: Strumpfuskare stängs av
description.author: TT
description.content:
Yang Shu-chun hade för många sensorer.
TAIPEI. Internationella taekwondoförbundets hemsida attackerades av hackare som var upprörda efter att taiwanesiskan Yang Shu-chun straffats med avstängning efter att ha haft för många sensorer i strumporna under Asiatiska spelen. Yang diskvalificerades under tävlingarna och stängs nu av i tre månader. Hennes tränare fick 20 månaders avstängning och Taiwans taekwondoförbund får böta motsvarande 341 000 kronor.

description.hltext_display: Mann zum Fortpflanzen gesucht
description.content:
Chloe Sevigny - eine der talentiertesten Darstellerinnen Hollywoods - will 2011 endlich das Projekt „eigene Familie“ angehen. Dazu fehlt ihr aber noch der geeignete Partner. Weshalb sie den nun sogar per „Fortpflanzungs“-Aufruf zu finden hofft.
seitenblicke.at
Am 18. November 2010 wurde sie 36 Jahre alt - die vergangenen 15 Jahre verbrachte sie größtenteils auf Filmsets, ihre Zukunft als eine der gefragtesten Charakterdarstellerinnen Hollywoods hat sie mit ihren Arbeiten in dieser Zeit gesichert, in den letzten fünf Jahren verdiente sie gutes Geld als Darstellerin in der TV-Serie „Big Love“.
Kein Mann in Sicht
Kein Wunder also, dass Chloe Sevigny den Zeitpunkt gekommen sieht, sich ernsthaft Gedanken über eine eigene Familie zu machen. Problem: Mr. Right war bisher nicht unter ihren Partnern, und auch ihre aktuelle Suche nach ihm verlief bisher erfolglos, wie Chloe nun der Männerzeitschrift „Playboy“ verriet: „Seit einem Jahr texte ich nun schon mit ein paar Männern hin und her - ohne aber je auf ein Date mit einem von ihnen zu gehen. 'Wie war Dein Tag?' ist mir einfach zu unsexy - da müssen sie sich schon was Schärferes einfallen lassen, um mich rumzukriegen.“
Um potentiellen Verehren die Sache zu erleichtern, verriet Chloe außerdem auch gleich, welchen Typ Mann sie sucht - und welche Eigenschaften er haben sollte: „Ich würde gerne jemanden finden, mit dem ich mich fortpflanzen kann. Einen Mann vom Typ aggressiver Holzfäller, sehr männlich, der mit seinen Händen gut umgehen kann, damit Sachen baut und auch unter harten Bedingungen überleben kann. Gesichtsbehaarung gefällt mir auch sehr gut.“
Männer, auf die diese Beschreibung passt, sollten Chloe einfach mal ansprechen. „Ich beiße nicht. Nun, vielleicht ein bisschen, wenn ihr Glück habt. Ich mag Jungs die aggressiv sind und zu denen ich auch ein bisschen aggressiv sein kann.“

description.hltext_display: 三星星世界大篷车进新会
description.content:
【文章摘要】2010年12月13日-15日，三星星世界大篷车来到了广东省江门市新会区，在新会慧谷数码港连续举办了3天的活动。大篷车为消费者带来了精彩的IT移动娱乐盛宴，受到了数千名新会市民的热忱欢迎。
接下来，三星星世界大篷车将在广东省22个城市举办34场次的巡回活动，为更多的广东消费者送去冬日关怀。12月21日，大篷车将来到深圳市沙井区益华电子批发广场，12月22日将抵达南山赛格。万千精彩，敬请期待！
雨后的新会市容
在经济发展方面，新会上半年实现生产总值174.48亿元，同比增长12.44%，GDP增幅居全市第二。与此同时，新会的IT市场也蓬勃发展，消费者在选择IT产品更为注重IT产品的品牌与附加价值。
大篷车亮相江门市新会区慧谷数码港
2010年12月13日-15日，三星星世界大篷车在慧谷数码港亮相。活动吸引了大量消费者围观，现场人气爆棚。记者在现场看到，三星星世界大篷车阵容相当强大。红色充气拱门上的标语极具视觉冲击力，分别是“三星笔记本喜获专业媒体百项大奖”，“三星显示器连续十一年市场销量第一”的标语。
大篷车绝色歌舞秀
大篷车舞台表演区有歌舞表演及模特产品展示秀，美少女们的性感舞姿让观众热血澎湃；模特产品展示秀环节，美女模特手持三星IT最新产品款款登场，性感身姿，相当惹火。
新会消费者给力互动
三星星世界大篷车与消费者充分互动，设置了幸运魔方、幸运号码对对碰、和少女时代亲密合影、搜集调查问卷等互动活动，得到了消费者的积极参与。众多路过的消费者纷纷咨询、体验产品。现场优惠幅度多多，不少消费者现场购买产品。问卷调查表明，高达五成的消费者愿意购买三星IT产品，超过三成的消费者准备在短期内购买三星IT产品。
三星电子中国区副总裁李载烨
三星电子中国区副总裁李载烨表示，三星星世界大篷车寒冬送温暖，为广东消费者在寒冬送去了三星IT的最新产品。从2010年12月2日至2011年1月13日，三星星世界大篷车将在广东的22个城市巡回，举办场次多达34场次，更多精彩正在继续，请广东消费者全心期待。

description.hltext_display: Bayern ohne Lahm? Nicht mal eine Minute!!
description.content: Er ist der Dauerbrenner des FC Bayern: Philipp Lahm spielt seit 1995 - mit nur einer zweijährigen Unterbrechung - für den Rekordmeister. Und soll dies noch eine ganze Weile tun: Bis 2016 hat das Münchner Eigengewächs inzwischen seinen Vertrag verlängert. Die Bayern ohne Lahm - kaum mehr vorstellbar. Nicht einmal für eine Minute! Denn wie schon in der gesamten letzten Saison bestritt der WM-Kapitän der Nationalelf auch in der Hinrunde sämtliche Bundesligaspiele von der ersten bis zur letzten Minute. [ weiter... ]

description.hltext_display: AVG Free 2011
description.content:
, eigenlijk gewoon AVG Free 10, was net te laat voor onze vergelijkende antimalwaretest. We nemen deze vernieuwde populaire scanner alsnog onder de loep.
AVG heeft kleine, doeltreffende verbeteringen aan de interface doorgevoerd die gebruikers zullen waarderen. Donkere kleuren en een nieuwe slimme scan moeten helpen met betere prestaties en snellere navigatie. De installatie is teruggebracht van dertien naar vijf schermen, al vinden we dat nog altijd overbodig zwaar. Wel merken we dat de vernieuwde scanner ons systeem minder vertraagt dan AVG Free 9.
Zeer opdringerig We zijn niet gecharmeerd van de opdringerigheid waarmee AVG zijn betaalde product aan ons wil slijten. Naast de standaard banners moet je tijdens de installatie goed opletten dat je geen trialversie installeert. Installeer je ook de LinkScanner-browserwerkbalk, dan scant AVG je Facebook- en MySpace-links automatisch, maar het voegt dan wel een lelijke promotietekst toe in de boodschappen. scoort erg goed in recente onafhankelijke virustests. We ondervinden zelf dat het uitstekend is in het verwijderen van infecties. Vergeleken met andere gratis producten als Panda Cloud Antivirus is het echter minder goed in het herkennen en afstoppen van malwareaanvallen. En hoewel de LinkScanner-werkbalk goed reageert op websites met besmettende code, slaat het nauwelijks aan bij phishingsites. Er zijn extras, zoals een systeemschrobber en identiteitsbescherming, maar die kun je maar tijdelijk gratis gebruiken. Al met al heeft AVG een gestroomlijnder en beter product afgeleverd, maar onze voorkeur gaat nog steeds uit naar Panda Cloud Antivirus of Avast Free Antivirus. Prijs: gratis (januari 2011)
PRO: razendsnelle virusscan; bepaal zelf hoeveel systeemdruk AVG uitoefent; veel opties; verwijdert malware vakkundig. CONTRA: veel nieuwe functies blijken probeerversies; opdringerige reclame; slechte antiphishing; teleurstellende malwareverdediging.
bron: PC Magazine

description.hltext_display: Blårävar startar uppåt
description.content:
Starten på blårävsauktionen i Vanda visar på stigande priser även för den viktigaste gruppen av skinn, blåräv.
Då de största storlekarna av blåräv gick under klubban på förmiddagen hade priset på storlek sex stigit med tre procent och medelpriset lyft till 137,56 euro.
För storlek fem var stegringen åtta procent eller ett nytt medelpris på 125,19 euro.
Blårävsauktionen fortsätter och totalt skall nästan 200.000 skinn säljas under dagen.

description.hltext_display: Aachener Trio gibt Vollgas
description.content: "Viele Spieler waren in der letzten Saison verletzt oder haben noch gar nicht in der 2. Liga gespielt, und müssen nun bei uns Vollgas geben", sagte kürzlich Aachens Manager Erik Meijer hinsichtlich seiner Verletztenmisere. Dabei wird er besonders an seine beiden Spieler Tobias Feisthammel und Marco Höger gedacht haben. Beide Akteure fielen vor dieser Saison eher in die Kategorie der "Nobodys". Und sind nun ebenso wie Timo Achenbach aus dem Aachener Spiel nicht mehr wegzudenken. [ weiter... ]

description.hltext_display: Zwei trotzten auch dem Winter - weitgehend
description.content: 21 Spieltage sind in der 3. Liga absolviert - mehr oder weniger. Zahlreiche witterungsbedingte Ausfälle haben nicht nur die Tabelle in ein etwas schiefes Bild geraten lassen. Insgesamt 22 Partien stehen für die Zeit nach der Winterpause auf dem Nachholspielplan. Kein einziges Team ist nicht davon betroffen, fünf Mannschaften konnten immerhin 20 Spiele absolvieren. Und zwei Spieler aus diesem Kreis kamen so auf genau 1800 Minuten: Mark Lerandy (1. FC Saarbrücken) und Jens Truckenbrod (Jena). [ weiter... ]

description.hltext_display: 三星星世界登中山黄圃
description.content:
接下来，大篷车将在广东省22个城市举办34场次的巡回活动。12月23日，三星星世界大篷车将来到龙华明珠数码港。12月25日，大篷车将亮相惠州数码港。冬日炫彩生活，即将为你一一开启，请广东消费者全心期待吧！
三星电子中国区副总裁李载烨
三星电子中国区副总裁李载烨表示，三星星世界广东之旅行程已经过半，活动达到了预期的效果。在活动规模上，三星星世界大篷车将驶向全国784个T4―T5城市，并一直持续到2011年12月末。在影响力方面，通过大篷车活动，预计将有数万名消费者直接参与到这一活动中。
三星星世界大篷车亮相黄圃正联电脑城
飘色、麒麟舞、黄圃腊味，一提到黄圃，也许绝大多数人首先会联想到这些文化遗产。作为中山建制最早、历史上中山三大名镇之一的黄圃镇，其文化底蕴值得我们细细回味。
宅男女神火辣上阵
12月18日，三星星世界大篷车亮相黄圃正联电脑城。三星星世界大篷车展示了三星显示器、笔记本、打印机三大产品线，产品丰富型号齐全，充分满足了消费者的体验、购买需求。
活动现场，还有美女拉拉队为活动呐喊助威。五名美女组成拉拉队衣着清凉惊艳登场，一曲动感十足的舞蹈，点燃了台下观众的激情，现场爆发出阵阵尖叫声。
喜笑颜开的哥们
互动环节，观众踊跃登台参与到三星星世界大篷车的互动活动中来。大篷车为观众准备了大量的实用好礼，100%的高中奖率，让现场的消费者大有收获。现场的抽奖箱子相当惹眼，让参与活动的哥们喜笑颜开。
我们都是围观帝
三星星世界大篷车号召力强大，引发了众多路过市民的强力围观。连骑着摩托车的兄弟，都忍不住停了下来，加入到浩大的围观的队伍中。现场还设置了问卷调查环节，问卷调查表明，高达五成的消费者愿意购买三星IT产品，超过三成的消费者准备在短期内购买三星IT产品。
接下来，大篷车将一路前行，为广东人民送去更多的冬日好礼！万千精彩，尽在三星星世界大篷车。

description.hltext_display: Kate Moss: Raus aus dem Haus
description.content:
Drei Jahre nach ihrem Einzug hat Kate Moss nun auch schon wieder genug von ihrem „verwünschten“ Haus in St John’s Wood. Auf Anraten ihres Freundes Jude Law zieht das Supermodel nun in dessen Nachbarschaft.
seitenblicke.at
Im Londoner Nobelviertel St John's Wood lebt es sich eigentlich ausgezeichnet - doch Kate Moss sucht ihr Wohn-Glück nun trotzdem lieber anderswo.
Nix wie weg!
Erst 2007 hatte das britische Supermodel Einzug in das Haus gehalten, und es danach um viel Geld renovieren lassen. Trotzdem will Kate demnächst ihre Koffer wieder packen, und mit Töchterchen Lila Grace und Freund Jamie Hince ins ebenso noble Viertel Highgate übersiedeln. Dort hat sich Moss nach Informationen der britischen Tageszeitung „Daily Mirror“ nämlich um schlappe 7,5 Millionen Pund (9,55 Millionen Euro) ein neues Domizil zugelegt.
Schon bald werden Kate & Co. deshalb in unmittelbarer Nähe von Jude Law und dessen Freundin Sienna Miller wohnen. „Kate hat in ihr altes Haus nach einem Einbruch und einer Überschwemmung viel Geld gesteckt. Trotzdem hat sie sich dort nie richtig zuhause gefühlt, und immer von ihrem 'verwünschten Haus' gesprochen. Jude und Sienna haben ihr Highgate schmackhaft gemacht, und Kate geraten, in ihre Gegend zu ziehen? verriet ein Insider der “Daily Mail„.
Ihre alte - rundum erneuerte - Bleibe wird die Fashion-Ikone für 10 Millionen Pfund auf dem Immobilienmarkt zum Kauf anbieten. Moss hatte 2007 zwei Millionen Pfund weniger dafür bezahlt.

description.hltext_display: Juanita Clements
description.content:
Mass for , 53, of Lamesa, was held at 3 p.m. Tuesday, December 21, 2010 at St. Judes Catholic Church in Tahoka with Fr. Edwardo Teo officiating.
Burial in City of Lubbock Cemetery was under the direction of Hudman Funeral Home of Post.
Rosary was held at 6 p.m. Monday at St. Judes Catholic Church.
She died on Saturday, December 18, 2010 in Lamesa.
She was born April 27, 1957 in Idalou to Guadalupe and Maria Esquivel. She married Mel Clements on March 17, 1982 in Lubbock.
She was a homemaker and an active member of St. Judes Catholic Church.
Survivors include her husband, Mel Clements of Lamesa; two daughters, Melanie Smith of Santa Fe, N.M. and Suzanne Clements of Lubbock; parents, Guadalupe and Maria Esquivel Sr. of Lubbock; nine brothers, Johnny and wife, Elsa Esquivel, of San Antonio, Bonifacio and wife, Blanca Esquivel, of Austin, Joe and wife, Gina Esquivel, of Lubbock, Modesto and wife, Alicia Esquivel, of Littlefield, Jessie and wife, Benita Esquivel, of Lubbock, David and wife, Patricia Esquivel, of Lubbock, Robert and wife, Ofelia Esquivel, of Dallas, Guadalupe Esquivel Jr. of Lubbock and Rey and wife, Martha Esquivel, of Post; four sisters, Lupe Mote of Woodrow, Connie Carter of Amarillo, Mary and husband, Don Mewburn, of Lubbock and Francis and husband, David Mesa, of Odessa; two grandsons, Shawn Miller of Lubbock and Weston Smith of Santa Fe, N.M.; and her father-in-law, Calvin Clements of Lubbock
She was preceded in death by a brother, Jesus Esquivel in 1958.

description.hltext_display: Милен Велчев: Бъркаме като пълним дупката в бюджета с частни спестявания
description.content:
Каквито и да са причините за национализация на част от професионалните пенсионни фондове, те не оправдават средствата. Това заяви в интервю за DarikFinance.bg бившият финансов министър от кабинета “Сакскобургготски” Милен Велчев. Той добави, че подобни действия трябва да се избягват в бъдеще и да не се дават нови поводи на потенциални инвеститори в България да мислят, че тяхната собственост може да бъде национализирана със закон. Бившият финансов министър бе категоричен, че “всяко такова действие в посока секвестиране на частна собственост влияе много негативно” на имиджа, който имаме пред чуждите инвеститори.
По думите на Велчев кредитният ни рейтинг не се е променил, въпреки опитите на правителството да ни убеди, че се е подобрил. Сред причините за това да не е спаднал, той изтъкна фискалната политика, която според него не е достатъчно добра, но по думите му в сравнение с други страни в ЕС правим що-годе добро впечатление. Ниският дълг също е един силен аргумент за запазване на кредитния рейтинг. “Тези два аргумента щяха може би да доведат дори до подобряване на рейтинга, ако бяхме по-убедителни и ако нямаше обратни аргументи“, коментира Милен Велчев.
Цялото интервю четете в ТУК

description.hltext_display: India test raket, net als Pakistan
description.content:
NEW DELHI (ANP) - Een dag na een Pakistaanse proef met een kernraket, heeft aartsrivaal India woensdag een test gedaan met een soortgelijke raket. De proef is succesvol verlopen, meldde het Indiase ministerie van Defensie.
Het land schoot twee zelfgemaakte Prithvi II-raketten af vanaf een testcentrum in Chandipu-aan-zee in het oosten van India. De raketten kunnen 350 kilometer ver reiken en kunnen een gewone of een kernbom dragen. India had het wapen op 24 september voor het laatst getest. Toen ging de lancering echter niet door wegens technische problemen.
,,De Prithvi II-raket heeft zijn robuustheid en precisie bewezen'', zei het Indiase ministerie.
Pakistan testte dinsdag met succes haar Hatf V, die geschikt is voor een atoombom.

description.hltext_display: Companies Moving into Smart Energy
description.content:
Guide to Green Electronics
18 top manufacturers are ranked according to their policies on toxic chemicals, recycling and climate change.
It’s hard to overestimate the potential of the smart energy sector. There are two perspectives to consider: The first is that the market is as big as every household and business in the United States. The second is that the variations of services that the industry can offer are just as endless.
The most well-known smart grid application is monitoring home energy to make it easier for people to see their consumption and, presumably, cut it. But there are other smart grid functions, such as empowering people to generate their own energy through solar panels and sell what they don't use on nascent energy markets.
The reality is that this is the next vibrant, thriving and entrepreneurial wonderland. It doesn’t hurt that it also is a socially responsible, feel-good undertaking. Some hugely successful companies, such as Google and Microsoft, are jumping in with both feet.
Google’s play in this sector is PowerMeter, which is a free energy monitoring tool that tracks home energy usage over time. This week, Blue Line Innovations said that its PowerCost Monitor allows monitoring to be done via end user gear attached via a Wi-Fi gateway. The company said that it is the only monitoring product to be in full partnership with Google PowerMeter and Microsoft Hohm.
It’s all about making it easy for the consumer. Another announcement was made earlier this month by Eragy. The company’s new Home Energy Monitoring software, when coupled with a Control4 home automation system and the TED5000 energy monitor, enables significant savings, according to the company. The system, the press release says, enables monitoring of energy from a television, iPad, smartphone, Web browser or Control4 console.
Security is a vital topic in the world of home energy management. The goal is to put more data online and make it visible to homeowners. The flip side of that is that the information can make the home and homeowner vulnerable if it falls into the wrong hands. For instance, a drop off of a high percentage in energy usage likely would indicate that the house is temporarily vacant – and a good target for a break in. This week FutureDash took a step toward alleviating these concerns with the addition of GridLock security to its Green Dash home energy monitoring software.
In addition, Research and Markets sees smart energy as the launch pad for 802.15.4 and Zigbee, two low-speed short distance networking protocols:
ZigBee has been languishing as a technology for nearly 10 years, unable to find an application that would provide a launching pad for its mass adoption. That search may be over. With government stimulus and mandates forcing utilities to better manage electricity usage, smart energy is gaining traction as the largest volume growth opportunity for 802.15.4 and ZigBee, helping to push forecasts of chip and module shipments to over exceed three quarters of a billion units by 2014.
Late December is a great time to make predictions, and one that almost certainly will come true is that the in-home sector of the overall smart grid and smart energy market will take off. I discussed some of the big picture items earlier this month with Bob Gohn, the director of smart grid research for Pike Research. There also are smaller bore – but potentially lucrative – detail-oriented elements such as home energy Wi-Fi gateways that vendors and manufacturers will rush to roll out.

description.hltext_display: Свой следующий бой боксер Мэнни Пакьяо проведет 7 мая против Шейна Мозли
Elizabeth L. Brewer
description.content:
in Lamesa.
Services were to be held at 4:00 p.m. on Wednesday, December 22, 2010 at Second Baptist Church in Lamesa with Bro. Rush Coffman officiating.
Interment will be on Thursday, December 23, 2010 in Groom, Texas, at 11:00 a.m., under the direction of Branon Funeral Home with Tom Brewer officiating.
Visitation was to be held on Wednesday, December 22, 2010 at Second Baptist Church, from 2 to 4 p.m.
Elizabeth Montgomery was born on September 16, 1930 in Lamesa to Lois (Callaway) and Perry Montgomery. She married Carol C. Brewer on August 29, 1948 in Lamesa. She was a member at Second Baptist Church.
Beth and her husband enjoyed traveling in their RV for 29 years to Blue Grass Festivals. They also enjoyed meeting friends and spending the winter months in the Rio Grande Valley. She was an Insurance Agent for Farmers Union where she was elected as Agent of the Year in 1972.
Beth is survived by two sons and three daughters, Tommy Carroll Brewer and wife, Cindy, of Brazil, Robert Perry Brewer and wife, Dawn, of Seagraves, and Gaye Nell Gregg and husband, Jack, of Andrews, Barbara Sue Brennan and husband, Bob, of Katy, and Elizabeth Rice and husband, Lin, of Midland; 10 grandchildren; 20 great-grandchildren; a brother, John H. Montgomery of Lamesa; and a sister, Edith Ann Hogg and husband, Dell, of Delhi, Louisiana.
She is preceded in death by her husband, Carol C. Brewer; her parents; a daughter, Janice Erin Brewer; and two brothers, Donald Montgomery and Preston Montgomery.
The family suggests memorials to the Cystic Fibrosis Foundation, 1008 Winscott Rd. Suite B, Benbrook, TX 76126; or Second Baptist Church, 1705 N. Bryan Ave., Lamesa, TX 79331.

description.hltext_display: Falls, employees reach agreement
description.content: CUYAHOGA FALLS: The ink is drying on some new contracts between the city and three employee groups. The police department's patrolmen and supervisors have each agreed to three-year agreements that offer no pay increases in the first year, with economic reopeners in 2012 and 2013.

description.hltext_display: Scrooge?s lesson for missing loved ones this Christmas
description.author: Our Correspondent
description.content:
EVERY year, about this time, I take down from its shelf A Christmas Carol then drift again with Dickens through the streets and lanes of long ago London.
And, as the pages turn in winter twilight, I shudder with Scrooge when, one by shadowy one, he sees the Spirits of Christmases Past, Present and Future appear.
The second midnight visitor, the Spirit of Christmas Present, brings true heartbreak. He takes us to Bob Cratchit’s home, where the crippled Tiny Tim sits on his stool near the dimming fire.
"Spirit,” says Scrooge, "tell me if Tiny Tim will live.”
"I see a vacant seat,” replies the ghost. "In the poor chimney corner, a crutch without an owner.”
In the 1951 film Scrooge (Dickens’ immortal creation brought perfectly to life by the peerless Alastair Sim) the camera dwells upon that vacant stool. And sadness seeps from the screen.
That empty stool speaks more eloquently of grief, of hopeless longing for a loved one lost, than even the most inspired oration.
And, because it is Christmas, the pathos is even more profound, for this is the season when memories stir, when an empty chair at the table is a remorseless reminder of happier Christmases past.
There will be many empty chairs this Christmas Day. During the past year so many have died in Afghanistan, fathers, sons, husbands, brothers, maybe sisters and daughters too. In 1914 other men went off to war, promising they would be home for Christmas. Millions never did come home. Nothing’s changed.
When a mother looks at the empty chair where her son sat last Christmas, she will not remember him as the warrior that went off to battle, as the man who towered over her.
No, she sees her baby. She sees a small boy, sleepless on an evening seen now through mists of time, sleepless because he knows someone is visiting tonight. She remembers the card he brought home from his infant school, Father Christmas splashed with colour, as priceless to her now as a Picasso painting, which her little son’s Santa resembles.
Such cards are kept and cherished, but what sorrow they inspire when that empty chair is in the room.
How many youngsters have flown from home since Christmas last year? Leaving, yes, an empty chair.
But the mother looking at that chair will not see the rebel teenager who walked away one day to leave her bereft.
She sees a little girl skipping excitingly in gorse wings and golden halo, maybe a gap-tooth grin, proud angel in her school nativity play, a face forever framed in her mother’s thoughts. All the anger, all the arguments, are forgotten, not knowing worse than knowing.
There has been much talk in your Echo lately of the homeless stranded on our streets, sleeping rough, men and women who have somehow slipped away from society.
How many empty chairs have they left behind?
I once spent days with people on the streets in Cardiff. They stood in bitter cold on bleak wasteland. Passing the mandatory bottle of cider from one to another, wondering only where the next bottle was coming from.
But when, briefly, their minds cleared on that Christmas Eve, it was memories of other Christmases that saw them stare into a distant past.
Some were known by the places they left behind.
Why do you do it, I asked Antrim Roy? Why drink yourself daily into oblivion, some days too often ending with broken limbs, bloody heads?
"Because we’re weak,” said Antrim Roy.
It was Roy who told me that, when the shakes had passed, when Christmas came and the bottle was empty, he remembered other days, the warm and cosy bedroom, the pride he felt when singing at Midnight Mass, the pride his mother felt.
Such memories made him wonder if she was still alive, whether she too remembered those days before his crucial collision with the bottle.
Of course she did, I told him.
And I truly believe that, years ago in a room in a town in Ireland, there was an empty chair and an old woman who looked at it on Christmas Day, and remembering Antrim Roy as a little boy in a church on Christmas Eve.
Yes, Christmas casts its spell over the most unlikely.
Even Dylan Thomas was seduced by his memories, and brought them vividly to life for us in A Child’s Christmas in Wales.
Maybe this week, if some empty chairs are offered to the old and the alone, the homeless, to the frightened, it will truly be as Tiny Tim famously cried, God Bless Us Everyone.

event_or_fact.property: when the shakes had passed, when Christmas came and the bottle was empty, he remembered other days, the warm and cosy bedroom, the pride he felt when singing at Midnight Mass, the pride his mother felt.

description.hltext_display: Two Canadians named among Carnegie heroes
description.content:
PITTSBURGH, Pa. - One battled roaring flames, another fought off a stabbing attack — both risked their own lives to save strangers.
Michael Sharpe of Spruce Grove, Alta., and Gheorghita Rusu of Ottawa are the two Canadians among 21 people to receive the latest Carnegie medals for heroism.
In September last year, Sharpe braved roaring flames and suffered a third degree burn to save a man from a burning tractor-trailer that rolled over on an Alberta highway.
Sharpe saw the accident happen and rushed to pull driver Marc Bissonnette from the cab of the flaming tractor .
In November last year, 25-year-old Rusu fought a knife wielding assailant — and was stabbed in the chest — as he helped rescue a female letter carrier who was being stabbed repeatedly.
Forty-six-year-old letter carrier Brenda Van Leyen was approaching the rear of a pharmacy on her route when a man forced her to the ground and began to stab her repeatedly.
Rusu, the pharmacy's assistant manager, heard her screams, rushed to the scene and grabbed her attacker from behind and pushed him against a wall. The man then struck out at Rusu, stabbing him in the chest.
Both Rusu and Van Leyen required hospital treatment, but recovered.
The Pittsburgh-based Carnegie Heroes Fund was started in 1904 by steel baron Andrew Carnegie, who was inspired after hearing rescue stories from a mine disaster that killed 181 people. Since then, more than US$32.9 million has been awarded to 9,412 people.

description.hltext_display: Американские бизнесмены могут продать футбольный клуб "Манчестер Юнайтед"
Wednesday, 22 December, 2010
description.author: Our Correspondent
description.content:
Why vote if they just ignore us?
I REFER to the letter from the Assembly AMs, headed "Why a Yes Vote is best for Wales” (Viewpoints, December 18).
I ask the question – why a "yes” vote? – when we in Llanrumney and Rumney cannot even stop the political process to build a school on our treasured piece of green space. Our Rec.
All the politicians in the Assembly know it is a gross injustice and it should be stopped, and they will not stop it in its tracks. We are being forced to challenge every step of the way while the council uses our council tax money and expertise to knock down the local residents.
Maybe it is because the politicians have passed so many laws that they now have entangled themselves in a legal mess that only allows the Assembly, local councils and private companies to use their expensive lawyers to challenge decisions if the tick box process has not been satisfied, and get what they want, and local people do not count any more.
The original consultative process and all our submissions, and a local democratic referendum were completely ignored by Cardiff council’s Rodney Berman (Lib Dem) and Neil McEvoy (Plaid).
How can this be democracy?
No decisions can any more be made based on common sense, and accepted that sometime the communities are right, and the political masters wrong.
We are jumping through needless hoops to solve what we believe is socially an unacceptable decision by politicians.
All the lawmakers mentioned, who are costing us money passing the laws in London, have helped destroy local democracy, and I am not sure how different it will be if power is transferred to the Assembly.
So to me, and many other voters, the big question is: how will this "yes” vote help to save our Llanrumney Park, and strengthen local democracy?
I ask all voters who have a major issue of loss of recreational green space in Wales to challenge your local AMs and ask them what they can do for you, and how quickly, if they win a yes vote.
Tony Martin
Rumney, Cardiff
Assembly gangwants backing
LAST week in Viewpoints we saw the start of the "Vote Yes” campaign for more powers to the Welsh Assembly.
Politicians from all parties started ganging up on us to try to ensure that their gravy train continues, or even gets larger, with more staff and greater opportunities to enhance expenses claims.
March 3, 2011, is the due date for the referendum and until then we will be inundated with "spin” about the many so called advantages of more power to the "mob in the bay”.
What they won’t tell us is how many more AMs will be required, how many extra support staff will they want, how many more offices will be required and, of course, how much extra money will it all cost?
I say we should demand this information up front, well before March 3. How else can any of us be expected to make an informed choice of which way to vote. Come on folks, join me in demanding this information, but one last point, please don’t hold you breath while waiting for answers.
Doug Bragg
Cathays, Cardiff
Officer’s stancebeggars belief
I AM writing in reply to the articles entitled "I’d rather die than have a new carer” (Echo, December 10) and "Elderly Care Change Will Cause Upset” (Viewpoints, December 10).
I have worked in the care sector for around 30 years and never have I seen such a cavalier attitude being displayed towards the care of elderly and other vulnerable members of our society as that being shown now. It’s an utter disgrace.
I was particularly appalled at the sentiments voiced by Neelam Bhardwaja, the council’s corporate director for social care, who says users won’t be allowed to dictate who provides their care.
It beggars belief that these people, who trumpet the need to promote and protect the "individuality” and "dignity” of people who require care, are the very same people who deny that dignity by their attitudes and daft system changes.
How hypocritical to have all these so-called care standards, criminal records bureau checks, etc. when there is no continuity of care for individuals by carers of their choice.
How many people would be prepared to be supported in an intimate way (bathing, toileting, etc.) by complete strangers every time they require assistance?
I fully agree with everything that Dr Peter Groom from Cardiff expressed in his letter on the same day, and appeal to the Care Standards Inspectorate Council for Wales to intervene and ensure vulnerable people get the care they need and from wherever and whomsoever they themselves wish, and not be dictated to by some office worker with a spreadsheet.
Gwyn Jones
Hengoed, Caerphilly
Sunday footballremembered
THE Echo article about 40 years of the Cardiff Sunday Football League made very interesting reading ("They said it would last two weeks”, December 15).
I was in it from the start. I was secretary of City Motors, who won the 2nd Division, and we later became Lex Motors. The handbook shows that Lex Motors were the champions of the Premier League in 1972.
I was at the meeting in the Tredegar presided over by the chairman David Stacey and the secretary David Jones, who took over from G Hallam. I later became involved with Heath Cossacks who won the League Cup. Jan Bekker, a prolific goal scorer, was my workmate and captain, and we became good friends.
I recognise a lot of the people named. Jan, unfortunately, died three years ago. It was a struggle but in the end common sense prevailed. Well done to the current committee for keeping it going and I wish them well.
John Harding
Llanrumney, Cardiff
Council service is disgraceful
I AM writing as a resident of Fairwater/Pentrebane. We all understand how severe the weather has been of late and as a senior citizen I have experienced these types of conditions in the past.
But, at this moment in time, I have not seen a gritter or snow plough in this area before the start of the current weather. As chairman of the local social club, Fairwater Social and Athletic Club, I can say it has affected our business along with all other businesses.
In addition, the health and safety of every person in the city could be improved by simple distribution of salt. With the amount of rates we pay to the council to carry out the running of the highways of Cardiff, to keep the main roads open for buses, cars, taxis and the services, it’s about time the authority got its act together. It’s a disgrace the way the population of Cardiff is being treated by the council.
My vehicle has been abandoned at the bottom of a road since Friday. I am unable to drive my automatic car because of an unsalted road.
Keith Morgan
Pentrebane Road, Fairwater, Cardiff
Wrong type of bird, surely?
I SEE the pub outside the Cardiff City Stadium is nearing completion and is recruiting staff.
It is to be called the Sand Martin. Can any football fan explain this?
I know the local team is known as the Bluebirds but the sand martin is an earthy brown bird, unlike its relatives the house martin and the swallow, both of which have dark blue upper-parts.
The pub company’s website offers no clues beyond saying that the pub will open in April 2010 – so perhaps this isn’t the most reliable source of information.
They could have picked our commonest predominantly blue bird, but I suppose calling a football pub the Blue Tit would have been asking for trouble.
Paul Seligman
Cardiff
Robin Hood taxneeded... NOW
WE all know that the cuts in benefits and in our public services are going to hit low income working families and those on benefit hardest.
That means the people of Barry, and especially Gibbonsdown, the area I represent, will be expected to pay for the greed and recklessness of a few arrogant bankers.
Yet, once again, these very bankers are preparing to pay themselves record amounts while the "Tory/Fib Dem” Government has cunningly put the spotlight on the poor, and their friends in the Tory press have orchestrated it so we now find ourselves squabbling over who should be the deserving poor.
A tiny tax on the financial sector of just 0.05% (the Robin Hood Tax) could generate £20bn annually in the UK alone.
That’s enough to protect our schools and hospitals.
So every time we hear the "Fib Dem/Tory Government” announce yet another cut we must keep asking… could a tax on the banks have paid for that?
It’s time for justice.
It’s time for fairness for the hundreds of families I represent who will be facing the choice between buying food or paying the heating bill this Christmas.
The banks can afford it. The systems are in place to collect it.
It won’t affect ordinary bank accounts or savings.
It’s fair, it’s timely and it’s the right thing to do.
Councillor Rob Curtis (Labour)
Barry

entity.property: Care Standards Inspectorate Council for Wales

description.hltext_display: Hyères: Ils laissent leur petite-fille de 2 ans dans la voiture pendant qu'ils jouent au casino
description.author: no-reply@20minutes.fr
description.content:
FAIT DIVERS - Les grands-parents ont été placés en garde à vue...
Après la discothèque, le casino. Un couple de Toulonnais a été mis en garde à vue après avoir laissé dimanche soir leur petite-fille de 2 ans toute seule dans leur voiture tandis qu’ils jouaient aux machines à sous d’un établissement de Hyères (Var), rapporte Var-matin ce mercredi.
Ce sont les pleurs de l’enfant qui ont alerté les gardiens du parking souterrain. Ces derniers ont attendus en vain le retour des grands-parents avant d’expliquer à la fillette comment ouvrir la porte de la voiture.
«Un contexte familial compliqué, sur fond d’adoption et de misère»
La grand-mère de l’enfant, une Brésilienne de 45 ans, est arrivée un peu plus tard, alors que son mari, un Portugais de 55 ans, poursuivait son tour des machines à sous. Ils ont été immédiatement interpellés et placés en garde à vue. «L’affaire se situe dans un contexte familial compliqué, sur fond d’adoption et de misère», explique Var-matin.
La fillette, dont les parents sont Brésiliens, a été placée dans un foyer et une procédure pour délaissement d’enfant a été ouverte par le Parquet de Toulon, précise le quotidien. Remis en liberté, les grands-parents ont rendez-vous avec la justice le 22 avril prochain.

description.hltext_display: GSoft Integrates Adeptol Document Viewer Into Its Content Management Solution Adendo
description.author: AJAX Document Viewer
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Adeptol today announced that GSoft, the leading Content Management & Broadcast Resource Planning solutions company has successfully integrated Adeptols document viewer into its Content Management Solution Adendo. The AJAX-based document viewer from Adeptol enables faster rendering and viewing of over 300 document formats, with a faster loading time and better user experience.Since 1990, GSoft has been developing solutions for Broadcast Resource Planning. GSoft products include GMedia and Digital Content Management Solution - Adendo. Adendo is a web based digital archiving, document management and workflow management solution with features for complete document collaboration and sharing.Adeptol Document Viewer offers an easy way to view documents directly from the server without downloading them locally on the client machine. Adendo users can view documents directly in the browser more efficiently and not worry about installing or setting up desktop softwares. Adeptols built in preview functionality offers users quick thumbnail viewing with faster load times, differentiated experience, and operational excellence. Users can also add controls on the document, rendering it view only or control printing, navigation, pan control and even sharing of document within a work group, across departments, or with users outside the firewall.The integration of Adeptol and GSoft products shows the true benefits of incorporating native viewing into a document management solution, said Prateek Kathpal, Founder & CEO, Adeptol.As a part of Adendo, we needed a light footprint viewer that would allow users to view documents online quickly. Adeptol was natural choice with its best-of-breed viewing technology, said Carlos Santos, CEO of GSoft. We are pleased to be working with Adeptol to deliver advanced viewing capabilities to our users.About GSoftGSoft is a Portugal based company and develops solutions for Broadcast Resource Planning & Document Management. Gsoft Document Management Solution Adendo provides a wide range of responses to current problems of document management, so it can be applied across all sectors, regardless of the size of organizations. Adendo is available as an on premise pre configured bundled solution. For more information, visit www.gsoft.tv and www.adendo.ptAbout AdeptolAdeptol offers the industry's leading document viewing technology which can be embedded in any webpage or application or integrated with any system. Adeptol is also one of the first companies in the world to offer Software-as-a-Service based document viewing in cloud solution. Recently Adeptol released a mobile viewing solution, using the latest HTML5 technology enabling users to view documents on mobile phones or tablet devices without downloading any client or application on the device. For more information, go to www.adeptol.comAll product and company names herein are trademarks of their registered owners.###GSoft offers Adendo users a faster document viewing functionality using Adeptol technology.
